story:
In the distant future, there are rumors of a mysterious cyborg running an abandoned hidden research facility on a planet far from the center of human civilizations.His mysterious origin attracts the Star System Governments to investigate the truth of this cyborg called The Admin and reclaim the facility with all its researches inside. But little is known to the Governments, because we, humans, are not the only beings interested in this mysterious cyborg.

Play as The Admin, a cyborg wielding gun and sword in defending the research facility from humans who try to reclaim it and from other beings try to destroy him. Forge sharper swords to slice all who endangers the mission, craft deadlier guns to put a hole in the body of invaders, and evolve to be better at surviving....

GAMEPLAY OF THE ADMIN

This game  is a single player 3rd person action adventure game where you play as a cyborg called The Admin.  As the only thing that left in a hidden research facility, he must keep the facility running and defend it from anything that is threatening his mission. You will have 2 weapons, a handgun and a sword, and some skills that can be used in your battle against the enemy. As your journey goes on, these weapons and skills can improved and evolved to help you defeat stronger enemies.
Screenshots of the game in action



UNIQUE ENEMIES

There are three types of enemies in The Admin which are :  The Wildlife Creatures, The Solar System Government's Spec Ops and The Xenotroops. Each of them has 5 types of variations with unique appearance and distinct strategy to defeat them. Let's introduce some of them..

  • The Wildlife Creatures

From left to right: Basraptor, Cave Maggot and Spinger

       These are dangerous wildlife creatures that inhabit the planet where the hidden research facility is located. The size of these creatures varies from the small annoying maggot to the giant apex predator. And each of them will have different way to take down its prey. Like the spinger spitting acid or the basraptor charging its prey.

  • SSG SpecOps


From left to right : Assault, Veteran and MBoIS Suit equipped Soldier

       In this era, human civilization has spread to dozens of solar system under the Star Systems Governments. Yet after visiting more than one hundred planets, humanity had never met another intelligence life forms. To keep these  dozens of solar systems safe, the SSG had a very reliable armies. And the one that is feared  the most by pirates and separatists is the SSG Spec Ops, which members are all highly trained soldiers. Even there are genetically enhanced super soldiers among them.

  • The Xenotroops


From left to right :  Ripper, Xenogunner and Heavy Xenogunner

    On the other side of milky way far from the reach of human civilizations, there are another civilizations way bigger and more advanced than the humanity. Most of these alien civilizations united as one big alliance and have spread to countless of solar system. One of them is the Xenotroops, a race of space roaming warriors equipped with very advanced weaponry ready to annihilate everything that is threatening the alliance.

MULTIPLE WAYS TO DEVELOP THE CHARACTER

     Because of the ever growing threat that is ready to destroy The Admin and all his works, you  will need better weapons and skills to survive. The gun and sword can be upgraded to become deadlier physical or energy weapons type. This energy or physical type will have more advantage against certain type of enemy.

    Just like the weapons, the skills can also be upgraded and evolved. Each of the skills in the admin can be evolved into one of 2 branches available when you reach a certain point. Each branch will have a distinct function and properties than the other one.

Check out the gameplay video

    You can play the demo right now!!!! Just remember that the game is still in development phase, so changes may make its way into the game. Enjoy the demo! Feel free to give your feedbacks!

    As an independent game developer, Willpowaproject haven't got any investor to fund this game. The Admin has been in development for about 14 months funded with personal savings. And after months of struggle, it's a good thing that a lot of the assets needed for the game managed to be done with very limited resources. But This game still need more funds to make it a good final product that gives you an enjoyable experience, a game that is  fun to play with compelling story and nice graphics.

  • Polish the existing assets

  • Add more assets : 3d Models of weapons, environment and enemies, animations, SFXs and UI

  • Gameplay developments

  • Softwares licenses








Share this campaign on your social networks and other medias, so that more people will know about this campaign. As this game is also trying yo make its way onto Steam, you can also visit our Steam Greenlight page and vote for this game. Thank you very much for reading this post!

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetai...

story:
BACKGROUND:
I had always dreamed of being part of a racing league, but never had a game I felt good enough at to join a league. A lot of racing games required a racing wheel or an advanced understanding of car mechanics to be competitive. Most of all though, I didn't know anyone in these leagues which didn't fill me with confidence. 


Late last year, my beautiful fiance and partner for 9 years was diagnosed with cancer. This came as a huge shock to us and our families. It had an immediate effect on our lives, reducing our hours at work and social interaction. For the past 6 months I have been doing 2 days a week mostly with the rest of my time with Louise either at home, or during her chemotherapy treatment at the Peter MacCallum Cancer Center.


With mental and financial strain pulling at me every day, my business began to fail. I had started a small business building arcade machines and consoles with my friend Daniel the year before which was slowly building momentum. However, upon the release of our console, the decision was made to end the business. At times it felt like everything was falling apart. With the added hours at home and at the Peter Mac, I turned to video games as an escape. I found that escape in Gran Turismo Sport.
The first 3 Gran Turismo's had me hooked. I still play Gran Turismo 2 to this day. The new installment had everything I was looking for in a game. Amazing graphics, incredible online game play, but most of all, the opportunity to create and upload your own artwork to the livery editor and design your own cars. With a passion for the V8 Supercars series and a company name I was itching to re-brand, the Thrillhouse Arcade Racing Team was born.


I began by recreating famous liveries from the Supercars series and posting them on various Gran Turismo Facebook pages , I managed to create a bit of a following within the game. I made the mistake of mentioning Louise's illness in a post, and I received a some hateful comments from a few younger guys. How I handled the situation caught the eye of the admin team of the major Gran Turismo Sport page, and I was invited to be an administrator.

Using my viewpoint of the community, I reached out to a few Australian and Kiwi members to start a racing team. My first admin, Lucas Szoka, and I had an instant connection. Lucas' life is touched by the dreaded C too. It wasn't long after that I realised I was creating a safe space for people who share my interests, but most importantly a place where we could get away from the stresses of our day to day lives. Strangers on the internet saved me from spiraling out of control when my partner needed me the most. Other members joined because they loved the close, hard and fair racing we represent.

I have grown to truly love the community we created together and I'm looking forward to watching it grow.

THE THRILLHOUSE ARCADE VISION


To my amazement the Thrillhouse Arcade Racing Team is already something I am truly proud of. With 60 amazing members contributing content everyday, events held 3-4 times a week and various competitions regarding liveries, we have already become very well known in the Gran Turismo community!

In February we launched our first Twitch Live stream with commentary from one of our members. We had 40 viewers on our first stream with a lot of positive feedback around the liveries we created for our vehicles, the quality of the racing and how well presented Thrillhouse is.

It is my goal to grow Thrillhouse into a 24/7 e-channel hosting races from all over the world on our channel via our various allies, global competitions and even the possibility to branch out into a physical appearance at gaming conventions with racing rigs. The possibilities are limitless with such a dedicated team behind me and with the help of our supporters.

WHAT EXPENSES NEED TO BE COVERED?


$250.00 year - Running the website for one year
www.thrillhousearcade.com
This is a place for all news, event results, videos and downloads to be hosted as well as an online shop for shirts and other Thrillhouse merchandise.


$420.49 - Dropbox Advanced account for online storage
Thrillhouse requires an unlimited storage account so members can share videos with content creators and to ensure all data is stored safely and easily accessible.


$114.67 - Twitch Turbo Account 
Currently we stream LIVE to Twitch twice a week but with a free account we cannot have the videos stored or replayed. With commentary becoming a huge part of our telecast, a Turbo account will allow our streams to be visible for 60 days after broadcast.

With so much of my time taken up running the Thrillhouse Arcade Racing Team, I am hoping you will be willing to put in$20 to help Thrillhouse Arcade continue without financial strain. With 10% of all money donated going to the Peter MacCallum Cancer Center, we align ourselves with those dedicated in the fight against the disease that has touched so many of our lives.

Mikey Harland
Thrillhouse Arcade

story:
BattleflaG 33 C.Ruins 1 used during a Show ( Mons August the 21st 2015 ).

During my first shows, as a game designer, I soon faced the problem caused by a hard playing surface . By meeting some clever persons, I started to study an alternative to game boards. I began to create my own designs, dedicated to my own game, and printed them on synthetic cloth. End of 2014, I extended this to other games in other formats. The interest of the public was here, but now I need you to extend my range.


Lors de mes premières sorties en convention de jeux, en tant que créateur de jeu,  j'ai vite été confronté au problème engendré par une surface de jeu en dur. En faisant de bonnes rencontres, je me suis mis à étudier une alternative aux plateaux de jeu en créant mes designs dédiés a mon jeu sur du tissus synthetique. Fin 2014 j'ai étendu cette technique pour d'autres jeux, en d'autres formats. L'intérêt du public est sans nul conteste au rendez vous, mais j'ai besoin de vous pour étendre ma gamme et prendre une vitesse de croisière.



The battlemats are made from lightweight synthetic cloth. They are easy to transport, washable and can be ironed with steam.

Dimensions may vary slightly due to the manufacture process, but they will never be shorter than expected.



Les tapis sont imprimés sur du tissus synthétique. Ils sont légers et faciles à transporter. Ils peuvent être lavés et repassés à la vapeur. Ils vous suivront partout sans encombres.

Les dimensions annoncées peuvent varier légèrement en raison du processus de fabrication. Cependant celles ci ne seront jamais plus petite que la côte annoncée.

To help me expand my range you can choose to get for 1 battlemat or more. 

If you choose for 1 battlemat, select the right perk and add the shipping. I'll send you a e-mail to know the mat you wish. 

You want more battlemats ( mixing or not with Premium) ? 

Depending on the number you wish ( add every mats of every sizes)  a discount will apply. The table below gives you prices for each mat. Then you just have to select the good perk ( More than X ), add the prices and shipping . I'll send you an e-mail to know your wishes. 

For example you wish a BattleflaG 22 and the 2 BattleflaGs 33, living in Europe. So you get for 1 x 17€ + 2x 19€ + 10€ = 65€. Choose the perk "more than 1" and add in custom "gift" 64€ ( 65€-1€).

Afin de m'aider à agrandir et lancer la gamme BattleflaG vous pouvez choisir d'acquérir 1 ou plusieurs tapis.

Si vous choisissez 1 tapis, sélectionnez la contrepartie dédiée et ajoutez les frais de ports ( voir note si dessus ). J'enverrai un e-mail pour connaître le modèle désiré.

Vous voulez plus de tapis ( mélangeant ou non les standards et les premium)?

Selon le nombre total de tapis désiré, un tarif dégressif s'applique ( voir le tableau ci dessus intitulé Discounted prices ). Selectionnez le bonne contrepartie , "more than 1" si vous souhaitez de 2 a 4 tapis, "more than 4" si vous prenez de 5 a 9 tapis ou "more than 9" pour un nombre plus grand. Il ne vous reste plus qu'à additionner les prix et les frais de port .J'enverrai un mail pour connaitre vos choix. 

Par exemple vous souhaitez recevoir 1 BattleflaG 22 et 2 BattleflaGs 33, habitant en France. Vous obtenez 1 x 17€ + 2x 19€ + 7€ = 62€ . Choisissez la contrepartie "more than 1" et ajoutez 61€ en "cadeau spplémentaire" (62€-1€).


The range is organised by size. Grids and hex series are available too. And it's called BattleflaG. All of those designs are available both for BattleflaG and BattleflaG Premium ( see below ).

Gallery is available for better pictures of battlemats "BattleflaG" on DakkaDakka http://www.dakkadakka.com/gallery/images-76896-47387_Battleflag.html

La gamme est organisée selon la taille. Des séries avec cases et hexagones sont disponibles également. Son nom est BattleflaG. Tous ces designs sont disponibles pour BattleflaG et BattleflaG Premium ( voir plus bas).

Une galerie est disponible pour de meilleur visuels des nappes "BattleflaG" sur DakkaDakka http://www.dakkadakka.com/gallery/images-76896-...






Wishing to meet the needs of the most demanding players, BattleflaG now comes in a premium range with a  tighter mesh's cloth. This mesh provides a graphical approaching PVC performance but made keeping the mobile side of BattleflaG. The thicker tissue also presents a best kept measure, and is still washable and ironable.

The following designs are advised only for Premium format.


Soucieux de répondre aux besoins des joueurs les plus éxigeants, BattleflaG se décline désormais sur une gamme Premium avec un tissus à la maille plus serrée. Ce maillage offre un rendu graphique approchant des performances sur PVC mais gardant le côté nomade de BattleflaG. Le tissus plus épais présente également une meilleur tenue des côtes, il reste lavable et repassable.

Les designs suivant ne sont conseillés qu'au format Premium.



 

Options are free and available on demand by mail or message on every mats.

Les options sont gratuites disponibles sur simple demande sur tous les tapis.


Those mats are the first available, more are planned and I hope to introduce them during the campaign.
Ce sont les premiers tapis disponibles. D'autres sont d'ors et déjà prévus et j'espère pouvoir les inclure durant la campagne.


Feel free to spread the word on social networks and forums " Don't start a war without your Battle flaG ! "

Soyez libre de reprendre la bonne parole sur les réseaux sociaux "Don't start a war without your Battle flaG !"

By meeting some clever persons, I started to study an alternative to game boards. I began to create my own designs, dedicated to my own game, and printed them on synthetic cloth. End of 2014, I extended this to other games in other formats. The interest of the public was here, but now I need you to extend my range.
Lors de mes premières sorties en convention de jeux, en tant que créateur de jeu,  j'ai vite été confronté au problème engendré par une surface de jeu en dur. En faisant de bonnes rencontres, je me suis mis à étudier une alternative aux plateaux de jeu en créant mes designs dédiés a mon jeu sur du tissus synthetique. Fin 2014 j'ai étendu cette technique pour d'autres jeux, en d'autres formats. L'intérêt du public est sans nul conteste au rendez vous, mais j'ai besoin de vous pour étendre ma gamme et prendre une vitesse de croisière.








The battlemats are made from lightweight synthetic cloth. They are easy to transport, washable and can be ironed with steam.Dimensions may vary slightly due to the manufacture process, but they will never be shorter than expected.





Les tapis sont imprimés sur du tissus synthétique. Ils sont légers et faciles à transporter. Ils peuvent être lavés et repassés à la vapeur. Ils vous suivront partout sans encombres.
Les dimensions annoncées peuvent varier légèrement en raison du processus de fabrication. Cependant celles ci ne seront jamais plus petite que la côte annoncée.





To help me expand my range you can choose to get for 1 battlemat or more. 
If you choose for 1 battlemat, select the right perk and add the shipping. I'll send you a e-mail to know the mat you wish. 
You want more battlemats ( mixing or not with Premium) ? 
Depending on the number you wish ( add every mats of every sizes)  a discount will apply. The table below gives you prices for each mat. Then you just have to select the good perk ( More than X ), add the prices and shipping . I'll send you an e-mail to know your wishes. 
For example you wish a BattleflaG 22 and the 2 BattleflaGs 33, living in Europe. So you get for 1 x 17€ + 2x 19€ + 10€ = 65€. Choose the perk "more than 1" and add in custom "gift" 64€ ( 65€-1€).







Afin de m'aider à agrandir et lancer la gamme BattleflaG vous pouvez choisir d'acquérir 1 ou plusieurs tapis.
Si vous choisissez 1 tapis, sélectionnez la contrepartie dédiée et ajoutez les frais de ports ( voir note si dessus ). J'enverrai un e-mail pour connaître le modèle désiré.
Vous voulez plus de tapis ( mélangeant ou non les standards et les premium)?
Selon le nombre total de tapis désiré, un tarif dégressif s'applique ( voir le tableau ci dessus intitulé Discounted prices ). Selectionnez le bonne contrepartie , "more than 1" si vous souhaitez de 2 a 4 tapis, "more than 4" si vous prenez de 5 a 9 tapis ou "more than 9" pour un nombre plus grand. Il ne vous reste plus qu'à additionner les prix et les frais de port .J'enverrai un mail pour connaitre vos choix. 
Par exemple vous souhaitez recevoir 1 BattleflaG 22 et 2 BattleflaGs 33, habitant en France. Vous obtenez 1 x 17€ + 2x 19€ + 7€ = 62€ . Choisissez la contrepartie "more than 1" et ajoutez 61€ en "cadeau spplémentaire" (62€-1€).



The range is organised by size. Grids and hex series are available too. And it's called BattleflaG. All of those designs are available both for BattleflaG and BattleflaG Premium ( see below ).
Gallery is available for better pictures of battlemats "BattleflaG" on DakkaDakka http://www.dakkadakka.com/gallery/images-76896-47387_Battleflag.html
La gamme est organisée selon la taille. Des séries avec cases et hexagones sont disponibles également. Son nom est BattleflaG. Tous ces designs sont disponibles pour BattleflaG et BattleflaG Premium ( voir plus bas).
Une galerie est disponible pour de meilleur visuels des nappes "BattleflaG" sur DakkaDakka http://www.dakkadakka.com/gallery/images-76896-...

















































Wishing to meet the needs of the most demanding players, BattleflaG now comes in a premium range with a  tighter mesh's cloth. This mesh provides a graphical approaching PVC performance but made keeping the mobile side of BattleflaG. The thicker tissue also presents a best kept measure, and is still washable and ironable.
The following designs are advised only for Premium format.
Soucieux de répondre aux besoins des joueurs les plus éxigeants, BattleflaG se décline désormais sur une gamme Premium avec un tissus à la maille plus serrée. Ce maillage offre un rendu graphique approchant des performances sur PVC mais gardant le côté nomade de BattleflaG. Le tissus plus épais présente également une meilleur tenue des côtes, il reste lavable et repassable.
Les designs suivant ne sont conseillés qu'au format Premium.








 

Options are free and available on demand by mail or message on every mats.
Les options sont gratuites disponibles sur simple demande sur tous les tapis.




Those mats are the first available, more are planned and I hope to introduce them during the campaign.

Ce sont les premiers tapis disponibles. D'autres sont d'ors et déjà prévus et j'espère pouvoir les inclure durant la campagne.


Feel free to spread the word on social networks and forums " Don't start a war without your Battle flaG ! "
Soyez libre de reprendre la bonne parole sur les réseaux sociaux "Don't start a war without your Battle flaG !"

story:
Liebe Freunde!
 
Es ist einfach gesagt: Was wünscht sich Christian zum Geburtstag?
Seine Freunde!
 
Manche von ihnen haben eine weite und kostspielige Reise vor sich, weil Christian ja auch in Frankreich zu hause ist und auch da einen Freundeskreis hat.
Ich wünsche mir dass wir die Kosten für jene, die von weit kommen, gemeinsam schultern und rufe daher diese Kampagne ins Leben.
 
Die Flüge sind bereits gebucht, damit sie günstig bleiben, daher ist das Budget auch schon mit 700.- ungefähr abschätzbar. Sollten wir dieses Ziel geringfügig überschreiten, würde ich die Siegerehrung nach unserem Kart-Rennen mit echtem Champagner ausstatten.
 
Andernfalls: Prosecco ! :-)
 

Wer sich also noch nicht in unüberschaubare Unkosten für ein Geburtstagsgeschenk gestürzt hat, welches ich mir für den Rest meines Lebens auf den Kaminsims stellen werde, kann sich gerne an dieser Kampagne beteiligen und mir die Freude meiner Freunde machen!

 

Als Gegenleistung gibt es von mir für jeden und ungeachtet Rang und Stand:

Ein Ticket für eine Tour in meinem neuen Entschleunigungsrenner:

FIAT 500 A ("Topolino")

Einige werden diese Tour sicher schon am 13.07.2013 geboten bekommen. Mit anderen werden wir das dann nachholen!

story:
Oh, hello. 

Welcome to our Indiegogo campaign! Nice to see you here. We just wanted to remind you that you can play our

DEMO

online already! Try it out here, and see if it's something for you!

 

WHAT IS CLAM MAN

Clam Man is the story of the eponymous Clam Man, a lowly office worker content with his easy life. However, when he suddenly gets laid off from Snacky Bay Prime Mayonnaise, he is cast into a web of intrigue, lies, deception, and ducks. Join him on his adventure to discover the real reason behind being let go.

  • Explore the seedy underbelly of the bustling underwater metropolis Snacky Bay!
  • Interact with more than 20 unique characters, each stranger than the last!
  • Choose how to steer conversations with a medium-sized novel's worth of dialogue!
  • Examine a lot of plants!
  • You want sandbags? We got sandbags!
  • Ponder the merits of recreational concrete!
  • And just how do those big machines at construction sites that go wroom wroom work?

 

Clam Man is aspiring to be a comedy game: a game where the experience above all else is designed to make you laugh. While there are a few puzzles in the short- to medium-length game, the primary focus has always been the dialogue, the characters, and the simple, dry artstyle. It's a game you can relax with, slowly make your way through, taking things in at your own pace. Depending on the player, we're looking at a 5-6 hour game.



BUT WHO IS TEAM CLAM

We’re a team of three, making our first game together. Now don’t let that worry you about whether or not we can finish the game: most of it is already done! We’ve been hard at work on this for a long time, and we decided to share it with the world only when we were getting close to the end of development.

Martin: Wrote and designed pretty much the whole game. Besides that, he drew the character sprites and animated them. He likes long walks on the couch and lazy Mondays playing video games at the beach.

Jakob: Like, a million lines of code. There’s a lot of code in this game, guys, not sure if you know. Jakob’s also our video editing guy, and his favorite food is spaghetti and a-spicy memeballs. (Obi Wan Jakoby wanted to add "Literally no one calls me that or has ever called me that")

Madeline: With her superior color vision, Maddie does all the background art and coloring of the game. She’s also been responsible for a lot of the promotional art we’ve posted. She loves anime WAY TOO MUCH and frankly, it's weird.

Anyway: We've wanted to make games for our entire lives. It's a life long dream. And here we are! We made one! Well, almost. But we're getting there, and we'd love to have you along for the ride! That sounds super cheesy! Oh boy!

WHERE DOES MY CASH MONEY GO

Even though most of the game is done, there’s a lot of stuff to do. Some of this stuff we can do on our own: fixing bugs, polishing the dialogue and upgrading certain art assets, but then there’s things we can’t do without your help!

LIKE AUDIO?

The game was developed with a staggering budget of ZERO money, and so far, that’s fine. Clam Man, as it is right now, is entirely made by Team Clam. But there are some things we can’t do on our own. One of these things is

  • The soundtrack, which so far has been only royalty-free tracks and possibly one or two written by the team. Now, depending on the success of the campaign, we can either spend a week or two picking out pre-made tracks from a reputable music licenser, or if we do really well, hire a composer to either some or all of the tracks!

(Oh, and if we get enough support to hire a composer, a lot of the Perks will have the original soundtrack added to them as a bonus!)

Besides the music, we really want to bring the town of Snacky Bay to life with more than the visuals and the soundtrack, which means

  • Foley and sound effects! This is a less costly endeavor, but still requires time and money!
  • Some of the money also goes to taxes, and getting the game on steam.
  • Some of the money goes to software licenses.
  • And then finally, a chunk of the money goes to us, the devs. After all, we need to eat and pay rent while we’re polishing up the game, right? You think we're some kinda robots that just need electricity? Well buster, electricity isn't free either. Yeah, ever think of that?

 

 

BUT HOW CAN I AND MY STACKS OF CASH MONEY HELP

Clam Man is coming out, whether you like it or not. However, with your help, we can make Clam Man stronger than you could have possibly imagined. That's a Star Wars reference, in case you missed it. The writing in the game is that subtle too.

What does that mean? No, not the Star Wars thing, the other thing. Well, working on the game in your spare time can only get you so far. To make Clam Man the game that we believe it can be, we need more time and money. Mostly money. Because money can buy time. Money trumps Father Time. Take that, old man.

Anyway, enough joking around. I'll be serious for a second. With your support, you can give us the resources to not only finish Clam Man, but also give it a rocking soundtrack, hours and hours of playtesting, and the polish that we believe it deserves. The more support we get, the more resources we have to pour into the game. We want this game to be good. We love this game, and we believe in this game. And as such, we really hope you'll believe in it too.

 

 

YOU'RE NOT JUST GONNA STEAL MY MONEY ARE YOU

Wow, that's almost a rude question. It's okay, I'm gonna let it slide.

Like I said earlier, the game is nearing completion. It's going to come out, no matter what. That's why we have the flexible goal: Any amount you guys get together, is going to go into the game. There's no fixed budget to make this game happen, it was always going to happen. It's just a question of how soon and how good, and with every backer, the game is going to get better. And together, we can make Clam Man really good. We know that.

 

WHAT ARE THESE PERKS 

We tried to include as much possible amounts

as possible, so you can find whichever one you feel is right for you! We appreciate all support, and are incredibly grateful for any amount you're willing to back.

That said, if there are no perks that interest you, let us know! If you want to back us with a very certain amount of money, or would like something particular in return, please email us and we'll see what we can do!  (teamclamman@gmail.com)

I DONT HAVE STACKS OF CASH MONEY, WHAT DO I DO

Share! Share the campaign with everyone you know! Share it on Facebook, on Instagram, Snapchat, Reddit, everywhere you can! The more people who see it, the more people might be interested! Tell your friends! Tell your family! Tell your coworkers! Call your grandma! (that last one doesn't have to be about the game, it's just a nice thing to do) It might not seem like much, but every share, like and retweet is a huge help!

 

Still have questions? Read our FAQ or feel free to email us at teamclamman@gmail.com!

 

And no matter what you thought of the pitch or our campaign, thank you so much for making it all the way through and listening to our crazy Clam Man-talk. Thank you, thank you, thank you!

best regards and all the love,

Team Clam

story:
What is The Other Brothers?

The Other Brothers is an episodic platformer that will have you running, jumping, collecting and racing against the clock in a modern take on that time-tested genre! 

With today's technology we are able to bring back that classic 16-bit aesthetic and combine it with modern mechanics, physics and gameplay to bring you a platforming experience like no other! Pixel art is a beautiful artform that was swept away by the advances in 3D graphics, we're going to bring it back for the new generation and make it better than ever!

We invite you to join Joe and Jim, on their wild and crazy adventure, as they traverse junkyards, cities, sewers and more to track down our damsel in distress, Tavy!

 

 

Why Indiegogo?

Game development is an exciting, fun and enjoyable process, but it's also an expensive one. Being indie developers means that whilst we have the freedom to make unique games without a publisher breathing down our necks, it also means that we're doing this out of our own pockets.

Despite the team being made up of talented, industry professionals with many years of experience, this doesn't mean we have all bases covered:

The Indiegogo money will allow us to:

  • Bring in professional translators
  • Have a full, original soundtrack and sound effects written and recorded
  • Purchase hardware for testing (we want to support a wide range of devices, not everyone can afford a top end iPad!)
  • Purchase additional licenses (we love you Linux users, why should you be left out?) If we gain at least 50 $100 backers  Linux and Ouya* will be prioritized.
  • Allow us to continue developing this title full-time until completion (work began in January and actual game development started in April!).

           *Ouya release will obviously be dependant on when the console launches.

 

 

Why do we need $50,000?

This game has been in development since January - $50,000 may sound like a lot but it is exactly how much it costs to develop a video game like this.
Four Unity Licenses with support for 2 devices, android and iOS already come to $20,000, then we have to purchase all of the items mentioned above (and more!) which leaves us with very little for the team to actually survive on! If you divide the remainder into the four members of the team and we come out with less than half a minimum-wage, fast food worker's salary!

We want to bring you an awesome music score, real, professional translations and proper hardware testing, these funds aren't for our pleasure- they're to make sure this game is as great as it can possibly be!

 

 

 

PERKS

We don't expect you to give your hard earned money without getting something back.  On the right you will see a list of our "Perks".  They start at a digital copy of The Other Brothers Game for Mac or PC, all the way up to working with our developers to design your very own cut scene.  The best part about the Perks, they're cumulative.  For instance, if you reserve a seat on the Beta Team you get everything that comes before it.  Not bad!  Perks will be fulfilled near December 1, 2012.
         

 

OK, so what exactly are you going to do between now and Launch?:

  • We will of course finish and port the game to as many platforms as possible starting with iOS, Android and Mac/PC and Linux and also Ouya*.
  • Localise the game, we want to start with Japanese, Spanish, Italian, French and German.
  • Classic Multiplayer Support (2 people, 1 device).
  • Various controller support.
  • An original soundtrack written exclusively for the game along with custom made sound effects.
  • Great performance on a wider range of devices (hardware testing).
  • It will allow us to start work on further (FREE) DLC content.
  • Buying Unity 4 licenses to support Linux, Ouya* and more.

 

 

So who are we and how did this come about?

Well it all began late last year, long-time friends Thomas Pasieka and Bjorn Hurri co-founded and concepted The Other Brothers project together - having worked for AAA companies on other peoples projects for so long, they wanted to do something of their own- something that harked back to the golden era of gaming.

Later, they began talks with Robert Cummings and Giuseppe Landolina of Simian Squared Ltd to bring them onboard to develop the technology to power the game and support with the artwork.

Thomas Pasieka - Designer & Technical Artist

Thomas' day-to-day duties not only include project, gameplay and level design, he is also responsible for managing the technical duties for the entire art team! He makes sure that all art meets the original vision and is game-ready. 

Thomas actually creates the level layouts and gameplay mechanics, and builds the scenarios you will play using all of the tools at his disposal to make interesting player experiences. He takes the artwork and makes it 'game-ready'. Thomas generally leads the public face for the project through Facebook and Twitter.

Thomas owns 3D Attack, is a professional 3D Artist and has produced work for Warner Brothers, Disney, Nike, Intel and more.

Björn Hurri - Designer, Art Director & Lead Artist

Björn created the visual style of the game and also animates a majority of the sprites. Together with Thomas his design work focus' on the visual elements of the game. He is responsible for bringing the wonderful world in which our unlikely heroes live in to life!

Outside of the project, Björn works as Lead Artist for one of the gaming industries leading Concept Art and Production studios.  He has done work for many AAA-titles and/or IP's including, Dead Space 2, Bioshock Infinite, Sniper Ghost Warrior 2, Spec Ops: Front Line, Infamous 2, Shadowrun, Total War and many more!

Robert Cummings - Mad Scientist & Developer

Robert is a Director of Simian Squared Ltd, a British developer specializing in unique and visually rich playable games on console, desktop and mobile hardware. He is responsible for building the technology and game play behind The Other Brothers. Known as The Ape, or just Ape, he can be found wandering around England, programming retro awesome for you.

Robert is the Programmer, he builds the code for the entire title from the player's movement 'feel', the tools we use to make gameplay events, the AI, to the render engine and all that is inbetween.

Aside from the underlying technical stuff, he also provides art in the form of code for things like physics toys (conveyors, fans, water), weather effects, camera tools and visual effects (pixel transitions, weather systems, screen burn, overbrightening and more!)

(you can read a little about the project's technology at his dev blog: http://simiansquared.com/category/diary/)

Giuseppe Landolina - Artist

Giuseppe is Creative Director at Simian Squared Ltd. He is responsible for the cinematics on The Other Brothers as well as art and design support. Known as the Chimp, he can be found foraging through England's forests in search of fresh inspiration to fuel his passion; retro & vintage aesthetics and presentation.

Giuseppe's day to day roles include animating the cutscenes, managing the dialog, making custom art for the cutscenes, building the menus and generally supporting Bjorn in the art department. Aside from this he supports Robert with the features and tools and effects for Thomas to use in the levels!

 

 

The Other Brothers is being developed using UNITY and SIMIAN TECH

Unity is a fully integrated development engine that provides rich out of the box functionality to create games and other interactive 3D content.  You use Unity to assemble your art and assets into scenes and environments; add physics; simultaneously play test and edit your game, and when ready, publish to your chosen platforms, such as desktop computers, the Web, iOS, Android, Wii, PS3 and Xbox 360.

The Other Brothers is built upon Simian Squared's proprietary toolset, Simian Tech. It was developed to empower artists, to allow them to focus on what they do best, making games.

The art team on The Other Brothers makes use of Simian Tech's Mode 7, a highly optimized set of rendering and shader technologies in combination with their set of level design tools that allow developers to craft great physics, playability, dynamic events and complex mechanics in an intuitive way.
story_txt:
What is The Other Brothers?
The Other Brothers is an episodic platformer that will have you running, jumping, collecting and racing against the clock in a modern take on that time-tested genre! 
With today's technology we are able to bring back that classic 16-bit aesthetic and combine it with modern mechanics, physics and gameplay to bring you a platforming experience like no other! Pixel art is a beautiful artform that was swept away by the advances in 3D graphics, we're going to bring it back for the new generation and make it better than ever!
We invite you to join Joe and Jim, on their wild and crazy adventure, as they traverse junkyards, cities, sewers and more to track down our damsel in distress, Tavy!
 

 
Why Indiegogo?
Game development is an exciting, fun and enjoyable process, but it's also an expensive one. Being indie developers means that whilst we have the freedom to make unique games without a publisher breathing down our necks, it also means that we're doing this out of our own pockets. Despite the team being made up of talented, industry professionals with many years of experience, this doesn't mean we have all bases covered:
The Indiegogo money will allow us to:

Bring in professional translators
Have a full, original soundtrack and sound effects written and recorded
Purchase hardware for testing (we want to support a wide range of devices, not everyone can afford a top end iPad!)

Purchase additional licenses (we love you Linux users, why should you be left out?) If we gain at least 50 $100 backers  Linux and Ouya* will be prioritized.

Allow us to continue developing this title full-time until completion (work began in January and actual game development started in April!).

           *Ouya release will obviously be dependant on when the console launches.
 

 
Why do we need $50,000?This game has been in development since January - $50,000 may sound like a lot but it is exactly how much it costs to develop a video game like this. Four Unity Licenses with support for 2 devices, android and iOS already come to $20,000, then we have to purchase all of the items mentioned above (and more!) which leaves us with very little for the team to actually survive on! If you divide the remainder into the four members of the team and we come out with less than half a minimum-wage, fast food worker's salary!We want to bring you an awesome music score, real, professional translations and proper hardware testing, these funds aren't for our pleasure- they're to make sure this game is as great as it can possibly be!
 

 
 
PERKS
We don't expect you to give your hard earned money without getting something back.  On the right you will see a list of our "Perks".  They start at a digital copy of The Other Brothers Game for Mac or PC, all the way up to working with our developers to design your very own cut scene.  The best part about the Perks, they're cumulative.  For instance, if you reserve a seat on the Beta Team you get everything that comes before it.  Not bad!  Perks will be fulfilled near December 1, 2012.         
 
OK, so what exactly are you going to do between now and Launch?:

We will of course finish and port the game to as many platforms as possible starting with iOS, Android and Mac/PC and Linux and also Ouya*.
Localise the game, we want to start with Japanese, Spanish, Italian, French and German.
Classic Multiplayer Support (2 people, 1 device).
Various controller support.
An original soundtrack written exclusively for the game along with custom made sound effects.
Great performance on a wider range of devices (hardware testing).
It will allow us to start work on further (FREE) DLC content.
Buying Unity 4 licenses to support Linux, Ouya* and more.
 

 

So who are we and how did this come about?
Well it all began late last year, long-time friends Thomas Pasieka and Bjorn Hurri co-founded and concepted The Other Brothers project together - having worked for AAA companies on other peoples projects for so long, they wanted to do something of their own- something that harked back to the golden era of gaming.Later, they began talks with Robert Cummings and Giuseppe Landolina of Simian Squared Ltd to bring them onboard to develop the technology to power the game and support with the artwork.
Thomas Pasieka - Designer & Technical Artist
Thomas' day-to-day duties not only include project, gameplay and level design, he is also responsible for managing the technical duties for the entire art team! He makes sure that all art meets the original vision and is game-ready. 
Thomas actually creates the level layouts and gameplay mechanics, and builds the scenarios you will play using all of the tools at his disposal to make interesting player experiences. He takes the artwork and makes it 'game-ready'. Thomas generally leads the public face for the project through Facebook and Twitter.
Thomas owns 3D Attack, is a professional 3D Artist and has produced work for Warner Brothers, Disney, Nike, Intel and more.
Björn Hurri - Designer, Art Director & Lead Artist
Björn created the visual style of the game and also animates a majority of the sprites. Together with Thomas his design work focus' on the visual elements of the game. He is responsible for bringing the wonderful world in which our unlikely heroes live in to life!Outside of the project, Björn works as Lead Artist for one of the gaming industries leading Concept Art and Production studios.  He has done work for many AAA-titles and/or IP's including, Dead Space 2, Bioshock Infinite, Sniper Ghost Warrior 2, Spec Ops: Front Line, Infamous 2, Shadowrun, Total War and many more!
Robert Cummings - Mad Scientist & DeveloperRobert is a Director of Simian Squared Ltd, a British developer specializing in unique and visually rich playable games on console, desktop and mobile hardware. He is responsible for building the technology and game play behind The Other Brothers. Known as The Ape, or just Ape, he can be found wandering around England, programming retro awesome for you.
Robert is the Programmer, he builds the code for the entire title from the player's movement 'feel', the tools we use to make gameplay events, the AI, to the render engine and all that is inbetween.
Aside from the underlying technical stuff, he also provides art in the form of code for things like physics toys (conveyors, fans, water), weather effects, camera tools and visual effects (pixel transitions, weather systems, screen burn, overbrightening and more!)(you can read a little about the project's technology at his dev blog: http://simiansquared.com/category/diary/)
Giuseppe Landolina - ArtistGiuseppe is Creative Director at Simian Squared Ltd. He is responsible for the cinematics on The Other Brothers as well as art and design support. Known as the Chimp, he can be found foraging through England's forests in search of fresh inspiration to fuel his passion; retro & vintage aesthetics and presentation.
Giuseppe's day to day roles include animating the cutscenes, managing the dialog, making custom art for the cutscenes, building the menus and generally supporting Bjorn in the art department. Aside from this he supports Robert with the features and tools and effects for Thomas to use in the levels!
 

 


The Other Brothers is being developed using UNITY and SIMIAN TECH
Unity is a fully integrated development engine that provides rich out of the box functionality to create games and other interactive 3D content.  You use Unity to assemble your art and assets into scenes and environments; add physics; simultaneously play test and edit your game, and when ready, publish to your chosen platforms, such as desktop computers, the Web, iOS, Android, Wii, PS3 and Xbox 360.
The Other Brothers is built upon Simian Squared's proprietary toolset, Simian Tech. It was developed to empower artists, to allow them to focus on what they do best, making games.
The art team on The Other Brothers makes use of Simian Tech's Mode 7, a highly optimized set of rendering and shader technologies in combination with their set of level design tools that allow developers to craft great physics, playability, dynamic events and complex mechanics in an intuitive way.

story:
About myself and the game

Hi, my name is Julien Dupuis and I'm a student at Isart Digital Montreal in game design. I've been working my solo indie game Deuce for the past few years now and I'm eager to continue developing games that will revolutionize the industry.

DEMO is being updated

Deuce is a special type of RPG where you - the player - go through a profound narrative experience where the two main characters lose parts of their humanity along the way while discovering the characters' unique playstyles while also forming bonds with the witty and charming characters' duality, you will soon find that the protagonists have a strong dynamic. Explore the intricacies of humanity in this light-hearted approach at philosophy through gaming.​

This RPG/RogueLite will focus heavily on replayability where the player will have multiple ways of playing the game to their liking. ​

The first option, the classical mode where the player chooses to attack the incoming enemies will be lead by Adria. The second, a powerful geomancer named Zaakir decides his powers can best be used to evade confrontation and thus will play as a pacifist. Each gameplay style can be swapped at the press of a button and different styles will earn you morality points which will influence your gameplay experience.

Financial Objective

As a contributor, your donations can go a very long way. Here's how your support will help push the game further:

  • With 5,000$ CAD, I will be able to cut out my part time work to spend most of my time developing Deuce without distractions, thus accelerating the progress of the game and ensuring a higher quality product. This amount is an accurate representation of how much I will need to obtain in order to pay for external work such as artistic commissions (audio, graphic, etc.) in addition to my own living expenses for about a year. IndieGoGo also takes a cut from the profit I make and I must also repay the artists who have helped me so far.

However, it is possible that I will obtain more than the required amount of funding and I fully intend to give my supporters as much bang for their buck! Here is a list of what I will do with extra support from the community:

  • $5,000 - Full game release. 
  • $7,500 - Extra enemies and types. 
  • $10,000 - Different tile/map types (Hexagonal, octogonal, triangular). 
  • $15,000 - Ports to consoles. 
  • $20,000 - Extra bosses with original sound tracks. 
  • $30,000 - I'll hire extra artists for a higher quality product and quicker development. 
  • $40,000 - Unlockable Co-op mode!
  • $50,000 - Difficulty levels!

Risks & Challenges

Although I am a "solo-developer" I do intend on hiring additional help with the audio and visuals, but finding the right help isn't always easy. It's difficult to say how much help I will need with the project considering that the size and scope will change depending on the StrechGoal we hit.

Additionally, completing an entire game might seem like an impossible task for a "solo" developer, especially a student at that!

Fortunately, I'm surrounded by talented and helpful expert developers and teachers at Isart Digital! I'm never more than a few steps away from feedback and technical expertise in both design and programming. On top of all that, I study in a format that allows me to take 1 week off every second week for personal growth and development in the industry for the entire school year, which means I can dedicate myself to the development of Deuce.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

My campaign will be shared by myself on Facebook and LinkedIn. But since I don't have a Twitter account, I'm counting on you guys to help me get the word out there about Deuce!

Reddit and Discord servers are also a great idea to spread the love!

Get in contact with me!

I absolutely Love to hear your feedback! And I'm always open to suggestions and ideas to improve!

Make sure to message me on my socials:

https://www.linkedin.com/in/julien-dupuis-1b537...

https://www.facebook.com/julien.dupuis.731135/

juliendupuis180@hotmail.ca

Don't be shy! I want to know what people think!

story:
Whats happened so far!

  • Hi! we are Curtis and Cindy Lusk and we are the owners / managers of Paladins Game Castle and PGC Games and Events here in Bakersfield California. We have been involved in the hobby game industry since 2003.
    We have really enjoyed serving gamers and running events for many years in the Bakersfield area.
    As many of you know a couple of years ago we decided to move from our previous location when the lease came up to a much smaller warehouse/retail location and focus and build up our aftermarket single card and miniature business online.
    Because of this we were forced to run our events in offsite locations such as local hotels or halls or pizza places and also in conjunction with other retail game stores in town.
    We moved to this much smaller location because frankly, the costs of running a retail location can be very daunting and was on the rise each year.
    Our hope was that we could catch up, and eventually find a location that could better serve the needs of our customers.
    We believe we have found just such a location! 
    We have had numerous calls, messages and personal visits from customers and friends about finding a location and helping with making it happen and now is the time!
    We have funding to get started in the location but with your help     we can truly make this a special place to better serve you!

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funding we are asking for will go towards....
  • Upgrading and expanding our tables and chairs including putting in some tables specifically for miniatures games. The chairs will be better quality then we have had in the past so will break less often.
  • For additional lighting to brighten up the main tournament area.
  • For additional product stocking
  • For other enhancements to our product and tournament area including screens for tournament pairings, movies, and product showcasing.
  • We are offering for your support some really cool exclusive backer items including dice bags, T-shirts, playmats, messenger bags, discounts, free tournament entries, special parties and events just for backers and more!
  • If we are not able to fund the entire amount we will thankfully do our best to first enhance the tables and chairs.
  • If we are able to raise funds beyond the amount asked we will have a really special party for all backers!

The Impact

This campaign is important so that we can provide a really special experience for you! We want this to be a place that we can all feel proud of and feel that we all made it happen together!
A welcoming place where everyone can play, socialize and relax!
And.....I may be going out on limb here.....but if this happens its possible all your wildest dreams will come true!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute monetarily its okay!
Help us get the word out about the crowdfunding project and be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools!
And when we open the doors tell everyone you know!

story:
Hail Commander!, 

COLONIAL SPACE WARS : FLESH AND STEEL is a crowdfunding created with the objective of making the expansion of the acclaimed  sci-fi board game "Colonial Space Wars: New Horizons". This project is developed by Vedra Games, an Spanish game publisher and organizer of gaming events. 

In COLONIAL SPACE WARS the action takes place in a future science fiction universe. Each player take the role of one Commander, leading his army and challenging others in a desperate massive ground battle. Only a leader that excels in strategic planning, military tactics and resource management will prevail. The future of the universe ruled by men is in your hands!. 


COLONIAL SPACE WARS : NEW HORIZONS was released as a starter box in English and Spanish. It includes a rulebook with 56 full color pages, a portable game board with two different battlegrounds, 50 tokens on laminated cardboard as units, and 10 markers. 

This compact format is suitable for casual gaming with a duration of 30-60 min, but it also allows bigger battles with up to eight armies when combining two or more boxes. Game mechanics combine chess with classic wargames, with the particularity of being played without dice. Based in resource management, tactics and strategy, COLONIAL SPACE WARS is easy to learn but hard to master.

The rulebook of COLONIAL SPACE WARS : NEW HORIZONS  is available for free download here:

COLONIAL SPACE WARS: NEW HORIZONS (ENGLISH)

Now, thanks to your support, it is possible to take a new step in COLONIAL SPACE WARS history. With  FLESH AND STEEL we can expand the options and possibilities of this stunning wargame. To achieve this goal, the campaign is divided in two parts:



SECOND WAVE TERRA REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTS
SECOND WAVE CENTAURI REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTS
SECOND WAVE HEIMDALL REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTS
SECOND WAVE ASCARYAN REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTS

THIRD WAVE TERRA REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTS
THIRD WAVE CENTAURI REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTS
THIRD WAVE HEIMDALL REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTS
THIRD WAVE ASCARYAN REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTS

FLESH AND STEEL MODULAR GAME BOARD SET UP

3D simulation of FLESH AND STEEL components

Example of TERRAN HUNTER, a resin model designed for FLESH AND STEEL (Painting by Antonio "Tono" Rodriguez)

Thanks to the contribution of potential backers during this campaign, we want to achieve the funding to publish a first edition of the expansion, which would give many game lovers worldwide access to this interesting and fun board game.This project is not only important because it will expand the universe of COLONIAL SPACE WARS, but also because it offers new and unique rewards that will only be available during the campaign.

To learn more about CSW: FLESH AND STEEL, visit this blog:

http://gamerandcommander.blogspot.com.es

And do not hesitate... your men are waiting for orders, Commander!.

Vedra Games invested an important budget in order to pay previous costs for this project (author rights, payments to illustrators, sculptors and editor). Therefore the total funding received from this campaign only will pay the board game production costs: brute (printing, components and handling) and shipping. Only for the basic goal, we will require 1800€ for the production of 500 copies of CSW: FLESH AND STEEL, the board game expansion. An additional 200€ budget in terms of commissions for the companies that manage the bank account transactions.

In addition to this, the secondary goals are alternative proposals that could improve even more the quality and quantity of game components for our backers. For example, if the funding reached values between 3500€-10000€, it would unlock a bonus that allows production of resin/metal models or the printing of an advanced rulebook.

Vedra Games, the company involved in this project, has edited successfully CSW: NEW HORIZONS in the past. For this reason, our capacity to professionally and efficiently manage a project like this is guaranteed. This campaign will as well expand their reach to potential clients and reinforce the trust of their current customers.

To fulfill the challenge of the multidisciplinary working areas of this project (terrain, traditional sculpting, 3D printing and model production) , other specialist companies has been involved as a partnership:

WEBSITE ENCOBERTURA

WEB RESINLAB MODELS

WEB XAN MINIATURES

During these past years all of them offered excellent services in their own areas. Thank to this, Vedra Games has created a deluxe networking partnership that guarantees superior quality products.

The COLONIAL SPACE WARS FLESH AND STEEL campaign will last 21 days. During this period, backers are invited to join by  pledging with different perks knowing as Commander Ranks (see section below). Each perk will require the compromise of investing a certain amount of money; the higher is this level, the greater amount of additional Tactical Resources (rewards) to choose from.

In any case, backers should remember that no charges would be applied in case the minimum required was not reached.


The Commander Ranks available are the following:




The Tactical Resources are exclusive rewards you can select, up to a limit established by the Commander Rank you apply for (See Commander Ranks above).



We would be grateful if those who cannot support us with funds could help by spreading the word to the community of players. If you want to know more about COLONIAL SPACE WARS FLESH AND STEEL or you need to contact us, the following links are available at your disposal:

Email: contact@vedragames.com 

Website: http://www.vedragames.com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Vedra-Games/287049964711127

Twitter: https://twitter.com/VedraGames

Blog: http://gamerandcommander.blogspot.com.es/


Website: http://africamir.wordpress.com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/africamirart?ref=hl




¡Salve Comandante!, 

COLONIAL SPACE WARS : FLESH AND STEEL es un crowdfunding creado con el objetivo de producir la expansión del aclamado juego de tablero futurista  "Colonial Space Wars: New Horizons". Este proyecto es una iniciativa deVedra Games, empresa española dedicada a la edición de juegos y organización de eventos relacionados. 

En COLONIAL SPACE WARS  la acción tiene lugar en un universo futurista de ciencia ficción. Cada jugador adopta el rol de un Comandante, dirigiendo su ejército y desafiando a otros en deseperadas batallas terrestres a escala masiva. Sólo aquel líder que sobresalga por su planificación estratégica, tácticas militares y gestión de recursos logrará imponerse. ¡El futuro del universo gobernado por el hombre está en tus manos!.  


COLONIAL SPACE WARS : NEW HORIZONS fue publicado como caja de iniciación en Inglés y Español. Incluye un manual de  56 páginas a todo color, un tablero plegable a doble cara, 50 piezas de cartón como unidades y 10 marcadores.

Este formato compacto es ideal para un juego casual de 30-60 minutos de duración, pero también permite mayores batallas de hasta ocho bandos cuando se combinan dos o más cajas. La mecánica combina elementos del ajedrez con wargames clásicos, sin emplear dados. COLONIAL SPACE WARS está basado en la gestión de recurso, táctica y estrategia, resultando muy fácil de aprender pero complejo de dominar.

El reglamento de COLONIAL SPACE WARS : NEW HORIZONS  está disponible para su descarga gratuita aquí:

COLONIAL SPACE WARS: NEW HORIZONS (ESPAÑOL)

Ahora, gracias a tu apoyo, es posible dar un nuevo paso en la historia de COLONIAL SPACE WARS. Con FLESH AND STEEL podemos ampliar las opciones y posibilidades de este sorprendente wargame. Para lograr este objetivo, la campaña se ha dividido en dos partes:

VER CONTENIDOS BOLSA SEGUNDA OLEADA REFUERZOS TERRA
VER CONTENIDOS BOLSA SEGUNDA OLEADA REFUERZOS CENTAURI
VER CONTENIDOS BOLSA SEGUNDA OLEADA REFUERZOS HEIMDALL
VER CONTENIDOS BOLSA SEGUNDA OLEADA REFUERZOS ASCARYAN

VER CONTENIDOS BOLSA TERCERA OLEADA REFUERZOS TERRA
VER CONTENIDOS BOLSA TERCERA OLEADA REFUERZOS CENTAURI
VER CONTENIDOS BOLSA TERCERA OLEADA REFUERZOS HEIMDALL
VER CONTENIDOS BOLSA TERCERA OLEADA REFUERZOS ASCARYAN

VER MONTAJE TABLERO MODULAR FLESH AND STEEL

Simulación 3D  de los componentes de la expansión FLESH AND STEEL


Ejemplo de CAZADOR de TERRA, modelo en resina diseñado para FLESH AND STEEL (Modelo pintado por Antonio "Tono" Rodriguez)

Gracias a la contribución de los potenciales mecenas durante esta campaña, queremos lograr la financiación suficiente para publicar la primera edición de esta expansión, la cual dará acceso a muchos jugadores de todo el mundo a este interesante y divertido juego de tablero. Este proyecto no sólo es importante porque ampliará el universo de COLONIAL SPACE WARS, sino porque ofrecerá recompensas únicas que sólo estarán disponibles durante la campaña.

Para aprender más sobre CSW: FLESH AND STEEL, está disponible el blog:

http://gamerandcommander.blogspot.com.es

Y no dudeis... ¡vuestros hombres aguardan órdenes, Comandante!.

Vedra Games ha invertido un fondo importante para costear los gastos previos de este proyecto (derechos de autor, pago a ilustradores, escultores y editores). Por lo tanto la totalidad de la financiación obtenida de esta campaña únicamente será invertida en pagar los costes de producción del juego de tablero: básicos (impresión, materiales y manipulación) y gastos de envío. Únicamente para el objetivo básico, se necesitan 1800€ para producir 500 copias de CSW: FLESH AND STEEL, la expansión del juego de tablero. Un fondo adicional de 200€ será destinado al pago de comisiones para la plataforma de mecenazgo y las transacciones bancarias.

Además de este, se han propuesto objetivos secundarios que podrían aumentar la calidad y cantidad de los componentes del juego para nuestros mecenas. Por ejemplo, si la financiación alcanzara cantidades entre 3500€-10000€, se desbloquearía un nivel para la producción de miniaturas o la impresión de un libro de reglamento más completo.

Vedra Games, la compañía involucrada en este proyecto, ya publicó con éxito COLONIAL SPACE WARS: NEW HORIZONS en el pasado. Por esta razón, su capacidad para realizar eficaz y profesionalmente un proyecto de estas características está garantizado. Esta campaña servirá también para ampliar el número de sus potenciales clientes y mejorar aún más la confianza de los actuales, lo que enriquecerá a la comunidad de jugadores de COLONIAL SPACE WARS. 

Para responder al reto que suponen las areas de trabajo multidisciplinar de este proyecto (escenografía de terreno, escultura tradicional, impresión en 3D y producción de miniaturas), se ha creado una red de trabajo con otras empresas especialistas:

PÁGINA WEB ENCOBERTURA

PÁGINA WEB RESINLAB MODELS

PÁGINA WEB XAN MINIATURES

Durante estos últimos años todas ellas han ofrecido unos servicios de calidad excepcional en sus respectivas áreas. Gracias a ello, durante esta nueva "aventura" en el mundo de las miniaturas, Vedra Games contará con unos colaboradores de lujo que asegurarán cumplir unos excelentes niveles de calidad en sus productos.

La campaña de COLONIAL SPACE WARS FLESH AND STEEL durará 21 días. Durante este período, los mecenas están invitados a unirse a ella solicitando alguno de los diferentes niveles, denominados Rangos de Comandante (ver sección siguiente). Cada nivel requiere del compromiso de invertir una cierta cantidad de dinero; cuanto mayor sea este nivel, mayor será la cantidad de Recursos Tácticos (recompensas) que poder elegir.

En cualquier caso, los mecenas deben recordar que no se cobrará ninguna cantidad de dinero en caso de que el mínimo de la campaña no sea alcanzado.



Los Rangos de Comandante disponibles son los siguientes:



Los Recursos Tácticos son recompensas exclusivas que pueden seleccionar los mecenas, hasta un máximo establecido por el Rango de Comandante que se haya solicitado (Ver Rangos de Comandante arriba).




Y por supuesto no sólo nuestros mecenas pueden ser muy valiosos para lograr este proyecto. También os estaremos muy agradecidos a aquellos que no podais apoyar esta campaña con fondos pero que podais ayudar compartiendo la noticia entre la comunidad de jugadores. Si quieres saber más sobre COLONIAL SPACE WARS FLESH AND STEEL o necesitas contactar con nosotros, tienes disponibles los siguientes links a tu disposición:

Email: contact@vedragames.com

Website: http://www.vedragames.com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Vedra-Games/287049964711127

Twitter: https://twitter.com/VedraGames

Blog: http://gamerandcommander.blogspot.com.es/



Website: http://africamir.wordpress.com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/africamirart?ref=hl
story_txt:
Hail Commander!,  COLONIAL SPACE WARS : FLESH AND STEEL is a crowdfunding created with the objective of making the expansion of the acclaimed  sci-fi board game "Colonial Space Wars: New Horizons". This project is developed by Vedra Games, an Spanish game publisher and organizer of gaming events. In COLONIAL SPACE WARS the action takes place in a future science fiction universe. Each player take the role of one Commander, leading his army and 
challenging others 
in a desperate massive ground battle. Only a leader that excels in strategic 
planning, military tactics and resource management will prevail. The 
future of the universe ruled by men is in your hands!.  COLONIAL SPACE WARS : NEW HORIZONS was released as a starter box in English and Spanish. It includes a rulebook with 56 full color pages, a portable game board 
with two different battlegrounds, 50 tokens on laminated cardboard as 
units, and 10 markers. This compact format is suitable for casual gaming with a duration of 
30-60 min, but it also allows bigger battles with up to eight armies 
when combining two or more boxes. Game  mechanics combine chess with 
classic wargames, with the particularity 
of being played without dice. Based in resource management, tactics and 
strategy, COLONIAL SPACE WARS is easy to learn but hard to master. The rulebook of COLONIAL SPACE WARS : NEW HORIZONS  is available for free download here:COLONIAL SPACE WARS: NEW HORIZONS (ENGLISH)Now, thanks to your support, it is possible to take a new step in COLONIAL SPACE WARS history. With  FLESH AND STEEL
 we can expand the options and possibilities of this stunning wargame. 
To achieve this goal, the campaign is divided in two parts:
SECOND WAVE TERRA REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTSSECOND WAVE CENTAURI REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTSSECOND WAVE HEIMDALL REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTSSECOND WAVE ASCARYAN REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTSTHIRD WAVE TERRA REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTSTHIRD WAVE CENTAURI REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTSTHIRD WAVE HEIMDALL REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTSTHIRD WAVE ASCARYAN REINFORCEMENTS CONTENTSFLESH AND STEEL MODULAR GAME BOARD SET UP3D simulation of FLESH AND STEEL componentsExample of TERRAN HUNTER, a resin model designed for FLESH AND STEEL (Painting by Antonio "Tono" Rodriguez)Thanks to the
 contribution of potential backers during this campaign, we want to 
achieve the funding to publish a first edition of the expansion, which 
would give many game lovers worldwide access to this interesting and fun
 board game.This project is not only important because it will expand the universe of COLONIAL SPACE WARS, but also 
because it offers new and unique rewards that will only be available 
during the campaign.To learn more about CSW: FLESH AND STEEL, visit this blog:http://gamerandcommander.blogspot.com.esAnd do not hesitate... your men are waiting for orders, Commander!.Vedra Games invested an important budget in order to pay previous costs for this project (author rights, 
payments to illustrators, sculptors and editor). Therefore the
 total funding received from this campaign only will pay the board game production costs: brute 
(printing, components and handling) and shipping. Only for the basic goal, we will require 1800€ 
for the production of 500 copies of CSW: FLESH AND STEEL, the board
 game expansion. An additional 200€ budget in terms of commissions for the 
companies that manage the bank account transactions.In
 addition to this, the secondary goals are alternative proposals that could improve even more the 
quality and quantity of game components for our backers. For example, if the funding 
reached values between 3500€-10000€, it would unlock a bonus that allows production of resin/metal models or the printing of an advanced rulebook. Vedra Games, the company involved in this project, 
has edited successfully CSW: NEW HORIZONS in the 
past. For this reason, our capacity to professionally and efficiently 
manage a project like this is guaranteed. This campaign will as well 
expand their reach to potential clients and reinforce the trust of their
 current customers.To fulfill the challenge of the multidisciplinary working areas of this project (terrain, traditional sculpting, 3D printing and model production) , other specialist companies has been involved as a partnership: WEBSITE ENCOBERTURA WEB RESINLAB MODELSWEB XAN MINIATURESDuring these past years all of them offered excellent services in their own areas. Thank to this, Vedra Games has created a deluxe networking partnership that guarantees superior quality products. The COLONIAL SPACE WARS FLESH AND STEEL campaign will last 21 days. During this period, backers are invited to join by  pledging with different perks knowing as Commander Ranks (see section below). Each perk will require the compromise of
investing a certain amount of money; the higher is this level, the greater
amount of additional Tactical Resources (rewards) to choose from.In any case, backers should remember that no charges would be applied in case the minimum required 
was not reached.The Commander Ranks available are the following:The Tactical Resources are exclusive rewards you can select, up to a limit established by the Commander Rank you apply for (See Commander Ranks above).We
 would be grateful if those who cannot support us with funds could help 
by spreading the word to the community of players. If you want to know 
more about COLONIAL SPACE WARS FLESH AND STEEL or you need to contact us, the following links are available at your disposal:Email: contact@vedragames.com Website: http://www.vedragames.com/Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Vedra-Games/287049964711127Twitter: https://twitter.com/VedraGamesBlog: http://gamerandcommander.blogspot.com.es/Website: http://africamir.wordpress.com/Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/africamirart?ref=hl¡Salve Comandante!,  COLONIAL SPACE WARS : FLESH AND STEEL es un crowdfunding creado con el objetivo de producir la expansión del aclamado juego de tablero futurista  "Colonial Space Wars: New Horizons". Este proyecto es una iniciativa deVedra Games, empresa española dedicada a la edición de juegos y organización de eventos relacionados. En COLONIAL SPACE WARS 
 la acción tiene lugar en un universo futurista de ciencia ficción. Cada jugador adopta el rol de un Comandante, dirigiendo su ejército y desafiando a otros en deseperadas batallas terrestres a escala masiva. Sólo aquel líder que sobresalga por su planificación estratégica, tácticas militares y gestión de recursos logrará imponerse. ¡El futuro del universo gobernado por el hombre está en tus manos!.  COLONIAL SPACE WARS : NEW HORIZONS fue publicado como caja de iniciación en Inglés y Español. Incluye un manual de  56 páginas a todo color, un tablero plegable a doble cara, 50 piezas de cartón como unidades y 10 marcadores.Este formato compacto es ideal para un juego casual de 30-60 minutos de 
duración, pero también permite mayores batallas de hasta ocho bandos 
cuando se combinan dos o más cajas. La mecánica combina elementos del 
ajedrez con wargames clásicos, sin emplear dados. COLONIAL SPACE WARS está basado en la gestión de recurso, táctica y estrategia, resultando muy fácil de aprender pero complejo de dominar.El reglamento de COLONIAL SPACE WARS : NEW HORIZONS  está disponible para su descarga gratuita aquí:COLONIAL SPACE WARS: NEW HORIZONS (ESPAÑOL)Ahora, gracias a tu apoyo, es posible dar un nuevo paso en la historia de COLONIAL SPACE WARS. Con FLESH AND STEEL
 podemos ampliar las opciones y posibilidades de este sorprendente wargame. 
Para lograr este objetivo, la campaña se ha dividido en dos partes:VER CONTENIDOS BOLSA SEGUNDA OLEADA REFUERZOS TERRAVER CONTENIDOS BOLSA SEGUNDA OLEADA REFUERZOS CENTAURIVER CONTENIDOS BOLSA SEGUNDA OLEADA REFUERZOS HEIMDALLVER CONTENIDOS BOLSA SEGUNDA OLEADA REFUERZOS ASCARYANVER CONTENIDOS BOLSA TERCERA OLEADA REFUERZOS TERRA VER CONTENIDOS BOLSA TERCERA OLEADA REFUERZOS CENTAURI VER CONTENIDOS BOLSA TERCERA OLEADA REFUERZOS HEIMDALL VER CONTENIDOS BOLSA TERCERA OLEADA REFUERZOS ASCARYANVER MONTAJE TABLERO MODULAR FLESH AND STEELSimulación 3D  de los componentes de la expansión FLESH AND STEELEjemplo de CAZADOR de TERRA, modelo en resina diseñado para FLESH AND STEEL (Modelo pintado por Antonio "Tono" Rodriguez)Gracias
 a la contribución de los potenciales mecenas durante esta campaña, 
queremos lograr la financiación suficiente para publicar la primera 
edición de esta expansión, la cual dará acceso a muchos jugadores de 
todo el mundo a este interesante y divertido juego de tablero. Este 
proyecto no sólo es importante porque ampliará el universo de COLONIAL SPACE WARS, sino porque ofrecerá recompensas únicas que sólo estarán disponibles durante la campaña.Para aprender más sobre CSW: FLESH AND STEEL, está disponible el blog:http://gamerandcommander.blogspot.com.esY no dudeis... ¡vuestros hombres aguardan órdenes, Comandante!.Vedra Games ha invertido un fondo importante para costear los gastos previos de este proyecto (derechos de autor, pago a ilustradores, escultores y editores). Por lo tanto la totalidad de la financiación obtenida de esta campaña únicamente será invertida en pagar los costes de producción del juego de tablero: básicos 
(impresión, materiales y manipulación) y gastos de envío. Únicamente para el objetivo básico, se necesitan 1800€ 
para producir 500 copias de CSW: FLESH AND STEEL, la expansión del juego de tablero. Un fondo adicional de 200€ será destinado al pago de comisiones para la plataforma de mecenazgo y las transacciones bancarias. Además de este, se han propuesto objetivos secundarios que podrían aumentar la calidad y cantidad de los componentes del juego para nuestros mecenas. Por ejemplo, si la financiación alcanzara cantidades entre 3500€-10000€, se desbloquearía un nivel para la producción de miniaturas o la impresión de un libro de reglamento más completo. Vedra Games, la compañía involucrada en este proyecto, 
ya publicó con éxito COLONIAL SPACE WARS: NEW HORIZONS en el pasado. Por esta razón, su capacidad para realizar eficaz y profesionalmente un proyecto de estas características está garantizado. Esta campaña servirá también para ampliar el número de sus potenciales clientes y mejorar aún más la confianza de los actuales, lo que enriquecerá a la comunidad de jugadores de COLONIAL SPACE WARS.  Para responder al reto que suponen las areas de trabajo multidisciplinar de este proyecto (escenografía de terreno, escultura tradicional, impresión en 3D y producción de miniaturas), se ha creado una red de trabajo con otras empresas especialistas: PÁGINA WEB ENCOBERTURA PÁGINA WEB RESINLAB MODELSPÁGINA WEB XAN MINIATURESDurante estos últimos años todas ellas han ofrecido unos servicios de 
calidad excepcional en sus respectivas áreas. Gracias a ello, durante 
esta nueva "aventura" en el mundo de las miniaturas, Vedra Games contará con unos colaboradores de lujo que asegurarán cumplir unos excelentes niveles de calidad en sus productos. La campaña de COLONIAL SPACE WARS FLESH AND STEEL durará 21 días. Durante este período, los mecenas están invitados a unirse a ella solicitando alguno de los diferentes niveles, denominados Rangos de Comandante (ver sección siguiente). Cada nivel requiere del compromiso de invertir una cierta cantidad de dinero; cuanto mayor sea este nivel, mayor será la cantidad de Recursos Tácticos (recompensas) que poder elegir.En cualquier caso, los mecenas deben recordar que no se cobrará ninguna cantidad de dinero en caso de que el mínimo de la campaña no sea alcanzado.Los Rangos de Comandante disponibles son los siguientes:Los Recursos Tácticos son recompensas exclusivas que pueden seleccionar los mecenas, hasta un máximo establecido por el Rango de Comandante que se haya solicitado (Ver Rangos de Comandante arriba).Y por supuesto no sólo nuestros mecenas pueden ser muy valiosos para lograr este proyecto. También os estaremos muy agradecidos a aquellos que no podais apoyar esta campaña con fondos pero que podais ayudar compartiendo la noticia entre la comunidad de jugadores.
