story:
Our Story

My wife and I have homeschooled our four kids (college, high, middle, & elementary ages) since 1999.  Over the years, I've come across many different curriculums available for Christian-based character education.  Frankly...


I have been underwhelmed with what I’ve found. 


Most resources seem to have arbitrary approaches, simplistic presentations, and incomplete lists of virtues.  So far, I’ve been unable to find one that makes learning about virtues and character traits informative, systematic, and fun for all members of the family.


The Idea

Encouraged by my family, for the last 5 years I’ve been working on my own approach to teaching virtues.  Using all the information I could find through as many sources as possible, I was able to come up with a comprehensive list of 52 virtues.  Then through experimentation, inspiration, and prayer, categorize and organize them into a structured system that makes learning and remembering them easier. Best of all...


It works perfectly as a card-based game, making learning virtues fun. 


It allows for playing any existing standard 52-card game with the Virtue Cards to expose the players to the concepts of the virtues.  In addition, it allows for all kinds of games that are specifically designed to be played with the cards and teach the players about the virtues.  Ultimately I hope to have many different games, themes, add-ons, and extensions.


What We Need

Desiring to share with others, I have researched what it takes to get a published game on the shelves…and it’s a more daunting task than one would think!  Start up costs for initial print runs are extremely high and selling the game to an established company means I would have to surrender creative control and potentially dilute the Christ-centeredness of the game. So...


I’ve decided to take a self-publishing route to produce the game. 


Thankfully, new technology has made print-on-demand easier and more affordable than ever before.  Even so, there is still a steep initial investment.  I am using this website as a way to sort of  “pre-sell” the game to a select few who want to be part of the birth and growth of this great idea.  This will let me save on costs and "prime the pump" for continued improvements of art, design, and marketing.(please see the Gallery tab above for some ideas)


What You Get

I really believe in the vision of this endeavor, and have big plans for the future of Virtue Cards.  But I need to know if there are people who are interested in this project and who are willing to get in early and help me reach the goal of a mass produced, widely available game.


To reward those who contribute to the launch of Virtue Cards, I am offering a few perks. 


Everyone who contributes to the game at the $20 perk level will receive a copy of the game.  This is a professionally printed, complete, and fully playable version of the game as implemented through The Game Crafters website.  In addition, for contributions at higher perk levels, I’m including additional copies of the game as well as various extras such as hand-signed thank you cards and one-of-a-kind prototype cards (who knows, someday they might be worth something!).  Also, all perk levels will receive early, exclusive access to the next version of the game.


Other Ways You Can Help

Since this is a Christian themed game and an endeavor to provide a tool for families to teach virtues and build character in their children (see Phil 4:8), the most important thing you can do is pray for God’s blessing on the project.


Additionally, you can help by getting the word out!


This may not be something that you are interested in, or you may not have the resources to contribute at this time….however this may appeal to someone you know and love.  Please forward the information for this website to anyone you feel might be interested (you can use the buttons above to make it easier).


Thank You!

 

How These Funds Will Be Used

I will be using the funds raised for the following:

  • $3000 – 200 printed/shipped copies of the game
  • $500 – Operations
  • $1000 – Artwork/Development for next version
  • $500 – Logo/Marketing

Please note that funds will be disbursed even if goal is not reached.  Contributors will receive game copies regardless of final raised amount.
story_txt:
Our Story
My wife and I have homeschooled our
four kids (college, high, middle, & elementary ages) since 1999.  Over the years, I've come across many different curriculums available for Christian-based
character education.  Frankly...
I have been underwhelmed with
what I’ve found.  
Most resources seem to have arbitrary
approaches, simplistic presentations, and incomplete lists of virtues.  So far, I’ve been unable to find one that
makes learning about virtues and character traits informative, systematic, and
fun for all members of the family.
The
Idea
Encouraged by my family,
for the last 5 years I’ve been working on my own approach to teaching
virtues.  Using all the information I
could find through as many sources as possible, I was able to come up with a comprehensive
list of 52 virtues.  Then through experimentation,
inspiration, and prayer, categorize and organize them into a structured system
that makes learning and remembering them easier. Best of all...
It works
perfectly as a card-based game, making learning virtues fun.  
It allows for playing any existing standard
52-card game with the Virtue Cards to expose the players to the concepts of the
virtues.  In addition, it allows for all
kinds of games that are specifically designed to be played with the cards and
teach the players about the virtues. 
Ultimately I hope to have many different games, themes, add-ons, and
extensions. 
What We Need
Desiring to share with
others, I have researched what it takes to get a published game on the shelves…and
it’s a more daunting task than one would think! 
Start up costs for initial print runs are extremely high and selling the
game to an established company means I would have to surrender creative
control and potentially dilute the Christ-centeredness of the game. So...
I’ve decided to take a
self-publishing route to produce the game.  
Thankfully, new technology has made print-on-demand
easier and more affordable than ever before.  Even so, there is still a steep initial investment.  I am using this website as a way to sort of  “pre-sell” the game to a select few who want
to be part of the birth and growth of this great idea.  This will let me save on costs and "prime the pump" for continued improvements of art, design, and marketing.(please see the Gallery tab above for some ideas)
What You Get
I really believe in the vision of
this endeavor, and have big plans for the future of Virtue Cards.  But I need to know if there are people who
are interested in this project and who are willing to get in early and help me reach
the goal of a mass produced, widely available game.
To reward those who contribute to
the launch of Virtue Cards, I am offering a few perks.  
Everyone who contributes to the game
at the $20 perk level will receive a copy of the game.  This is a professionally printed, complete,
and fully playable version of the game as implemented through The Game Crafters website.  In addition,
for contributions at higher perk levels, I’m including additional copies of the game as well as various extras such as
hand-signed thank you cards and one-of-a-kind
prototype cards (who knows, someday they might be worth something!).  Also, all perk levels will receive early, exclusive access to the next version of the game.
Other
Ways You Can Help
Since this is a Christian themed game and an endeavor
to provide a tool for families to teach virtues and build character in their
children (see Phil 4:8), the most important thing you can do is pray for God’s blessing on the project.
Additionally, you can help by getting
the word out!
This may not be something that you
are interested in, or you may not have the resources to contribute at this time….however
this may appeal to someone you know and love. 
Please forward the information for this website to anyone you feel might
be interested (you can use the buttons above to make it easier).Thank You!
 



How These Funds Will Be Used


I will be using the funds raised for the following:

$3000 – 200 printed/shipped copies of the game

$500 – Operations
$1000 – Artwork/Development for next version
$500 – Logo/Marketing

Please note that funds will be disbursed even if goal is not reached.  Contributors will receive game copies regardless of final raised amount.

story:
Wallie is a rabbit, whose biggest dream is to explore the space. For this he has to build a rocket; however, many obstacles cross his path to the space and not everybody want Wallie to be the first rabbit to accomplish this.

In this massive distance game, the player takes a role as the commander who has to accompany Wallie. For this he has to help build the rocket, navigate through the atmosphere and make right decisions.

Wallie to Space would be an enormous distance game not only among distance games made for mobile platforms, but it would aim for the spot of the best distance game ever!

Distance game is a game, where the objective is to get as far as possible in a single round. This means you have to raise your funds, either by collecting treasure, reaching achievements, completing quests, eliminating enemies etc., to upgrade your ride, which in this case is a rocket. Wallie to Space will feature upgrading not only your ride, but also the driver, who would be Wallie himself, and the entire world he is flying in. Perhaps you know games like "Learn To Fly" or "Shopping Cart Hero". I am trying to take distance games further in every aspect. Many new features, way longer gameplay, constant updates, exclusive content and what is more - you would not have to travel alone, not anymore. A huge interactive environment featuring online competitions, collectibles market, tournaments and much more will be accessible, therefore you are always connected to your friends and other people around the world.

 

The whole idea behind flying to the space is to cover the whole Solar System. Whether to cross the barrier of gravitation, land on the mysterious Moon, feel the eternal power of Mars or discover a place never seen before would be up to a player. This would offer an immensely long gameplay along with a constant joy of discovery.

  • CROSS PLATFORM - play with your friends from other mobile platforms including Android, iOS and Windows Phone 8!

  • DOZENS OF FULL LENGTH MAPS in the unique open space system!

  • THOUSANDS OF UPGRADES; upgradable would be the rocket, the driver and every single map!

  • UNIQUE EVOLUTION SYSTEM - upgrading is not only a feature, but a part of the whole system. You can unlock new special abilities for your rocket, every of which requires skill to be used effectively. This capacitates a multidimensional upgrade system.

  • INTERACTIVE ENVIRONMENT - compete against your friends, share your achievements, trade rare collectibles!

  • EVENTFUL QUEST SYSTEM - every quest will be unique in its own way.

  • TROPHIES SYSTEM - find different collectibles, from antique ones to the memoirs of your most important victories!

  • OPEN DEVELOPMENT SYSTEM - players are involved in the project developing, take your chance to be a part of this truly epic mobile game!

          STAY IN TUNE FOR UPCOMING FEATURES!

However, this is relatively expensive. Everything from concept to delivery takes money.

 

Contribution distribution: (everything is thoroughly calculated)

  $1,500 - Preparations (to ensure security and proper backup system)

$31,000 - Code Engine (programming part)

$12,500 - Visual System (animations, models, art)

  $4,000 - Audio Engine (sounds, voices, soundtracks)

  $8,000 - Polishment for distribution (beta stage)

  $7,000 - Exclusive content for contributors 

  $5,000 - Campaign and payment processing fees

-----------

$69,000

 

Can I really fit this all in budget?

I have calculated precisely how much I need to complete the project. After the initial release, game development will be continued using the money raised from selling extra in-game content. Every feature promised here, though, will be left free for at least contributors.

What if I will not reach my entire goal?

I am a programmer. This means, that visual and voiced parts are screaming for your help. The project will be finished no matter what! But the funds must be raised somehow. Therefore I would really appreciate your help.

What about the team?

The team will be hired. I would be a producer, designer and programmer. The team will consist of a sound engineer, a composer and two artists (one for paper sketches, one would be a computer artist). To reduce the cost, everything will be set up before hiring any workers. This is to avoid a moment when employees have nothing to do.

I am a rising game developer from Estonia. My objective is to shape this project into an indie game company. I would lead the whole process and do the programming part. The project is already a step ahead of an idea, so you may question the preparation cost. So far I have treated it as a hobby project, meaning it is designed on a personal level and very unsecure. Preparation cost would cover its surefire security, dynamic backup system and proper development tools.

Why am I so passionate about the project?

I have been into game development since I was a little boy. My dream has always been to be a successful game developer and contrive unprecedented ideas. Wallie could literally bring me to the world. In addition to this, there is another reason I have to success in the computer industry. I have been disabled below my knees since I was born and have a limited range on the job market, precluding any physical activity requiring work. I am craving for your contribution, which would literally make my dream to be an honourable developer come true. I know, that achieving something set up that high will not be simple. but I am ready to take this journey of my life!

story:
Welcome to the desert!

Have you ever watched the telly and seen all those cute little merits racing around the Kalahari? Have you ever wished you could have one of your very own? Or have you wished you could go work on the Kalahari and spend time among the 'kats in their natural environment and see them for yourself?
                                          

Seeing the Meerkat at the Zoo just aren't the same. However, here at Kalahari Kats we want to give you the chance to come up close and personal with your own personal Meerkat! In fact, you can have a whole mob of Meerkats if you like!

                                         

Here at Kalahari Kats, whether you ’re a roving male, a leader of your mob, or simply a young upstart seeking rank, this is your opportunity to create and maintain your own Meerkat family so you can explore and experience life in the desert of the Kalahari.

                                        

There are so many options for play here at Kalahari Kats. If you choose, you can work with other players to build a family unit and fight for supremacy in the area your dominant female decides is home. If working alone is your style, you can finish our quests and add more Meerkat's to stand alongside your first Meerkat. There's always the option of being a roving male, seeking conquest of a female or foraging and battling other males for supremacy.

                                              

No matter the type of kat you choose to become, or the way you decide to play, this is a unique game meant to promote community interaction in all its forms and to allow you, the player, to enjoy the Kalahari Desert through one of the most interesting and unique perspectives the real life habitat has to offer!

                                                

Coming soon to a computer near you!


Short Summary:

One day, over a pair of hamburgers, the owners spoke of a lot of things. One of the topics that came under discussion was Meerkat Manor, a very successful show on Animal Planet at the time. From talking about the show, the idea of a game based, not on the show, but on the harsh, realistic lives of the sun angels of the Kalahari Desert came about. Meant to be fun, this simulation game still needs backers to help pay for the artwork and to keep the team spirits up. Let us know that our love for the Kats of the Kalahari is shared, that you want to see this game come to full fruition and go above and beyond its potential. From leaving a comment to donating just one dollar, you can help us achieve our dream of creating a fun, unique, realistic sim game for all to enjoy.

What We Need & What You Get

Kalahari Kats, while meant to be fun for both owners and players, is much like any business; we need investors. This is where you come in. Helping us reach and perhaps even surpass our goal will allow development of the game to move forward more quickly. It will allow for more artwork to be added, and a small server to be purchased so that the game can have all possible resources available upon its launch.

From $1 to $100, we're ready to reward our contributors:

The Impact

Any sim game, from inception to launch and beyond, requires some funding along the way. It allows for artwork to be made, special extras such as dedicated servers to be bought, and encourages the owners to continue believing that this dream, which started out as no more than a discussion over hamburgers in 2010, has marrot and is worth continuing to cultivate until it grows up and out as we firmly believe it should, can, and will.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone who sees this campaign can contribute. If you like the idea of Kalahari Kats, please leave a positive comment, follow or share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, or anywhere else you would like or that feels appropriate!

story:
Short Summary

Hi! We're a small team of developers that created ETS2 Studio - a tool that helped thousands of players to create their own skins, trailers and other mods for Euro Truck Simulator 2. Now, there's a new trucking game available - American Truck Simulator. Of course, we'll create a modding tool for it as well. That means we have to dedicate more time to the project and spend more resources. That's where this IndieGogo campaign comes in - it'll enable us to dedicate time for the development of both American and Euro Truck Simulator tools, and still keep them free!

What are we going to make

  • We'll create a brand new application called ATS Mods Studio. It will contain all the features that the current version of ETS2 Studio supports.
  • We'll add new features to both applications (ATS and ETS2 Mods studio). Two most prominent features will be: 3D Truck Skin preview and Parts Creator. The first will let you preview your skin on a selected truck without loading the game, and the second will let you create custom parts like mudflaps (ATS), lightboxes (ETS2), lights, beacons, horns, engines and such.

  • We'll go over the current features and update them if necessary, and we'll fix bugs that we find along the way.
  • We'll put extra effort into the help and tutorials, so new players and modders can easily understand how ETS2 and ATS mods work.

What We Need

At the moment, the one thing that is needed the most is a new laptop computer for development. Believe it or not, our main developer is working on an old, borrowed one.
Apart from that, we have costs for website hosting and domain names that we use. 
We also love to organize giveaways and contests, and we spend money on prizes that we give out.
If after all of this we have some money left, we'll invest it into a limited edition release of Mods Studio in a DVD case, packed together with a nice T-shirt.

What if this campaign is a success

Funding allows us to stop looking for commercial projects and dedicate all our time into this project for the next couple of months. Every 100$ raised in this campaign means we can dedicate a full working day to the project. And, crazy progress can be made in a working day.

Also, funding means that we can keep Mods Studio completely free. Without any advertisement, any crazy offers packed with the installer, hosted on free download (ad free) hosts. Our web sites (Mods Studio & ETS2 Addons) will continue to be ad free as well.

What if this campaign fails

No fear! Even if our funding goal is not met, we'll continue to work on the Mods Studio project. We'll have to consider using advertisement to cover our development costs, but we still plan to keep the apps free for the end user.

The most obvious difference will be the speed of development. Without funding, we have to prioritize work on paid projects.
If the campaign is partially successful, we'll dedicate our time proportionally.

Risks & Challenges

We can't say there aren't any risks - every project has them - but, we can safely say that our project has an extremely high chance of success. Over 95%. We have proved with ETS2 Studio that we're capable of developing such tools. The experience gained, and the code base that we already have are guarantees that we'll bring this project to a successful closure!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share the word about this campaign
    Tell your friends about this campaign. Share it on social media and forums. The more people knows about it, more people can donate.
  • Join our development team

    We really are a cool little group of code monkeys. If you like programming, you'll fit right in! No matter what level of expertise you have. We posted a great blog post about this, written by Cadde over two years ago. It's still pretty much the same... so, feel free to take a look.

    Follow this link to open up our old blog: ETS2 Developers Wanted post

  • Donate via PayPal

    We really appreciate each and every donation, since it enables us to work on the project we all love and care about!

    Follow this link to donate using Paypal: paypal.me/malnar

    Or, just send your PayPal donation to: marin@ets2studio.com

  • Donate Steam inventory items

    We can make good use of all the items that can be found in your Steam inventory. And, game gifts can be super useful as prizes in our contests!

    We'd be more than happy to receive trading cards, in game items (Counter Strike and such...), game gifts, emoticons and backgrounds and even gems!

    Follow this link to donate Steam inventory items: Steam trade window

Contact and more info

If you have any additional  questions or comments, feel free to contact us:

  • marin@ets2studio.com or marin.malnar@gmail.com
  • Our forum
  • Our ETS2 Studio blog
  • Our ETS2 Studio thread on SCS forum
You can find more information by visiting
  • Official Mods Studio website

Thank you!

Thank you for reading all of this. :)

Or, just send your PayPal donation to: marin@ets2studio.com


Donate Steam inventory items
We can make good use of all the items that can be found in your Steam inventory. And, game gifts can be super useful as prizes in our contests!
We'd be more than happy to receive trading cards, in game items (Counter Strike and such...), game gifts, emoticons and backgrounds and even gems!
Follow this link to donate Steam inventory items: Steam trade window




Contact and more info
If you have any additional  questions or comments, feel free to contact us:



marin@ets2studio.com or marin.malnar@gmail.com

Our forum
Our ETS2 Studio blog
Our ETS2 Studio thread on SCS forum

You can find more information by visiting
Official Mods Studio website
Thank you!
Thank you for reading all of this. :)

story:
Overview

Rhyme Antics is a“Hilarious rhyming vocabulary Game“ inspired by hip hop. Think Catch Phrase meets Karaoke  while you freestyle in proper English only.

The challenge is to test your vocabulary skills. Rhyme Antics uses difficulty levels of rhyming, vocabulary words combined with music to develop each player’s fluid intelligence and make them laugh hysterically!

The game is so addictive you’ll catch yourself rhyming even when you’re not playing!

                     

                                


Rhyme Antics is a “Hilarious rhyming vocabulary Game“ inspired by hip hop. Think Catch Phrase meets Karaoke while you freestyle in proper English only.

The challenge is to test your vocabulary skills. Rhyme Antics uses difficulty levels of rhyming and vocabulary words combined with music to develop each player’s fluid intelligence and make them laugh hysterically!

The game is so addictive you’ll catch yourself rhyming even when you’re not playing!

The story behind the greatest new party game offers a tale of what happens when the power of redemption and creative genius meets passion and faith. One year ago founder and inventor Chantel Calloway moved from her native hometown of Boston to New York with hopes of finding start-up capital to grow her game company. The problem was that she had been charged with bank robbery four years earlier. Although she had no felony record and the only spent three days in jail for the crime, her “bad girl” reputation would make it almost impossible to get funding.

It was during those three days in jail that Calloway decided to bring a family game idea to fruition and committed herself to a journey of entrepreneurship and rehabilitation. Chantel found the road to redemption through Defy Ventures - a unique non-profit in New York - that trains and funds entrepreneurs with criminal

histories. Defy Ventures has been featured in Forbes, Fast Company and Richard Branson’s blog.

Calloway, a single mother with an endless drive, is determined to see the game succeed. This drive led her to seek out one of the most successful game inventors of or our time, Richard Tait, creator of Cranium. Tait gave her valuable advice as well as a strong endorsement in stating, “I think you are really onto something, it’s a really fun game!”

“I just want to make the world laugh and learn at the same time!”, Calloway said at the 3rd annual Defy Ventures “Capital Call” pitch competition last month where she won the $5,000, 1st place prize for developing a fantastic product. 

Calloway used those funds to launch this Indiegogo campaign. More importantly this campaign supports the Boys and Girls Club of America. The organization holds a special place in Calloway’s heart as she pays homage to them for offering the best affordable and educational after-school programing to her son during her struggle as a single mother.

  After four years of focus group testing, hundreds of stellar reviews and efficient entrepreneurial training under Chantel’s belt, Rhyme Antics is ready for the world!

It’s Funny. Players laugh from beginning to end.

It’s educational. Rhyme Antics contain more than 2,000 vocabulary words.

Your pledge makes a difference. Our campaign supports the Boys and Girls Club of America. 

It’s versatile. Rhyme Antics is an adult party game, a family game or a classroom game.

It’s easy to learn. It takes a few minutes to grasp game play.

It’s re-playable. You can play this game many times and never get bored. And you’ll also be able to enjoy our many planned future editions.

It's refined. We have spent five years developing this game. Years of focus group testing with more than 500 players have yielded a market-ready product.

story:
Nexless is an FPS game achieved with CryENGINE 3. We plan to re-innovate the way video games are played.

Nexless has redesigned the ways we have to think when dealing with enemies. AI act more real than ever before, from taking precautionary steps of putting out fires when they are alerted of your presence to inspecting unfamiliar sounds.

Manipulate your environment to any way you see fit. Buildings are fully destructible and trees breakable. Burn down areas of vegetation to distract large groups of enemies or even kill them.

Lighting has become extremely important in today's video games. And we did not forget that. Nexless has HDR lighting as well as soft shadows to add to every bit of atmosphere and realism the game has achieved.

Particle effects have a wide variety of uses. Ranging from explosions to fire to waterfalls and even light flares. And Nexless utilizes them all to the best capable ways.

A huge advancement in the gaming industry is the application of time of day. Our dynamic time of day combined with our DX11 rendered oceans make for the most beautiful and original game experience ever seen

We've taken another huge leap to achieve what Nexless is. Wildlife is a difficult task especially to achieve realistic actions from them. But Nexless has achieved amazing results in it's wildlife.

Games can't achieve the realism Nexless has achieved without free-roam play. Explore the entire Island as you please to achieve your ultimate goals. Save Nexless Isle and the world.

 

Here’s a quick glance at the storyline:

Story

In the year 2019 the Nexless Isle, just off the coast of Madagascar, had been the world's hottest tourist spot for the past six years. But that all changed when a man of no recognition figured out a new way to successfully clone people. He wanted the recognition he felt he deserved, so he used his clones to launch a destructive campaign.

The year is now 2020 and Nexless Isle has been taken over and turned into a cloning facility. With his new power he has begun sending threats and demands to every power across the globe. His demands: surrender and supplies to complete his army in return for salvation. 

You are a well praised military officer sent in to kill this man. But there are a lot of surprises that await you.

 

Now this probably leaves one big question: What will my donation be used for?

 (1) The more money we will get the better and faster our computers can be. Which means, a better game.

(2) We will be paying for a lot of the game, (licensing, release hosting, ect.)

(3) We will be reproducing all of our merchandise.

Nexless will consist of about 8 hours of incredible game-play with 1 hour of equally incredible cinematic.

story:
This Listing is for the Multiplayer Version of the Game Only.

Thanks for taking a look at our IndieGoGo Campaign, we really appreciate the great support from our Supporters over the years, we could not have got this far without you. Also, to any new fans of the Game: Welcome!

BIONITE: Origins is an upcoming, futuristic, first-person shooter & real-time strategy hybrid for the PC, iOS and MAC platforms. The core gameplay consists of piloting hovertanks in first-person, destroying other tanks or structures, commanding your squad to attack/defend certain targets, and a full strategy mode with base-building in the Strategy game type.

We want to bring back the almost-forgotten FPS/RTS hybrid genre. With BIONITE: Origins being called the spiritual successor to the critically acclaimed, 1998 PC game: Battlezone, we have a lot to live up to. But, with the help and guidance of Designer/Lead Designer of Battlezone & Battlezone II — William Stahl — the future looks promising.

Powered by the Unreal 3 Engine, BIONITE: Origins will be released digitally through Steam and other distribution sites.



We've been working hard towards delivering a fun & unique gaming experience. Right now our current goal is finishing the Multiplayer game-modes first and then releasing the game on Steam & other distribution sites. The current Multiplayer game-modes being developed are Siege, CTF, Team Deathmatch & a full Real-Time Strategy game-mode (Strat) which you'll be able to control everything on the battlefield from the first-person view. Though, there will be a Satellite feature too.

Once we're finished developing the Multiplayer and while you guys are having fun online blowing each other up--we're going to be hard at work developing the Singleplayer missions.

The main resource in the Strat game-mode and the Singleplayer missions is Bionite--which is used to produce new units and construct new buildings. Building and directing units is done either by selecting an onscreen unit/building with the mouse or by using the number keys on your keyboard. You'll be able to build base defenses, command a force of hovertanks, and strategically take out the enemy.

Because no one else will. We are making this game to continue to change the industry and show that dedicated fans, like ourselves, can make an impact in this industry too. We want to see a great game made by fans, for fans, succeed in today's massive gaming market, and prove that it can be done so that others can be inspired to create & share games they love too.

We see BIONITE as an "extended First-Person Shooter", because right now we are in an era of one-way oriented shooters. By implementing Real-Time Strategy elements, learning from past mistakes and listening to our fans, eFPS becomes a fresh way to play First-Person video games. Besides, when was the last time you played a FPS/RTS hybrid sci-fi-hovertank-space-shooting game?





We constantly strive to deliver the best content on as many platforms as possible. Today, almost everyone uses a mobile device. Not to mention that every year phones become faster and more powerful. We see the value in mobile devices and believe that they play a part in future gaming.

That's why we are excited to announce that BIONITE: Origins will be arriving on mobile devices. Shortly after the desktop version is released, we will release an iOS version to run on both the iPad and iPhone. We envision the mobile game to have the same great core features as the desktop version and we can't wait to experience BIONITE: Origins with touch, tilt, and voice controls. We also hope to make the game playable cross-platform (i.e. desktop players can still battle iOS players).

We are in the process of creating a networking app for mobile devices as well. This will allow you to check your stats, see other players' rankings, challenge your enemies, and more. Look for it in the App Store soon.

Platoon Studios is a core group of 12 people that are passionate about video games. Everyone on the Team shares an enthusiasm for PC games and their creation. We have a complete team of artists and programmers dedicated to bringing back the FPS/RTS genre for the PC. Also, one additional requirement to joining our Team is (and always will be) a humble acknowledgment of the great work done to create the original hybrid: Battlezone '98.

Platoon Studios had the most humble of beginnings. After about two years of development and trial by fire, we finally had a working Alpha. Now we’re on our way to solid Beta Testing Phase.

The Founder, John Grisnik is just some crazy guy who spends all of his time yelling at his PC and not giving up.  His attitude towards getting things done is reflected. We have an outstanding crew, especially our SSgt. Dan Rhodenizer, who has been a critical team member since day one.

GAME FEATURES

The multiplayer version of Bionite: Origins will ship with all of the content available at the time of release and will include a dedicated server. There will be no locked content in the MP version of the Game.  All subsequent MP content releases will always be free to play and provided for the dedicated servers at no cost.  However, for those that think they are good pilots and squad members or team leaders, an additional subscription based service ("The Ranked Server Subscription") will be available at a very low cost. This subscription service will be for the MP and Coop versions of the Game and include the additional Features listed below with a " * ". The Singleplayer version of the Game will be available for purchase only as Mission Packs.

  • Multiplayer, Singleplayer, and Co-Op Games

  • Statistical Tracking System *

  • Player Profile Page, Rank and Personal Achievement Medals*

  • Dedicated Servers provided and moderated by PS*

  • Game Types: DeathMatch, Team DeathMatch, Siege, Capture the Flag, Strategy, King of the Hill, Capture and Hold

  • Command Post System *

  • Persistent Worlds (includes day/night cycles) *

  • Customizable Vehicles and Weapons

  • Customizable Wingmen Formations and Attack Patterns

Bionite: Origins Alpha Rev 10

We have released many alpha's during the development of Bionite: Origins and are currently working on Alpha Rev 10. This will be our last alpha that will be available to the general public. Once the beta is released, the testing will be closed and available only to our Backers or by invite. The planned release date for Alpha Rev 10 is November 12th, 2012 at 8:00PM PST USA.  All of our Backers will be able to download and play the Alpha.

The Alpha Rev 10 is a SinglePlayer Trainer located at the Emze Mine on Venus. It is a basic framework for the Siege Game that we are going to feature in the beta.  The Goal is to beat the Computer by destroying the objectives before the time expires.  In Siege, the Goal is for the offence to capture the main objective before the match time expires. If the offence fails to capture the main objective, the defence wins. 

Sponsored Tournaments

Platoon Studios will hold two Sponsored On-Line Touranmants each year to determine the best Tank Pilot, the best Squad, and the best Overall Team.  These will all be held only on Ranked Servers with a Platoon Studios Moderator monitoring the each match as a Referree.  Prizes and awards will be presented to the winners and the Tournament Results will be posted on our main website.  The entry fee is included in the Subscription service, but the tournaments are open to the general public.

Non Monetary Contributions

We greatly appreciate everyones contribution to the Game.  If you are unable to Back us during this Campaign, please tweet your firends about the Game and add a us to your FaceBook Page.

______________________________________________________________

IN-GAME SCREENSHOTS OF ALPHA REV 10:

 



We have several videos in our Gallery Section. Ill be adding more screenshots and renders soon.

 

The Wingman Formation and Pattern User Interface

This is a unique feature to Bionite: Origins.  The pilot will be able to control his/her wingmen/wingwomen in the game by using a unique HUD element called the "Formation and Pattern Interface". The wingmen are designed to 'Fly in Formation' or 'Attack in Patterns' based on the pilots commands. These formations and patterns can be set up prior to entering the match, then executed in game on the battle field by selecting the Formation or Pattern Number in the Interface Panel (located in the HUD).  We are currently in the R&D phase of adding this feature to the App. In addition to preset 'plays' the Formation and Pattern interface has a 'custom' section.  This section of the UI allows the pilot to create thier own 'plays' for the wingmen to follow using the familiar 'X' and 'O' system used in football/soccer.


PERKS FOR OUR BACKERS

All of the following Perks are exclusive editions only available to our Backers.  Some of the items will require shipping. Please review our shipping policy below for information about how to calculate your shipping cost.  The cost for International Shipping must be added to the Perk Amount listed below. Shipping within the U.S. is free.

The BIONITE: Origins Collectors T-Shirt

100% cotton, machine washable, sizes: XS - XXXL. Needs to be Shipped.

Front:

 

The BIONITE: Origins Collectors Poster

The Offical Box Art:

3' Hieght x 2' Wide, Printed. Needs to be Shipped.

 

The BIONITE: Origins Collectors Miniature Faction Flags

5" Height x 4" Width. Plastic Base, Printed Paper Flag. Needs to be Shipped.

The BIONITE: Origins Collectors Team Dogtags:

Have your name etched into a polished aluminum dogtag, includes chain.

1.5" W x 2.5" H, 16" chain. Needs to be Shipped.

The BIONITE Collectors Team Patch:

A sew on patch, 3"W x 4.25" H. Needs to be Shipped.

 

The BIONITE: Origins Monument to Our Backers:

The Monument is an in game model with the names of all of our Backers listed on the front. It will be included in the first Offical Release of Bionite: Origins. In addition to the Monument all of our Backers will be listed as Supporters in the Game Credits. Does not require shipping.

 

 

The Ranked Servers Subscription Perk

This Perk includes a 1 year subscription to the MultiPlayer Ranked Servers provided by Platoon Studios. The services provided above, under Game Features, marked as part of the Ranked Servers Subscription are provided under this Perk.

The Screensaver Pack

Includes 100 high definition renderings and screenshots(1920 x 1080 dpi) of the various vehicles, key structures, and landscapes in Bionite: Origins.

Shipping

Shipping will be an additional fee charged only for international delivery. The amount of shipping cost will be determined by the Perk Level and must be added to the Pledge Amount.

Staff Sergeant - add $20.00 USD

Sergeant Major - add $40.00 USD

Warrant Officer - add $40.00 USD

Lieutenant - add $40.00 USD

Captian - add $40.00 USD

Colonel - add $40.00 USD

Major - add $40.00 USD

Brigadier General - add $40.00 USD

Lieutenant General - add $40.00 USD

Game Specifications

Bionite: Origins Minimum System Requirments for Alpha Rev. 10:

OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista or Windows 7

CPU: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Athlon x2 2.7 GHz

RAM: 2GB (XP) OR 3GB (Vista, Win7)

GPU: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 512MB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support (ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeFOrce 8800GT or higher).

Audio: DirectX compatible sound card

HDD: 10 Gb free hard disk space

Bionite: Origins Recommended System Requirments for Alpha Rev.10:

OS: Windows 7 64-bit

CPU: Quad-core Intel or AMD equivalent

RAM: 4 GB

GPU: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 1 Gb video RAM or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support (Nvidia GeForce GTX 560+ or ATI Radeon 6950+).

Audio: DirectX compatible sound card

HDD: 10 Gb free hard disk space

Integrated Video Cards are not Supported.

We are currently working on the MAC version.

We have been able to get the PC version to work on Linux using WINE.

 

Funds Raised on IndieGoGo will be used for...

The $60,000 raised during our IndieGoGo Campaign will go strictly towards the development of BIONITE: Origins.  We are just about to reach the Beta Phase at the end of this year and we plan on having the final release done on March 1st, 2013.  In addition to development costs to finish the game, the money raised will go towords establishing a network of online servers, finishing the statistical tracking system, and providing the Team with a means to work full-time until this is finished. We are working on 3 maps for testing during the beta phase. We would also like to start on March 1st with the Statistical Tracking System up and running. Though it's not much in this expensive industry--every little bit helps.

 

We're not making this game for the sake of making a game, or to make money. We're Battlezone fans who have come from across the world just to make this happen. We've been working on this for over 2 years with basically a $0 budget -- a few of us working at it full-time, while others spare-time when they're not at their day jobs.  Were doing this purely from a standpoint of wanting to make a great game.  Everyone at Platoon Studios is a huge fans of BZ and we really want to make a game that could be considerd the spiritual successor.  Games like BZ are the essence of what video games are, and need to be included in the future of gaming.   


Not to mention, we just want another game where we can finally pilot hovertanks on different planets and moons again.

Player Profile Page, Rank and Personal Achievement Medals*



Dedicated Servers provided and moderated by PS*


Game Types: DeathMatch, Team DeathMatch, Siege, Capture the Flag, Strategy, King of the Hill, Capture and Hold


Command Post System *


Persistent Worlds (includes day/night cycles) *


Customizable Vehicles and Weapons



Customizable Wingmen Formations and Attack Patterns

Bionite: Origins Alpha Rev 10
We have released many alpha's during the development of Bionite: Origins and are currently working on Alpha Rev 10. This will be our last alpha that will be available to the general public. Once the beta is released, the testing will be closed and available only to our Backers or by invite. The planned release date for Alpha Rev 10 is November 12th, 2012 at 8:00PM PST USA.  All of our Backers will be able to download and play the Alpha.
The Alpha Rev 10 is a SinglePlayer Trainer located at the Emze Mine on Venus. It is a basic framework for the Siege Game that we are going to feature in the beta.  The Goal is to beat the Computer by destroying the objectives before the time expires.  In Siege, the Goal is for the offence to capture the main objective before the match time expires. If the offence fails to capture the main objective, the defence wins. 
Sponsored Tournaments
Platoon Studios will hold two Sponsored On-Line Touranmants each year to determine the best Tank Pilot, the best Squad, and the best Overall Team.  These will all be held only on Ranked Servers with a Platoon Studios Moderator monitoring the each match as a Referree.  Prizes and awards will be presented to the winners and the Tournament Results will be posted on our main website.  The entry fee is included in the Subscription service, but the tournaments are open to the general public.
Non Monetary Contributions
We greatly appreciate everyones contribution to the Game.  If you are unable to Back us during this Campaign, please tweet your firends about the Game and add a us to your FaceBook Page.
______________________________________________________________
IN-GAME SCREENSHOTS OF ALPHA REV 10:
 
We have several videos in our Gallery Section. Ill be adding more screenshots and renders soon.
 
The Wingman Formation and Pattern User Interface
This is a unique feature to Bionite: Origins.  The pilot will be able to control his/her wingmen/wingwomen in the game by using a unique HUD element called the "Formation and Pattern Interface". The wingmen are designed to 'Fly in Formation' or 'Attack in Patterns' based on the pilots commands. These formations and patterns can be set up prior to entering the match, then executed in game on the battle field by selecting the Formation or Pattern Number in the Interface Panel (located in the HUD).  We are currently in the R&D phase of adding this feature to the App. In addition to preset 'plays' the Formation and Pattern interface has a 'custom' section.  This section of the UI allows the pilot to create thier own 'plays' for the wingmen to follow using the familiar 'X' and 'O' system used in football/soccer.

PERKS FOR OUR BACKERS
All of the following Perks are exclusive editions only available to our Backers.  Some of the items will require shipping. Please review our shipping policy below for information about how to calculate your shipping cost.  The cost for International Shipping must be added to the Perk Amount listed below. Shipping within the U.S. is free.
The BIONITE: Origins Collectors T-Shirt
100% cotton, machine washable, sizes: XS - XXXL. Needs to be Shipped.
Front:

 
The BIONITE: Origins Collectors Poster
The Offical Box Art:
3' Hieght x 2' Wide, Printed. Needs to be Shipped.

 
The BIONITE: Origins Collectors Miniature Faction Flags
5" Height x 4" Width. Plastic Base, Printed Paper Flag. Needs to be Shipped.

The BIONITE: Origins Collectors Team Dogtags:
Have your name etched into a polished aluminum dogtag, includes chain.
1.5" W x 2.5" H, 16" chain. Needs to be Shipped.

The BIONITE Collectors Team Patch:
A sew on patch, 3"W x 4.25" H. Needs to be Shipped.

 
The BIONITE: Origins Monument to Our Backers:
The Monument is an in game model with the names of all of our Backers listed on the front. It will be included in the first Offical Release of Bionite: Origins. In addition to the Monument all of our Backers will be listed as Supporters in the Game Credits. Does not require shipping.
 
 
The Ranked Servers Subscription Perk
This Perk includes a 1 year subscription to the MultiPlayer Ranked Servers provided by Platoon Studios. The services provided above, under Game Features, marked as part of the Ranked Servers Subscription are provided under this Perk.
The Screensaver Pack
Includes 100 high definition renderings and screenshots(1920 x 1080 dpi) of the various vehicles, key structures, and landscapes in Bionite: Origins.
Shipping
Shipping will be an additional fee charged only for international delivery. The amount of shipping cost will be determined by the Perk Level and must be added to the Pledge Amount.
Staff Sergeant - add $20.00 USD
Sergeant Major - add $40.00 USD
Warrant Officer - add $40.00 USD
Lieutenant - add $40.00 USD
Captian - add $40.00 USD
Colonel - add $40.00 USD
Major - add $40.00 USD
Brigadier General - add $40.00 USD
Lieutenant General - add $40.00 USD
Game Specifications
Bionite: Origins Minimum System Requirments for Alpha Rev. 10:
OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista or Windows 7
CPU: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Athlon x2 2.7 GHz
RAM: 2GB (XP) OR 3GB (Vista, Win7)
GPU: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 512MB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support (ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeFOrce 8800GT or higher).
Audio: DirectX compatible sound card
HDD: 10 Gb free hard disk space
Bionite: Origins Recommended System Requirments for Alpha Rev.10:
OS: Windows 7 64-bit
CPU: Quad-core Intel or AMD equivalent
RAM: 4 GB
GPU: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 1 Gb video RAM or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support (Nvidia GeForce GTX 560+ or ATI Radeon 6950+).
Audio: DirectX compatible sound card
HDD: 10 Gb free hard disk space
Integrated Video Cards are not Supported.
We are currently working on the MAC version.
We have been able to get the PC version to work on Linux using WINE.
 
Funds Raised on IndieGoGo will be used for...
The $60,000 raised during our IndieGoGo Campaign will go strictly towards the development of BIONITE: Origins.  We are just about to reach the Beta Phase at the end of this year and we plan on having the final release done on March 1st, 2013.  In addition to development costs to finish the game, the money raised will go towords establishing a network of online servers, finishing the statistical tracking system, and providing the Team with a means to work full-time until this is finished. We are working on 3 maps for testing during the beta phase. We would also like to start on March 1st with the Statistical Tracking System up and running. Though it's not much in this expensive industry--every little bit helps.
 
We're not making this game for the sake of making a game, or to make money. We're Battlezone fans who have come from across the world just to make this happen. We've been working on this for over 2 years with basically a $0 budget -- a few of us working at it full-time, while others spare-time when they're not at their day jobs.  Were doing this purely from a standpoint of wanting to make a great game.  Everyone at Platoon Studios is a huge fans of BZ and we really want to make a game that could be considerd the spiritual successor.  Games like BZ are the essence of what video games are, and need to be included in the future of gaming.   

Not to mention, we just want another game where we can finally pilot hovertanks on different planets and moons again.

story:
Thanks for checking us out! Welcome to the IndieGoGo home of Divergence: Online; A hardcore sandbox mmorpg that brings back the glory years of truly massive online games where player freedom wasn't just a tag-line, it was the whole experience.

Divergence is a project I started in 2006 with the idea of bringing back what I considered to be "real MMORPGs" to the ailing genre, bloated with disposable throwaway installments. In the midst of a recession, the project has suffered from an almost total lack of reliable funding until now. It wasn't until noticing the success other projects were seeing with much less shown and available to backers that I decided it would be criminal not to charge full-steam at an IndieGogo crowdsourcing campaign.

Divergence's Battle Strategy is simple:

Maximum. Player. Freedom.

The way it aims to accomplish this is:

  • A virtually limitless-sized gaming world. The ocean is in itself, unending. There is no border and no edge. Continents are raised from the seafloor on demand providing an almost limitless supply of new territory just begging to be conquered by players.
  • A non-linear world spreading out in all directions. Pick a direction and GO. Streamed to your client, the player can cross dozens of kilometers without seeing a single load screen.
  • A Skill-Based progression system. No levels, just you and what you choose to do and get better at. Master a profession or round out your character with skills from several at once.
  • Advance in ways other than combat. Be a career architect, a tailor, a dancer, a bio engineer or any number of non-combative professions in pursuit of the almighty-credit.

The Pursuit of Gaming Truth

Divergence does not placate the user. You won't be rewarded with thousands of meaningless achievements or exploitable special attacks. Our aim is to give the end-user REAL features, not just clever tricks of scenery, particles and way... way too much bloom. Divergence will never treat you like a child or lead you down a cleverly disguised pipe of an existence towards the same tired meaningless endgame.

True Combat. True Physics.

  • Keeping with it's mission goal of truth in gaming, Divergence's core gameplay is based on a real-world model.
  • Under typical circumstances, there is no "TAB targetting and attacking". Where you point your weapon is where you fire ir, swing it, or focus your righteous indignation. You aren't "faked out" with a pretty particle system made to fool you into thinking you're actually firing, you ARE firing.
  • Projectiles have mass and momentum. You have mass. All objects have mass and almost all objects can be destructible. What does this mean? Use you imagination.
  • Real physics means real movement. There is no "jump on a flying mount and move from place to place in 3D." In Divergence (as you can already see in our Part 2 video) all movement, and subsequently flight, is REAL and at times hard to control. How's your piloting skill?

Divergence Means HARD-CORE

  • Open-PVP everywhere. No exceptions. If you don't like the way that alien is checking out your girl, put a bullet in his face. Just be prepapred to lose faction with the establishments bouncers who with enough ruckus may elect to toss your ass out.
  • Lootable Corpses. You won't have an inventory full of thousands of ridiculous objects. All objects have a mass equivalent and slow you down based on your physical ability to carry loads. Don't carry your valuables on you!
  • Limited Permanent-Death. The most controversial of the controversial. Cloning in Divergence is common but not guaranteed. You'll need clone insurance, a few clones in storage, to be within the sphere of a cloning beacon and a race which can actually clone in order to avoid starting over on your character after death. Death means something, and thus life means something. Dancers, don't despair. Most NPC and player towns have their own cloning spheres.

A Modifiable World

Working in hand with our crafting system, there are a multitude of ways the player can affect the actual game world itself. Explosives blow holes in the terrain, sometimes exposing veigns of precious minerals beneath. Use a personal drill or drop a mining rig to drill down in your absense, or build up the terrain to a flat section perfect for putting that house on top of. If I were you, I wouldn't leave that equipment lying around too long though, privateers are all about. Better safe than sorry, put a turret near your rig! Bandits won't dare mess with your stuff if they could die and lose their own gear in the process. Unless of course, they have courage.

Truly Unique Races

In Divergence, the playable races and breeds aren't confined to being purely graphical changes from one to the next. Some races, such as humans, have several breeds, each with differences among them. Some races such as AI or D-Tanix have no body of their own and must dominate other entites, assuming their abilities, strengths and shortcoming. Still even more extreme are the Vindicator, who being members of a dying species cannot normally clone at all and when killed never return.

Available Human Breeds

  • Homo-Sapiens Constituting the majority of humans in the galaxy, Sapien Humans have the largest amount of customization available to them.
  • Homo-Solitus The first breed of humans born to share the Earth with Sapiens since the demise of Homo-Neanderthalas. These humans were found to have a naturally developed spatial intelligence as well as numerous other neurological differences.
  • Homo-Auxilium The first genetically created breed of humans, these sturdy individuals were bred to be the perfect soldiers until the arrival of Homo-Invitrus.
  • Homo-Invitrus These humans were born entirely in a lab and grown as such until adulthood in essentially a testtube. They are smaller than Auxilium humans but have a fused ribcage and heightened regenerative capabilities with the traedoff of an extremely short lifespan.
  • Homo-Callidus An illegally-engineered breed of humans, these grey-skinned and lithe humans posessed an almost entirely cartilagenous skeleton and reflex speeds many times that of traditional human breeds.

Funding Requirements and Milestones

Here are a few items we're looking forward to demonstrating once we get to certain milestones. Obviously things could still be added to these and with any luck we'll be able to exceed these goals!

Milestone 5,000
New Website + Public Forums

Milestone $10,000
New Video and Documentary: The races and the factions.
First Player Island Video (Purchased by Souli Hamos)

Milestone $20,000
Synthetics, D-Tanix, Vindicator and Verrator Fully-Functional
Ultra-Super-Awesome Secret-That-You-Won't-Believe

Milesstone $30,000
Crafting + Crafting Demonstration Video
New Assets

Milestone $40,000
Humans, Lokri Fully-Functional
Player Housing Fundamentals

Milestone $50,000
Overwatcher, Overseer, Ennie and Aldulan Functional
Player City Demonstration

Milestone $70,000
Many, many new customization options.
New items, structures and expansion of psychic (physics) combat.

ALL MILESTONES SUBJECT TO CHANGE BASED ON STAFFING

Limited-Quantity Upgrade

Any backer putting in $75 or more will gain a legendary weapon - The feared VRTek Rapid Assault Rapid Rail Driver manufactured by VRNX industries with one brutal unqiue feature, a fully functional chainsaw attachment for melee strikes! This weapon's availability is not guaranteed in the regular game so chip in and be rewarded with a unique piece of hardware! 

Limited-Quantity Upgrade

 

 

Your choice of a Vindicator of Verrator playable character gives you a one-time opportunity to be the baddest sumbitch' in the valley. The 7-foot tall alien cyborg ninjas have a strength and agility that no other humanoid can withstand. A single blow from their Theta/Metal Blades can rend a typical player in half, then disappear in the blind of an eye, "teleporting" to another location. With proper effort they can even swat ballistic rounds out of the air. The tradeoff? These two opposed breeds of the same species are nearly extinct and once they're gone they're gone. Seeing one of these on the battlefield is the closest thing to divine intervention any player of Divergence will ever witness.

 

Extremely Limited-Quantity Upgrade

 

 


When the first Homo-Solitus humans were born on Earth in the 22nd century they were immediately recognized by their piercing blue eyes. This allowed fearful Sapiens to single them out, culling them to near-extinction. Sapien scientists sympathic to the SOlitus' plight helped switch off the gene responsible for this anomaly in surviving Solitus'offspring, leaving all Solitus' with brown eyes and aiding in the reconstituting of their numbers to present-day status. With your contribution, you'll be able to designate your Solitus character as one of these original Solitus male or female survivors setting them apart from all other humans not just on Rook, but in the Galaxy. This is an EXTREMELY rare upgrade and the only one which exists independant of all others thus it must be purchased seperately. It's believed that as few as 6 Solitus, now almost 300 years old still live on with this original feature. Those who do are held in almost divine regard by the Solitus breed humans of today.

Thank you!

Again, thanks so much for checking up on Divergence and if you have any inquiries or maybe would even like to step-up and see if you have the skills necessary to join the team, please dont hesitate to send an email straight to me at:

story:
Our Story

Hello, my name is Ben, and I am the project co-ordinator and team leader at NOVASOFTstudios.  We are a team of 18 people and are currently making a Christmas themed app to break our name into the industry.  At the moment we are working on getting a technical alpha build for our main title, and developing a couple of mobile games on the side to get our name out there and to introduce funding for the apps and the larger project.


At the moment we have a couple of apps lined up in states of completion that only need funding to get out there!


What is SnowMaze?

SnowMaze is an iOS app game set in a snowglobe.  The player is tasked to guide his/her marble around the completely randomly generated maze in search of presents, all the while looking out for holes, enemies and making sure the snow in the globe doesn't get too thick!  (If the snow settles, you won't see the presents!


There will be two game modes:  Challenge Mode, where you race to complete as many small mazes as possible as quick as possible before you eventually get caught by an enemy, and Exploration Mode, where you are put in a huge maze with multiple presents where you have to find as many as possible and make it to the exit alive.


We're also implementing an editing feature, where you can make your own snowglobe in a scene that will also showcase 'trophies' gained from getting ingame achievements!


The Impact

We're looking to use this app to break our name into the business - while our team is comprised of several industry professionals as a name we are currently not well known.  If we don't get the funding we need for this project, then the apps will be severely set back, or we will have to fund it from our own budget, which is currently needed on our big title.  


This would greatly delay our releases this year and next.


What We Need & What You Get

The funding for this project will go towards buying the iOS development licence for the Unity3D Game Development Tool and Game Engine as well as purchasing enrolment in Apple's iOS developer program, granting us access to the Software Development Kit, which will enable us to release our apps on the app store.


If we don't get sufficient funding then we'll either have to delay the app release or pay for it ourselves, but it's money that we really don't have at the moment.


The money will cover us for releasing apps over the next year (apple's enrolment in the developer program is $99 a year) but the licence for Unity3D ($400) is permanent.  The remaining $100 will go towards outsourcing assets for the apps as well as marketing and publicising them.


We'll keep this campaign updated with videos documenting new builds as we add new features right up until release!  Our first video is due on Wednesday 7th December (delayed due to technical difficulty).


Other Ways You Can Help

Please, help us get our name out there!  You can follow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/#!/NOVASOFTstudios

You could subscribe to us on YouTube at http://www.youtube.com/novasoftstudios

Share our name, recommend this campaign to others and with your help we'll be able to get the ball rolling with some awesome releases in the coming year!

story:
What's an Adventure Mobile App?

The Adventure mobile app will allow you to get outside and get out of your daily routine without the hassle of planning or expense of a personal guide! By responding in real-time to clandestine prompts such as “land or sea” and “sweat it out or break it up” on your mobile device you will unlock Adventure Challenges with detailed instructions and turn-by-turn navigation to follow in real-life!

 

      How does the Adventure Mobile App Work?

Each Adventure will start from a designated location and boast up to 16 potential outcomes depending on your real-time Adventure choices throughout the day.  While you may learn to surf, take a hike and enjoy a picnic, another app user starting from the exact same location may choose to go for a bike ride, dine on local cuisine and fly a kite on a secluded beach.

 

Prior to purchasing an Adventure through the mobile app, you will see an estimated timeframe, budget, fitness ranking and eco-score as well as clothing suggestions and gear requirements.  You will be able to purchase the Adventure ($25-50 retail) in advance of your trip (though access to the Adventure itself won’t be available until you activate the starting trigger) or immediately before embarking on the first leg of the journey. 

In addition, multiple  Adventure sequences will be offered in each location to maximize the customization of your experience.  For example, there may be an Explore Adventure sequence, Physical Challenge Adventure sequence and Mental Escape Adventure sequence all available in San Francisco.

Explorers may visit national, state or regional parks, take in views and focus on learning about an area and all it has to offer. Conversely, Physical Challengers will be constantly moving- hiking to the tops of mountains, taking surf lessons (or heading out on their own) and being challenged to dig deeper and push harder all day long.  Mental Escapes will focus on discovering the serenity of a location, appreciating the smell of the woods and the sound of the stream, while taking the time to relax and let go.

                          Where and When 

Adventures will be offered in a growing number of locations throughout California (and beyond as we continue to expand!) for both iPhone and Android platforms, provided we reach our funding goal.  But you won’t have to wait for every Adventure location to be developed before you can experience an Adventure.  We will make each location available to app users as soon as it is ready!

Although initial Adventures will be in California, once this technology is developed, we will be able to Adventures in any location.  And as part of the "Perks," YOU get to vote on additional locations to be developed!

 

 

Project Timeline

June/July: Indiegogo Campaign

August-November: App development and location scouting

December: Integration runs/testing and app store submission

Early 2014: Adventure mobile app released!

 

 

 

Our Unique Model

The prototype for the Adventure app is a paper hard-copy Adventure packet that is 100% customized for each client (based on early client input).  Adventure Challenges, directions and activities are only revealed when clients open sealed instructions at checkpoints throughout the day.

We currently require two weeks advanced booking for hard-copy Custom Adventures ($125-$275 retail) due to the time required for 100% customization, planning, packaging and shipping.  However, by leveraging mobile technology, we’re taking Custom Adventures to the next level so that you can decide on a whim to have an Adventure, supplement a pre-planned trip, or spontaneously impress a date!

Given the overwhelming positive support for Custom Adventures, we will always offer them, especially for backcountry locations, groups, special needs and longer trips.  Check out what’s been said about our Custom Adventures here.

In addition, we are committed to environmental conservation and strive to design green Adventures, awarding each trip an eco-rating. 

Our goal is to get people outside and out of their daily routine with minimal environmental impacts.

 

         Why $24,978?

We are committed to building a mobile app that adds to, rather than monopolizes or detracts from, the Adventure experience, so we will be partnering with a developer whose expertise in custom mobile technology meets our expertise and high standards in adventuring.  Thus, the app itself is projected to cost at least $20,000.  Once we include costs for initial location scouting and Indiegogo and credit card fees, we arrive at $24,978.

Stretch Goal $38,818: With $38,818 we’ll include even more awesome application user-interface features.  For example, in addition to earning Eco-points you will also be able to unlock Effort badges when you complete Adventure Challenges, which will be tracked via the Eco and Effort leader boards.  Your Eco and Effort scores will qualify you for Adventure discounts and free Adventures.  You will be given the opportunity to share your scores or challenge friends.  And based on your Adventuring scores and history, EA may recommend specific Adventures for you. 

Perk Addition!

To get this sweet T-shirt you must either:

(1) Contribute $20 over any Perk level (excluding the $6 level) by either making two seperate contributions (and not selecting a perk in one of them) or by making one contribution that includes one Perk outlined in the right-side panel plus at least $20 (for example you could contribute $46 and receive both the $26 Perk and this T-shirt) 

OR

(2)"Refer" someone else (using the share links below the video) who contributes at the $26 level or above

About Us

This project is a new development by Ethos Adventures, an outdoor adventure start-up launched by Laura Baker.

Prior to starting Ethos Adventures, Laura practiced as an environmental attorney focused on air quality, transportation and environmental justice issues.  She grew up exploring the Sierra Nevada Mountains near Yosemite National Park and has lived all over the country; Vermont to Hawaii. 

Laura has been planning outdoor trips since she was 17 years old.  She is an experienced orienteer and Adventure Racer, backpacker, snow-shoer, swimmer, kayaker, bicyclist, surfer and skier.  She is a lifelong trail and road-runner (Boston Marathon Qualifier) and certified running coach.  She also has certifications in scuba diving and First Aid/CPR.  Perhaps most importantly, Laura has been chased by bears, sharks, albatrosses, coyotes, a moose, chihuahuas, kittens and ducklings- and lived through it all! 

 

“I started Ethos Adventures because in today’s sedentary world of constant demands and hyper-connectivity it’s important to push the ‘reset’ button now and again.  We all need to rest and recharge, and getting outside and trying something new or experiencing something unexpected is the best way to do it!”

                           

     

     FAQs

Wait a minute...did the title of this campaign just change? 

Yes!  We were so successful at spreading the word that the owner of the name phrase found us!  As Chooseco LLC has no involvement in this project, we've changed the title of the campaign.  Good catch on noticing!  As a result of the change none of the Perks appear to be claimed (and our tweeter roll went down to zero), don't worry though we have captured all claimed Perks-- no contributions have gone missing!

How else can I help make the Adventure mobile app a reality?

Help us get the word out by sharing this page with your friends!!!!  We've included lots of "share" tools to make it easy, but let us know if there is anything else we can do to help you, help us!

When will the Adventure mobile app be available?

First locations will be available in early 2014 with additional locations released throughout the year.

How many locations will be available?

EA plans to have at least five locations available by the end of 2014 and anticipates even more as the stretch funding goal is met!  At least three of our initial locations will be in California, where precise locations are to be determined by YOUR votes!  Beyond that, the Ethos Adventures fan-base will help determine new locations. 

Can I give my Adventure to someone else?

Of course!!!  Adventures are awesome gifts and are currently used for precisely that purpose!  We’ll tell you how to gift an Adventure when Perk time comes!

How much will Adventures through the Adventure app cost?

Adventures offered through the mobile app will initially retail for $25-$50.  Our Custom Adventures available today retail for $125-$275. 

How long will I have to redeem my Adventure?

There are no expiration dates on Adventures purchased through the mobile app as “Perks.”  However, the 1-Year clock on the FREE YEAR of mobile app Adventures will start as soon as the first Adventure is available (early 2014).

On which mobile platforms will the Adventure mobile app be available?

Provided that we meet our funding goal, the mobile app will be developed for iPhone (including iPad) and Android.  If we fall short, we will start with the iPhone and add the Adnroid version later.

Where are Custom Adventures available?

Custom Adventures are available throughout California!  You name the location or region and we will make it happen. 

          Other Questions, Comments or Suggestions?

Shoot us an email at info@ethosadventures.com!

story:
Game Overview

Open War is a FPS Zombie action and adventure game with an original and unpredictable storyline featuring single and cooperative gameplay, with heavy focus on realism. 

Set in a believable present .you play as a newly enlisted special forces soldier, equipped with the latest in weaponry, armor and gadgets that will embark on a breathtaking adventure. A world filled with challenging scenarios and heart pounding situations that in time draws you deeper into an ongoing plot.

Key Features

  • Heavy focus on creating an immersive First Person Simulator through, sound and game play.
  • Persistent character development and skill system.
  • Non-linear gameplay and open ended level design.
  • Several in game weapons
  • Realistic and interactive environments.

story:
Short Summary

World War 2 is one of the most popular periods for tabletop miniatures gamers but most games on the market focus on large forces clashing with each other.

What I want to create is a quick, fun and personal game where each player controls only a small handful of soldiers in an overarching campaign. The game will play quickly so you can play a few times in an afternoon or an evening, you'll be able to use any miniatures you already have on the shelf and the games will fold into a campaign where you will encounter interesting characters and strange occurrences.

This isn't Operation Torch or Stalingrad, it's 4 guys on patrol in no mans land or a few comrades checking out an abandoned townhouse because a local told them there was a stash of wine buried there.


What I Need & What You Get

I have preliminary designs, a core rules engine and the fundamentals for setting up the campaigns already created. What is needed at this point is the hard grunt work of getting everything put together, tested thoroughly and flesh out all the details to make it a full featured skirmish game that can sustain a huge variety of campaigns and encounters.

Based on past experience with game designs such as Trench Storm and FAD 4, I believe this project can be achieved in about 3 months of work, including writing examples and some fiction text, building out the rules framework and testing the game and the campaigns extensively.

During that time, I would like to dedicate myself entirely to only one or two projects and the money gained through this crowd funding campaign will go to paying for my groceries and the right combination of caffeine and beer to put this game out and make it as fun and original as possible.

If the campaign raises significantly more money than expected, excess funds will go into acquiring artwork and improving the visual appearance of the rules, though the intention is a relatively no-frills design that will be easier to manage for printing out or viewing on a mobile device.


Past Record

In the past, I have authored a few games, notably Trench Storm, a set of WW1 miniatures rules that was published by the Tin Dictator. Unfortunately this set is no longer available.
I am also the author of Fast And Dirty (FAD 4), one of the most comprehensive (and free) set of scifi wargames rules on the market.

I know there's plenty of people out there who want a different kind of world war 2 miniatures experience. One that incorporates elements of role playing with quick, simple fun and without the need to set up a huge army or dedicate 5 hours to finish a simple game. Now is your chance to make that a reality.

story:
Our parents, Kevin and Rae Lynn, went on their first mission trip together as husband and wife in 2014. Through YMI (Youth Missions International) they led a team of students to Portugal! Not only did the trip change their lives but they were also apart of changing the lives of people in Portugal. Their first trip was so amazing that they couldn't wait to go back to continue serving. This July they will be leading their second team of students to Portugal!! Not only will they have the opportunity to build on relationships that they created last year but they will also be sharing the gospel!! We would love for you to team up with them not only financially but also in prayer. All donations will be given to YMI for the funding of their trip as YMI will use the money where it is needed. Most importantly your donations are contributing to the work of God as they are just his hands and feet doing his works and sharing the good news of our savior! Regardless of if you are able to team up with us financially we are also asking that you please team up with us in prayer.. There is power in prayer!

Thank you all for your support while we're preparing to send our parents off to Portugal!

-- Alyssa, Madison, Brennen, Luke, Noah and Jacob!

Romans 10:15

"And how are they to preach unless they are sent? As it is written 'How beautiful are the feet of those who preach the good news!"
