story:
Robosaurus Rex is an original independent UDK game currently in development for iPhone 4, iPhone 4s, iPad, and iPad2 slated for release to the Apple App Store in June 2012.


any questions give us an email at woodesh@gmail.com

check out our updates at the bottom of the Page!


The action takes place in a galaxy far away, where a humble farmer tends to his flock of farm animals hoping he'll be done in time for Supper.
Little did he know that this would be the battleground for the most awesomely ultimate battle had ever witnessed, to deterimine which Robosaurus Rex will come out on top and be crowned King of the Cosmos.

 

Many party orientated iOS titles can be confusing and often lack the depth and replay value. Approachability is something that we strive for in Robosaurus Rex. Simply tap your Rex and he will gobble up whatever unlucky thing that lies in his path. maybe your a button masher or a pick your moment assasin, the game is what you make it.


Eating the creatures, or "bumps" as we like to call them, earns the player a battery pack. In a single round, players will be eating dozens maybe even hundreds of bumps in an effort to score the most points. Once the round is over the player who ate the most wins. All the eaten bumps are converted into battery packs, which you can use to purchase permanent upgrades for later. This way the players are experiencing new power ups, environment disasters and different character bumps at their own pace.



While Robosaurus Rex embodies our vision of stuff getting eaten by 90ft monsters, it's still missing the final touches. We believe that in order to create a universally loved gaming experience you take everyone on board. 

Our perks reflect this by giving donors a say in our game. Want to name a monkey Bruce? Done. Want Bruce to be a billionaire philanthropist by day and masquerade in a cape and tights by night? You got it! And if you donate enough, you can add your own monsters from the deepst darkest depths of your imagination, battle on planets never before seen by the human eye, even star in the game as yourself!


Robosaurus Rex's heartfelt thanks go out to you! Robosaurus Rex will use his intergrated Twitter microchip to Tweet a personal note to you. (Please include your twitter handle.every donor will also get a special mention in the credits.



Money, lots and lots of money to buy stuff with in the game. Upgrade those power-ups from the get go!


Indiegogo exclusive in-game Bump, Triceratops. This cute little Bump runs around the battlefield colliding with other Bumps.


You get a Robosaurus Rex postcard with personal handwritten message thanking you for your generosity. Oh, and a selection of bump stickers. But wait, that's not all! You get a digital copy of the Soundtrack composed by Francesco D'andrea.
Oh, and you get some batteries AND the adorable Triceratops!


Ooooh boy! you get to adopt a bump , your bump is a one of a kind character which will get its very own unique back story written in your own words!
you will also get a special thanks in the credits under the title 'Adopter of (your character)'.

Available Bumps:


And, you still get the unique Triceratops bump, batteries, stickers, and that kickin soundtrack!



You get to create a Bump. Anything your little mind thinks up we'll turn into a Bump to be gobbled up by the mighty Robosarus Rex! This perk allows you to actually put in your own creations and see them in the final product! (Like maybe one of that coworker you hate working with!) You'll also be in the credits, listed as 'EVIL GENIUS, creator of (your character)'. Don't forget, since this is going to be played by children, it's got to be family friendly. And of course, you get the adroable Triceratops, extra Batteries, Stickers, and the head-banging Soundtrack!


Reality must be twisted, because at $250 you get a Bump of yourself in the game. Dress him (or her) however you'd like, and stuff him with whatever power-ups you want. You also get access to beta so you can play the game before anyone else! Beta players can also contribute with their own suggestions, thoughts, ideas. And that's not all folks, you get your name in the credits too! 'Guest Starring' or 'Special Guest Matt Smith as himself'. Remember, keep it family friendly.

And of course, you get the Triceratops, batteries, stickers, and tunes in the form of the awesome Soundtrack for your listening pleasure!


Whoa mama! You get to be in the FREAKIN TITLE SCREEN! People all over the world will see 'Made Possible by (Your Name)' when they load up the game. And what better way to see your name than with your brand spanking new 16 gig iPad 2 to play it on. And that's not all, you get to make your own battleground named in your honor. And just to sweeten the deal, you get unlimited app coins to buy everything you want from the start.

Plus, you get Beta Access, the Poster, the adorable Triceratops, extra batteries, stickers, and of course, the soundtrack which you can listen to on your brand new iPad 2.


9000 isn't the world, but if we reach that we will create one!

  • Free, for everyone for ever. without any restrictions, ads or gobblygoop that you often see tied with free games. weekly updates adding new modes, planets, bumps and many more features to keep it as exciting from the first time you play it right up to the last.
  • Community Feeding Frenzy, have your say in what makes the game. we encourage people to help us bring this game alive, reaching our goal will help us setup a portal for feedback and in turn bring in more designers and artists that will take your wonderful ideas and turn them into reality! 
  • every dollar funded upto and beyond the goal will go towards the project, every dollar we have has been placed into this to make it a success. with your help and support we can exceed expectations.
  • the game needs a UI artist who knows what there doing, we lack the obvious talents to do such things. money invested will bring in artists.
  • Francesco is the Awesome composer creating the games soundtrack, but musical ears like his don't come cheap. hopefully with your help he will bring the game to life. you can listen to some of his albums over at: http://francescodandrea.bandcamp.com/

 

donation can mean spreading Word to your friends and family, the more people talking means even more people listening.  

thanks for Checking out Robosaurus Rex!  

any questions don't be afraid to ask, we won't bite.


 This is where you'll find all the goings on from when the start of this campaign right up to the very end, we go into more details about the updates on the 'updates' Tab at the top of page or clicking the link here.

updates page.

 

#1 - Bumps, power-ups, enviroment disasters Part 1 

We have been busy creating alot of different elements for the game, this will be roughly half of all the power-ups and characters starring in Robosaurus RexClick here to see fullsize


#2 - Iphone Bound

we go into much more detail on the actual updates page but long story short Robosaurus Rex will be featuring on iphone aswell as ipad.

#3 - Ol' George

owner of the farm and defender of pigs, George is the shop keeper aswell as a general guide throughout the game


#4 - Snuggletruck

Special thank you to the chief scientist Alex Schwartz over at Owlchemy Labs for allowing Snuggle Truck to be part of the action. the Snuggle Truck acts as defender of the field, smashing into any dinosaur that gets in its way.

 

 

 

#5 - Enviro-Bear 2010

big thank you to Justin Smith for allowing Enviro-Bear to come out of hibernation. Enviro-Bear has only 5 minutes till winter comes, lacking his trademark car this hungry bear isn't afraid to flail his arm about hoping to grab something tasty.



 

#6 - Rex 2.0

robousaurus rex has upgraded his onboard circuits and got himself a nice new paint job, hopefully this will send across the right message to everyone that he plans to eat them, rather than have a cuddle. 

Rex’s are available in four unique colours to help distinguish between one another, the battery packs are also being showcased here which will be in the game currency when upgrading.


 

#7 - get of my Land!


#7 - Mount Something or other

we are lacking a name for this volcano! with our unique one of a kind perk you can do the naming.
story_txt:
Robosaurus Rex is an original independent UDK game currently in development for iPhone 4, iPhone 4s, iPad, and iPad2 slated for release to the Apple App Store in June 2012.

any questions give us an email at woodesh@gmail.com
check out our updates at the bottom of the Page!

The action takes place in a galaxy far away, where a humble farmer tends to his flock of farm animals hoping he'll be done in time for Supper. Little did he know that this would be the battleground for the most awesomely ultimate battle had ever witnessed, to deterimine which Robosaurus Rex will come out on top and be crowned King of the Cosmos.

 
 Many party orientated iOS titles can be confusing and often lack the depth and replay value. Approachability is something that we strive for in Robosaurus Rex. Simply tap your Rex and he will gobble up whatever unlucky thing that lies in his path. maybe your a button masher or a pick your moment assasin, the game is what you make it.

Eating the creatures, or "bumps" as we like to call them, earns the player a battery pack. In a single round, players will be eating dozens maybe even hundreds of bumps in an effort to score the most points. Once the round is over the player who ate the most wins. All the eaten bumps are converted into battery packs, which you can use to purchase permanent upgrades for later. This way the players are experiencing new power ups, environment disasters and different character bumps at their own pace.

 While Robosaurus Rex embodies our vision of stuff getting eaten by 90ft monsters, it's still missing the final touches. We believe that in order to create a universally loved gaming experience you take everyone on board.  
Our perks reflect this by giving donors a say in our game. Want to name a monkey Bruce? Done. Want Bruce to be a billionaire philanthropist by day and masquerade in a cape and tights by night? You got it! And if you donate enough, you can add your own monsters from the deepst darkest depths of your imagination, battle on planets never before seen by the human eye, even star in the game as yourself!


Robosaurus Rex's heartfelt thanks go out to you! Robosaurus Rex will use his intergrated Twitter microchip to Tweet a personal note to you. (Please include your twitter handle.every donor will also get a special mention in the credits.


Money, lots and lots of money to buy stuff with in the game. Upgrade those power-ups from the get go!


Indiegogo exclusive in-game Bump, Triceratops. This cute little Bump runs around the battlefield colliding with other Bumps.

You get a Robosaurus Rex postcard with personal handwritten message thanking you for your generosity. Oh, and a selection of bump stickers. But wait, that's not all! You get a digital copy of the Soundtrack composed by Francesco D'andrea.  Oh, and you get some batteries AND the adorable Triceratops!

Ooooh boy! you get to adopt a bump , your bump is a one of a kind character which will get its very own unique back story written in your own words!you will also get a special thanks in the credits under the title 'Adopter of (your character)'.  Available Bumps:

 And, you still get the unique Triceratops bump, batteries, stickers, and that kickin soundtrack! 


You get to create a Bump. Anything your little mind thinks up we'll turn into a Bump to be gobbled up by the mighty Robosarus Rex! This perk allows you to actually put in your own creations and see them in the final product! (Like maybe one of that coworker you hate working with!) You'll also be in the credits, listed as 'EVIL GENIUS, creator of (your character)'. Don't forget, since this is going to be played by children, it's got to be family friendly. And of course, you get the adroable Triceratops, extra Batteries, Stickers, and the head-banging Soundtrack!


Reality must be twisted, because at $250 you get a Bump of yourself in the game. Dress him (or her) however you'd like, and stuff him with whatever power-ups you want. You also get access to beta so you can play the game before anyone else! Beta players can also contribute with their own suggestions, thoughts, ideas. And that's not all folks, you get your name in the credits too! 'Guest Starring' or 'Special Guest Matt Smith as himself'. Remember, keep it family friendly. And of course, you get the Triceratops, batteries, stickers, and tunes in the form of the awesome Soundtrack for your listening pleasure!


Whoa mama! You get to be in the FREAKIN TITLE SCREEN! People all over the world will see 'Made Possible by (Your Name)' when they load up the game. And what better way to see your name than with your brand spanking new 16 gig iPad 2 to play it on. And that's not all, you get to make your own battleground named in your honor. And just to sweeten the deal, you get unlimited app coins to buy everything you want from the start.
 Plus, you get Beta Access, the Poster, the adorable Triceratops, extra batteries, stickers, and of course, the soundtrack which you can listen to on your brand new iPad 2.

9000 isn't the world, but if we reach that we will create one!

Free, for everyone for ever. without any restrictions, ads or gobblygoop that you often see tied with free games. weekly updates adding new modes, planets, bumps and many more features to keep it as exciting from the first time you play it right up to the last. 
Community Feeding Frenzy, have your say in what makes the game. we encourage people to help us bring this game alive, reaching our goal will help us setup a portal for feedback and in turn bring in more designers and artists that will take your wonderful ideas and turn them into reality! 
every dollar funded upto and beyond the goal will go towards the project, every dollar we have has been placed into this to make it a success. with your help and support we can exceed expectations.
the game needs a UI artist who knows what there doing, we lack the obvious talents to do such things. money invested will bring in artists.
Francesco is the Awesome composer creating the games soundtrack, but musical ears like his don't come cheap. hopefully with your help he will bring the game to life. you can listen to some of his albums over at: http://francescodandrea.bandcamp.com/
 
donation can mean spreading Word to your friends and family, the more people talking means even more people listening.  
thanks for Checking out Robosaurus Rex!  
any questions don't be afraid to ask, we won't bite.


 This is where you'll find all the goings on from when the start of this campaign right up to the very end, we go into more details about the updates on the 'updates' Tab at the top of page or clicking the link here.
updates page.
 
#1 - Bumps, power-ups, enviroment disasters Part 1 
We have been busy creating alot of different elements for the game, this will be roughly half of all the power-ups and characters starring in Robosaurus RexClick here to see fullsize

#2 - Iphone Bound
we go into much more detail on the actual updates page but long story short Robosaurus Rex will be featuring on iphone aswell as ipad.
#3 - Ol' George
owner of the farm and defender of pigs, George is the shop keeper aswell as a general guide throughout the game

#4 - Snuggletruck
Special thank you to the chief scientist Alex Schwartz over at Owlchemy Labs for allowing Snuggle Truck to be part of the action. the Snuggle Truck acts as defender of the field, smashing into any dinosaur that gets in its way.

story:
GRAB THE CURRENT VERSION HERE:

https://poxnixles.itch.io/incomspe 


[SUMMARY]

Incompatible Species is a story detailing the daily adventures of a specialized (read: self-important) pest control unit. Despite the mismatched nature of each member and the world around them, what keeps them all together runs deeper than the surface.

Human life has experienced a prosperous boom worldwide. Living conditions are above the minimum on a much broader scale, previously unsolved cures appear one by one, and surgical repair is as simple as spraying yourself with a specialized powder.

But, of course, there's always room for even the tiniest improvement. Especially when these critters that can mutate themselves at will are popping up in unexpected cracks. When that happens, someone has to do the grunt work. Spotting an opportunistic foothold, Lucius Godwin forms the Exterminators and gets to it with his… companions?

 


[FEATURES]

  • Stylish, expressive character art within a variety of locations
  • Richly detailed "cutscene graphics" (CG) to capture the most important moments
  • Voice acting for all the major characters
  • Extra side stories about the crew and those around them in their downtime
  • Diverse cast mainly focused on LGBTQ characters


 


[ABOUT]

Incompatible Species is a kinetic novel undergoing development in Ren'Py, slated to have full and expressive character sprites, background art from lush bio-technological cityscapes to dingy offices, voice acting, and some fun short episodes on the side.

As far as an age rating, Incompatible Species is expected to be around the range of 13+ or 16+.

Featured is emotional kickball writing, paired with gorgeous artwork and energetic music.


 


[CAST]

 


[Lucius Godwin]
[Character Voice: DJ Horn]
[Believes that working hard in the niche he has carved out will earn him the praise he thinks he deserves. Comes off as loud and arrogant, but actually crumbles around those he cares for.]

 

 


[Chris Godwin]
[Character Voice: Kira Buckland]
[Despite aiding Lucius as an Exterminator, she sees his task as meaningless in the long run while making this but a step toward greater goals.]

 


[Vitiel]
[Character Voice: Penelope-Sophia Smith]
[Scatterbrained and a bit dorky, Vitiel stuck to Lucius ever since they first met. Vitiel hopes one day for more breathing room to calmly explore this fascinating, human-cultivated world.]

 


[Anelia]
[Character Voice: Kim Gasiciel]
[Nurturing and a tease, Anelia’s interests usually lie in the stability of others’ well-being, mostly for her kind and closest friends. Always looks to mediate problems before worrying about herself.]


[Margaretta Hemsworth]
[Character Voice: Anairis Quinones]
[Looks stern and focused on practically keeping the world running and people going, but her actions are driven by the desire for as many people to live happy, healthy lives as possible. In charge of many big name companies while carrying a guiding wing to even those as small as the Exterminators.]


[Pi-zan]
[Character Voice: Darcy Maguire]
[Recurring pizza delivery and buddy of Vitiel, they often stop with the group. Rather obnoxious but content with their place in the world. Seems irrelevant. Probably is.]

 


[BUDGET]

Based on progress as of the IndieGoGo launch and only taking into account the main goal, the percentage of the budget will be distributed as:

[All Art - 40%]
[Voiceover - 35%]
[Editing - 14%]
[Remaining OST - 6%]
[IndieGoGo Fees - 5%]

Art counts for character sprites, backgrounds, CGs, and others. Note that much of the music used for this visual novel is already completed.

As of the moment, there are not necessarily plans for how excess funds will be distributed, but all will go to Incompatible Species for additions like accessibility (primarily referring to non-English localizations), additional content such as more side story episodes, costume swapping, or additional cutscene graphics (CGs).

 

Backer rewards include a compilation of art related to the project with some commentary, as well as the full soundtrack. The poster will depict the main key art with Chris, Lucius, Vitiel, and Anelia. Below, you can see the designs for the chibi charms!

We aren't trying to be too ambitious with the backer rewards; we aim to provide goods that still have charm with less risk of delivery.

 

 


[CREDITS]

Producer 
Poxnixles 
https://twitter.com/IncomSpe

Art 
Kaibuzetta 
https://twitter.com/Kaibuzetta

Kkoro
https://twitter.com/_Kkoro

Scarletify
https://twitter.com/Scarletify

Mono
https://twitter.com/AgentMonochrome

Shawna
https://twitter.com/oceanfruit

Snappy
https://twitter.com/sweatybird

GUI 
BáiYù 
https://twitter.com/baiyu_dev

Voiceover

DJ Horn 
Lucius Godwin 
https://twitter.com/DJNOSTYLE

Kira Buckland 
Chris Godwin 
https://twitter.com/rinachan

Penni Smith 
Vitiel 
https://twitter.com/PenPhiVA

Kim Gasiciel 
Anelia 
https://twitter.com/KimGasicielVO

Darcy Maguire-Wheelahan
Pi-zan 
https://twitter.com/LumisauVA

Anairis Quinones
Margaretta Hemsworth
https://twitter.com/anairis_q

Nick Bean
Klaus Triche
https://twitter.com/BeanMM

Music 
Colorgeist 
https://twitter.com/colorghost

Leila "Woofle" Wilson 
https://soundcloud.com/leila-wilson-woofle

Joe "brainfoam" Aquiare 
https://twitter.com/brainfoam_

Logo
Rei
https://twitter.com/skyharborr

Risks and challenges

In order to reduce the risk in creating the project as intended, much of the writing is already completed, with a chunk of the code already in place. In addition, all the planned content has been noted, along with listings for the exact work that needs to get done; much of it being additional art assets and voiceover work.

story:
Game_Pad is a growing company reporting on gaming news.

Game_Pad started on Facebook. With no money and just one person, me, who loves gaming! With a little help from friends and family the Game_Pad: Xbox page quickly found a following and in just a few months, the page now has more than 3,000 followers. Game_Pad reports on the latest news for Xbox, as well as our frequent Throw Back Thursday which reveals what games where released on that day in years past.
https://www.facebook.com/gamepadxbox

My name is Jack, and I have loved video games since my father brought home an original Xbox for my 8th birthday. It was amazing! And ever since, I have been hooked! But recently, I have felt more and more interested in, not only playing Video Games, but sharing my love for video games. This pushed me to create Game_Pad.

Game_Pad is growing very fast, with Game_Pad gaining over 2000 likes in it's first 3 weeks! Thats nearly 100 new unique fans every day! This means, soon, I will need to get more help. Gaining a new crew member will help bring more stories and fun to Game_Pad every day.


Goal 1 - I live and work from the UK, which means a lot of the page fans are from the UK and EU, so I would like to bring in new people from who can bring in more fans from their side of the world. It also means that the page would be able to post stories 24 hours a day!

Goal 2 - I would also like to start a new Game_Pad: PS, reporting on news for PlayStation fans. Funding will allow me to quickly set this up, find the right team to run it and fund advertising!

Goal 3 - Game_Pad's current logo was designed by myself using Photoshop, but with funding I would like to have a logo designed by experts. A brands logo is everything, and although our current logo has worked so far, if we wish to progress we will need something more professional and memorable.

If these three goals are successful, and we have the money to do so, we would like to progress further with these:

Extra Goal - In my spare time, I have been working on a website to run alongside the Game_Pad Facebook pages. It is in very early development and progress is slow mainly down to the fact that it is just me at the moment! But successfully fulfilling Goal 1 would allow me to focus a lot more on building the website and advertising. You can see some screenshots of the work-in-progress website below.



I hope you will help my passion grow by donating whatever you can, and I know that with your help we can be successful! But remember, If you personally can't donate, please please share this with friends!

Thank You!

Jack L McClure
Game_Pad

story:
Cash 4 Cash

Thank you so much for everyone’s generous donations! We are ecstatic from the instant out-pour of supporters.

We have almost reached our “goal” but please don’t let that discourage you from donating. We would LOVE to raise much much more for this deserving family!

After a devastating series of events, Melissa and Bill are working hard to bring their son Cash home. Let’s rally to support them in making this transition a little easier by helping them with unforeseen expenses, including:

-  Making their home wheelchair accessible

-  Hiring nursing aides

-  Medications and medical supplies

-  Offsetting their loss of income

Cash’s Story

On December 12th, 2013 Cash was admitted to hospital in Fort McMurray with Croup. 

The following morning, Cash abruptly stopped breathing for several minutes and needed to be intubated. Once Cash was stable he was transported to the PICU at the Stollery Children’s Hospital in Edmonton.  When he arrived at the Stollery he was placed in the PICU. Over the next 2-3 days Cash underwent a number of tests including EEG’s and an MRI. The tests were reviewed by  doctors and, on December 15, we were informed that Cash’s brain injury was devastating and their recommendation was to let him go. 

After reviewing his file, a new doctor recommended we re-do all of the tests again. Cash received a second MRI and there was “significant improvement”. On December 23, Cash was transferred to the Alberta Children’s Hospital in Calgary so we could be closer to our families.

January was a difficult month and Cash experienced severe bouts of irritability, autonomic storming and dystonia. He is the youngest person to receive a baclofen pump at ACH. Since receiving the pump things have improved greatly. Along with Cash’s baclocfen, he is currently on a number of other medications. 

Cash’s injuries are still very severe but he is medically stable and we are  preparing for Cash to come home before his 2nd birthday.

Today we couldn’t be more hopeful, excited for our future or inspired by what our little guy is capable of overcoming.

story:
Follow us on Facebook: Mulele, the little Monster
If you would like to contact me: d.fornaciari@gmail.com

UPDATES:

Stickers are ready to be printed:


Mulele is becoming more real... now he say hallo top your son!!! Show it to your sons and share with us their reations ;)



Game startup:


Hi folks, my name is Daniele Fornaciari, I’m from Italy where I work as senior software developer. I’m an Italian boy with an American Dream, and I have to thank Internet if I’m here today to realize my dream and you belong it. Internet today can offer many tools to overcome the rocks on the road. When you have to develop a product, a software product such as a physical product you need three things:

  1. Money
  2. Time
  3. Work

The first depends on the others and today thanks to many platforms is possible to find freelancers that can help you to develop your idea, and thanks to Indiegogo.com is possible to reach general public and find out people that believes in your project helping to realize the dream.

This is really an exciting project, give the life to a new character in something that is incredible stimulating, it stimulate the fantasy to find out what other will love. But in this case the first “other person” is my son.

But this project is real more exciting because is the first time that a character born before on Internet and Mobile and only then move on TV and Cinema, this is the reverse path of a regular character life. Sit down and listen me, now I’m going to tell you the story about the genesis of this project.

I have a wonderful 2 years old baby. This summer his aunt presents him a board game. It was a quiz game about a very famous character, I don’t know if I can say her name but I’m sure you know her, she is pink like a pig. Anyway this is not the point. The board game was very funny and my son loves to play with it. It composed of some card of 3 different kind in each card some picture and a question, when the kid put a special pen, in bundle with the game, on a picture it make a sound for right answer.

This have brought me to decide to build up a mobile game inspired to it for my son. Sure, I cannot use same pictures and images so I looked for a designer that helped me to develop this little project. Sure, that project was really simple to develop and to realize, but after some days and a very long brain storming with designer the beginning idea start to develop and change and become too much. So from a simple mobile game the project become so huge that I cannot to handle with my money, so I’m here. I decided to follow the principal of “divide et impera” so I divided the project into phases, to be able to handle it more easily. Going on I will describe the project in each phase for a preview of the whole project, but I will give you more detail only for the current and for this campaign the objective is phase 0.

Have a question about the the project? Discuss with us about it on Mulele - Phase 0 at Crowdfundingforum.com!

I want to present you the character crew:

This is Mulele, he is a funny cute and amazing monster that lives with his family and he likes to play with our sons. What? Where come from that name? Sure, I will tell you. My son’s name is Samuele and another kid that lives in my same building call him Mulele, it’s very simple and I like it very much. As all monster he likes scream, play with toys, jump, flutter and as on.

This is the Mulele’s sister, her name is Spring because like this seasons she loves animal, nature, walking up and down in the country and nose daisies.

Leo is the best friend of Mulele these two pestiferous kid together can destroy your city by your laughter.

Babba, is the Mulele father (this is the name that my son use to call me) he is often out the house due work but he loves his son and in the week end he likes to play together Mulele.

And at the end Mummy, she look at Mulele all the day, but sometimes happens the Mulele escape from her look and then it is another story.

Then sure this is the real story of a real son that is a real little monster.

This is the beginning, during this phase we will produce three stuffs:

  1. Game: Mulele’s kid game
  2. Game: Colouring together Mulele
  3. Video: a teaser video

All the games are cross platform and will be delivered on IOS and Android using a famous open source OpenGL platform: Cocos2d-x (if you need, you can find out more information at: www.cocos2d-x.org).

Mulele’s kid game.

It’s a funny quiz game inspired to a board game presented to my son. The idea behind this game is very simple. The kid will be have in front 3 different type of questions:

  1. Question Type 1: The aim of this one is to teach to kid to recognize objects, it’s compounded by:
    1. 1 big picture figuring an ordinary scene of Mulele’s life located in kitchen, at the playground, at school and other places
    2. 6 others little pictures of object that can be presents or not in the previous
    3. a question of kind: “Which of the six pictures are present in the scene?”
    Only 2 or 3 answers are right.
  2. Question Type 2: This have to teach to associate ordinary objects with the idea of activity or job, it’s compounded by:
    1. 1 big picture with Mulele different dressed like a basketball player or a pirates and so on.
    2. 6 others little picture
    3. a question of kind: “Which objects Mulele uses when play basketball?”
    Only 2 or 3 answers are right.
  3. Question Type 3: The aim of this last is to teach colours. In this one we will have:
    1. 1 big picture of Mulele different dressed
    2. more questions of kind, “Which is the colour of hat?” or “Which is the colour of shirts?”
    3. for each question 2 only answers
    Only one answer is right

Kid will select the right answer touching it, if the selected one is right a nice sound a funny popup will signal the correct behaviour, other hand only a losing sound will invite kid to retry.

Colouring together Mulele

This one is the classic colouring game where kid will choose a simple picture of Mulele I don’t think to explain other, but a new feature is really interesting: the parent will can publish the work of art on facebook if he wants.

Video.

This stuff will be publish on youtube and will be a video teaser with the aim to know this really funny character to the general public. The plot is already wrote but I prefer to unveil, the single user that are curious can write me and I will reveal it.

What I need to produce this phase.

Task Department Amount
Mulele’s Kid Game Graphics 1,200
Sounds 350
Software development 900
Sub-Total 2,450
Colouring together Mulele Graphics 1,000
Sounds 350
Software development 1,100
Sub-Total 2,450
Video Graphics 400
Sounds 200
Animator 800
Sub-Total 1,400
Other Stuffs   (Website, Server; Licences, and others) 1,400
Total 7,700

This phase will be a mirror of phase 1, I will produce 2 others games and optionally a Video this will depend on the success that will receive the first one.

  1. Play with numbers
  2. Play with letters
  3. Video teaser

The concept game idea will be revel on next campaign as well as the costs but I think that will be similar to phase 0.

If and only if Phase 0 and Phase 1 reach a such success this phase can be start. Below the path:

  1. Two more games
  2. Publish sound track of 6 games on youtube
  3. Convert game sound track into a compilation to sell.

At the end this phase will be compound of a pilot for a cartoon and two other games.

2 Donator Badge 12  [Gold Supporter] + You will receive a special Badge inside the form.
3 Wallpaper #1 25  [Donator Badge] + a Digital Wallpaper type 1 that we send you by email
4 Wallpaper #2 30  [Donator Badge] + a Digital Wallpaper type 2 that we send you by email
5 Wallpaper #1 + #2 35  [Donator Badge] + a Digital Wallpaper type 1 and type 2 that we send you by email
6 Wallpaper #1 + #2 autographed 80  [Donator Badge] + a Digital Wallpaper type 1 and type 2  autographed that we send you by email
7 Game Book 45  [Wallpaper #1+#2] + A game book for your kids.
8 Stickers 50  [Game Book] + 1 A4 sheet containing about 12 stickers of different kind, size 2”x2”

Mulele is becoming more real... now he say hallo top your son!!! Show it to your sons and share with us their reations ;)




Game startup:

I’m an Italian boy with an American Dream, and I have to thank Internet if I’m here today to realize my dream and you belong it. Internet today can offer many tools to overcome the rocks on the road. When you have to develop a product, a software product such as a physical product you need three things:

Money
Time
Work

The first depends on the others and today thanks to many platforms is possible to find freelancers that can help you to develop your idea, and thanks to Indiegogo.com is possible to reach general public and find out people that believes in your project helping to realize the dream.

This is really an exciting project, give the life to a new character in something that is incredible stimulating, it stimulate the fantasy to find out what other will love. But in this case the first “other person” is my son.
But this project is real more exciting because is the first time that a character born before on Internet and Mobile and only then move on TV and Cinema, this is the reverse path of a regular character life. story:
Эта страница доступна на русском.

 

Have you ever thought about the fact that our civilization has been existing not that long, and all the rules and values that we take for granted, are just a part of the social contract which has formed only a couple of centuries ago? How did it happen?

 Trying to explain the progress and development of the society, scholars have written thousands of books. They have gathered hundreds of coincidences and patterns, connections in which are so messy that it seems almost improbable.

What if everything is actually much easier? What if the world is ruled not by chaos, but by order? Behind what’s happening there is a distinct, inflexible and indomitable will. Someone wise and cruel, if necessary, who can plan ahead and pass his plan to followers of future generations.

Secret Government is a game based on the theory of a great conspiracy, historical research and myths, rumored to be associated with real existing clandestine organizations.

Gameplay consists of several missions relating to the overall storyline. Each mission is based on a landmark event in the history and significant change in the life of mankind, that you will have to push to a certain choice. 

Your goal is to get the events unfold according to the Grand Plan.

At the same time, you will learn about the past of the brotherhood, follow its ups and downs.

On the way the plan will face a hostile society, but the main obstacle is the need to remain in the shadows and not to attract the attention of the rulers and the common people.

Step by step you will implement the plan, gradually discovering what it actually holds. Finally, you will be the one to determine the fate of the Brotherhood and the whole humanity.

Admire the candle flames gently fluttering on the world map.These are brothers watching you with bated breath. Will this twinkle quake when you make a wrong move?

Ruminate the city over which the old man, mature man and young man are bowed. How many world capitals do you recognize?

If you think you have stumbled upon some hint or symbol, it is likely there for a reason. Look for the signs, and perhaps you will discover the truth.

We have represented the world and its processes so that they looked convincing. We have created a realistic model, whereby States live and interact.

Countries have different forms of Government, the dominant religion and nationality, which could, for example, cause controversy with religious and national minorities inside the country and even lead to separatism of individual regions. The countries also often interfere in external conflicts involving co-religionists and representatives of the same nation.

Brotherhood disposes of three resources: influence, wealth and power, corresponding to the three institutions of the State: authorities, economy and military power.

Using these resources, the brotherhood may have an impact on three major aspects of each country: the economy, diplomacy and society. While the player’s impact is not direct, but subsidiary. For example, you cannot demand the State’s Governor start a war with the neighbor, but you can gradually worsen relations between the two countries, strengthen the army and military settings.

First thing the rulers monitor is Economics: they raise and lower taxes for one or another population group, somewhere between anger and demand for money. On the development of the regions, the army and the police are always in need of funds. But it is not easy to avoid financial collapse and at the same time the riots caused by, for example, fatigue of war multiplied by the outflow of the estates to the front.

Depending on the time and the region economic and forceful influence is in different States. Depends on the wealth of the country and how effective can support bar politicians, at whose side supports. The effect can be enhanced or weaken, interfering in the economy and improving the well-being of the population, in which interest fraternity.

Rulers monitor the external threat, seek military allies and weaker neighbors to take away the part of the land or just strengthen the prestige by a "small victorious war". 

Diplomacy system assumes that attack on another country requires long and steadily worsening relations with it. Therefore, a new war will not come as a surprise to the head of the fraternity.

Your secret society is unable to directly manage the movements of armies and specify for the rulers, which regions to capture, but it is able to carry out the laws, strengthen the army of a country or, on the contrary, organize sabotage, weakening the forces.

Any war ends in negotiations, during which the countries determine the peace terms. The brotherhood does not set the conditions, but can directly affect, for example, exactly what territory goes to the winner and how much the indemnity will be.

In the structure and trends of the society development lies the main potential of human changes. Actually this is what the game is focusing on. After all, the world is just what people think of it, is it not?

Certain changes in the moods of citizens of the leading countries of the world will most often serve as the goal of the Brotherhood missions.

Rulers are compelled to watch public order and moods among the people closely. Society is developing. In addition to simple reasons for tumbling public order and starting a revolt, such as excessive taxes or protracted futile wars, there are more complex ones, for example, differences in ideology between different parts of the society and the government. What was recently considered to be normal, becomes unacceptable in due course. The Brotherhood will often strive to influence precisely the minds of the citizens.

The society consists of estates with their own opinions on key issues, including human rights, the church and religion, the need to conduct wars of conquest, and so on. And these opinions seldom coincide, for example, capitalists crave radical economic reforms, and aristocrats and peasants would prefer stability and preservation of the foundations.

Based on convictions, people support certain political associations, which we conditionally call parties. The population is on the side of those who preach similar ideals or offer an unexpected but reliable way out of a difficult situation. For the Brotherhood it is a powerful tool. If the political influence of the opposition exceeds the influence of the ruling party, then the revolution is not far off, which can change the government and the state system. And with them the actions available to the Brotherhood in this country.

The game's plot is based on significant events in the history of different countries. Some events occur as a result of the efforts of the fraternity, some are easy to predict because they are caused by immutable social processes, finally, some are completely random. Of course, don't forget about the consequences of the actions of rulers and members of the hostile secret society.

Events require the player's reaction and usually offer several possible options for resolution with the appropriate resource expenses by the Brotherhood.

It is quite simple to assume what each choice will turn out to be, but predicting the outcome of a chain of interrelated events is much harder.

We are not changing the historical truth: in the end, the world is as we know it. Another thing is the methods required for this world to be created.

Another important element of the gameplay is the actions of the Brotherhood. 

Brothers can intrude on the government, recharge Brotherhood Treasury at the expense of any state or start a lodge.

The lodge is the local representative of the Brotherhood. After the foundation of the lodge actions, allowing more fundamental laws and changes in the country, become available. Spending time and resources, we can achieve almost anything. 

The country's rulers also commit actions that strengthen their power and prestige, and help maintain the existing order.

Most of the actions are available both for the rulers, and the Brotherhood, for example, the law on strengthening the army discipline. 

However, there are steps that are unique for each of the parties. 

The main obstacles the Brotherhood is to face on the way to the great goal are the machinations of enemies and unwanted public attention.

The Brotherhood should operate covertly. The success in keeping the level of secrecy in the country, is shown by the level of awareness. The higher the level, the more suspicious local government is about the existence and activities of the fraternity. It threatens exposure of the agents and the loss of presence in the country. For the suspicion to disappear, some time to hide and not taking action is required. Or you can hide traces spending hefty funds from the treasury of the Brotherhood. The mechanism of awareness provokes a player not to get hung up on one country and act in several regions.

In addition to complicating circumstances there are real enemies. The Dark Brotherhood. This secret society whose purpose is unknown. Their agents frequently stand in your way, and their impact on countries displaces yours.

If the Dark Brotherhood rises steeply, the Grand Plan is not about to come true.

 

We have been working on this game for more than a year now. During this period, we worked all the basic game mechanics, picked up the visual style and created an effective alpha version.

Nevertheless, we want to raise funds to add additional game mechanics and content that will make the gameplay more interesting and diverse. We strive to provide players with as many opportunities as possible for alternative movements when performing tasks. With each new detail, the processes embodied in the game world will look more authentic, the plot will become deeper, and the game as a whole will improve.

In addition, we plan to expand the Secret Government with additional missions and accelerate the release of the second chapter.

Your opinion is very important to us: how interesting the project is and in what direction it should develop further. We will be grateful for any ideas that will help us make the game better.

We are a small indie project and strive to focus on development without spending money and energy on a large-scale marketing campaign. However, it is very important that as many people as possible learn about our game. If the project seems interesting to you, share it with your friends on social networks. Your recommendations will be the best advertising for us.

We are very grateful to all those who support our project and believe in it. Stay with us. Subscribe to our groups on social networks. Share your views on the game and stay tuned.

Visit our website http://secretgovernment.world/

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/worldsecretgov

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/secretgovernment/

Subscribe us on VKontakte: https://vk.com/secretgovernment

What was recently considered to be normal, becomes unacceptable in due course. The Brotherhood will often strive to influence precisely the minds of the citizens.The society consists of estates with their own opinions on key issues, including human rights, the church and religion, the need to conduct wars of conquest, and so on. And these opinions seldom coincide, for example, capitalists crave radical economic reforms, and aristocrats and peasants would prefer stability and preservation of the foundations.Based on convictions, people support certain political associations, which we conditionally call parties. The population is on the side of those who preach similar ideals or offer an unexpected but reliable way out of a difficult situation. For the Brotherhood it is a powerful tool. If the political influence of the opposition exceeds the influence of the ruling party, then the revolution is not far off, which can change the government and the state system. And with them the actions available to the Brotherhood in this country.The game's plot is based on significant events in the history of different countries. Some events occur as a result of the efforts of the fraternity, some are easy to predict because they are caused by immutable social processes, finally, some are completely random. Of course, don't forget about the consequences of the actions of rulers and members of the hostile secret society.Events require the player's reaction and usually offer several possible options for resolution with the appropriate resource expenses by the Brotherhood.It is quite simple to assume what each choice will turn out to be, but predicting the outcome of a chain of interrelated events is much harder.We are not changing the historical truth: in the end, the world is as we know it. Another thing is the methods required for this world to be created.Another important element of the gameplay is the actions of the Brotherhood. Brothers can intrude on the government, recharge Brotherhood Treasury at the expense of any state or start a lodge.The lodge is the local representative of the Brotherhood. After the foundation of the lodge actions, allowing more fundamental laws and changes in the country, become available. Spending time and resources, we can achieve almost anything. The country's rulers also commit actions that strengthen their power and prestige, and help maintain the existing order.Most of the actions are available both for the rulers, and the Brotherhood, for example, the law on strengthening the army discipline. However, there are steps that are unique for each of the parties. The main obstacles the Brotherhood is to face on the way to the great goal are the machinations of enemies and unwanted public attention.The Brotherhood should operate covertly. The success in keeping the level of secrecy in the country, is shown by the level of awareness. The higher the level, the more suspicious local government is about the existence and activities of the fraternity. It threatens exposure of the agents and the loss of presence in the country. For the suspicion to disappear, some time to hide and not taking action is required. Or you can hide traces spending hefty funds from the treasury of the Brotherhood. The mechanism of awareness provokes a player not to get hung up on one country and act in several regions.In addition to complicating circumstances there are real enemies. The Dark Brotherhood. This secret society whose purpose is unknown. Their agents frequently stand in your way, and their impact on countries displaces yours.If the Dark Brotherhood rises steeply, the Grand Plan is not about to come true. We have been working on this game for more than a year now. During this period, we worked all the basic game mechanics, picked up the visual style and created an effective alpha version.Nevertheless, we want to raise funds to add additional game mechanics and content that will make the gameplay more interesting and diverse. We strive to provide players with as many opportunities as possible for alternative movements when performing tasks. With each new detail, the processes embodied in the game world will look more authentic, the plot will become deeper, and the game as a whole will improve.In addition, we plan to expand the Secret Government with additional missions and accelerate the release of the second chapter.Your opinion is very important to us: how interesting the project is and in what direction it should develop further. We will be grateful for any ideas that will help us make the game better.We are a small indie project and strive to focus on development without spending money and energy on a large-scale marketing campaign. However, it is very important that as many people as possible learn about our game. If the project seems interesting to you, share it with your friends on social networks. Your recommendations will be the best advertising for us.We are very grateful to all those who support our project and believe in it. Stay with us. Subscribe to our groups on social networks. Share your views on the game and stay tuned.Visit our website http://secretgovernment.world/Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/worldsecretgovLike us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/secretgovernment/Subscribe us on VKontakte: https://vk.com/secretgovernment

story:
Short Summary

I've been playing MMOs for so long and they all tend to make a lot of the same mistakes, from the need to make you traverse 50 levels before getting to the real game or assuming there are only a few ways to play the game.   I want to change that.

I also know that my ideas are not the only ideas, and I'd like to create the TRUE next generation MMO, with you.

What We Need & What You Get

This indiegogo is just the beginning.  And in that beginning, we need to flesh out some ideas and concepts and play with them.  I want to use the HEROEngine to do this.  It's $99.  So that's what I need to get started.  gogo requires you to ask for 500 or more though, so that's what I set it to.

    Some of the changes

    So, to get into some of the core changes I'd like to make and test out:

    • No Levels.  You will need the best gear to kill the horrors in the world, but you decide whether you get that through dungeon crawlling or if you rather follow through the storyline of the world and gear up through those interactions.  Both will take the same time so we don't need the artificial leveling.
    • Play as the fantasy stereotypes or play just about any type of character, merchent, blacksmith or other artisan.
    • Quests, that are quests.  You won't be killing 5 rats in my game.  A quest will be just that.  Epic and a sense of accomplishment.
    • Play with your friends, day 1 or 2 years later.    You shouldn't have to grind for 80+ hours just to go on dungeon runs with your friends.
    • Original items.  Items should mean something and you shouldn't have to throw it away the next day.
    These are just a few of the ideas for a new MMO.

    Risks & Challenges

    The biggest risk is that the HEROEngine isn't what we really need.  My hope is that it works as detailed on their site.   And hopefully it is adaptable enough to put in place all of our concepts.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Get the word out.  If you can donate, thank you!  But please, link it to any friends you have that are ready for an MMO that is worth playing.

story:
These days, we all suffer from too many heavy accessories for our devices - chargers, adapters, hubs, and docks. The same is true for Nintendo Switch. The official Switch Dock is expensive and cumbersome and will only work with a separate charger. Packing all that gear really takes the fun out of a gaming meetup with friends. As game lovers, we wondered if a Switch dock could be more portable and simple?

 

The answer is definitely yes!

We created Dongii, a pocket-sized dock, with Bluetooth 5.0 and a detachable 65W GaN charger, allowing you to connect your Nintendo Switch to most any television and wirelessly connect to Bluetooth headphones or speakers for a more immersive gaming experience. 

 

Dongii can also quickly charge other devices thanks to its USB-C PD support. Smaller than the original docking station and with more functions than a charger, Dongii is the ultimate portable dock for the Nintendo Switch that provides the simplest way to connect to a TV and fast-charge any device.  

  • Make Any Television Your Playground

Dongii is a small dock you can carry with you anywhere, easily hook your Switch up to and play on a TV with. It cleverly replaces the official Switch dock and its separate charger. It supports 4k 60Hz video transmission and lets you enjoy a better gaming experience on a big TV even when you’re not at home. 

 

  • More Immersive Gaming Experience
     

Dongii comes with Bluetooth 5.0 standard, which allows it to connect the Switch audio to any Bluetooth-enabled audio devices. Stream audio to your favorite headphones or earbuds and enjoy a more immersive gaming experience without disturbing others.

 

 

Dongii is compatible with all the Bluetooth headphones or speakers that support aptX LL, aptX, HSP, A2DP, SBC, AFH standard. 

 

 

3 steps to connect your favorite Bluetooth audio devices. 

 

 

  • Safe To Use
     

The early stage of the USB-C protocol was imperfect. It caused large voltage fluctuations when used with Switch because it didn’t match with the Switch protocol. Other no-name aftermarket docks have proven unreliable with suspect quality that could damage your Switch. Now, after years of optimization, USB-C protocol has comprehensively improved. After countless rounds of testing and optimizing, Dongii delivers the proper voltage and amperage to the Switch based on its battery level and ensures the best and safest performance. 

 

 

  •  Ultra-compact, Just Pack and Go 
     

Save space, lighten your load and hit the road without taking the heavy original Switch docking station and separate charger with you. Dongii is perfect for carrying around or traveling. Just throw it in your bag and away you go.

  • 65W Detachable GaN Charger
     

Built using the latest GaN (Gallium Nitride) technology, Dongii is much smaller, more efficient and delivers better performance and heat dissipation compared to traditional power adapters.

 

The GaN charger can be detached from the dock and accommodate any of your existing USB-C chargers. A simple way to make your charger more powerful and multifunctional.

 

 

We also make Dongii a truly portable charger since it is perfectly compatible with the PD power bank! No more worries about running out of your devices' batteries on the road. If you want to charge your laptop or Nintendo Switch, it would be better to use a power bank with 45W or higher power output. Macbook request a 20V output and Nintendo Switch requests a 15V output.

 

  •  Travel-friendly Design 
     

Keeping global traveling needs in mind, Dongii comes with UK/EU/US pin converters that can work safely in almost any country.

 

 

Dongii comes with USB-C, USB-A and HDMI display ports to fit all your needs on any occasion at any time. Dongii is not only designed for Nintendo Switch, but can work as a fast-charger, an adapter or even a hub for your laptops, tablets or smartphones. 

 

  • Cutting your charging time in half
     

The USB-C port supports the PD 3.0 quick charging standard. You can easily charge your devices at much faster speeds.

 

  • Quick Access To Your Drive’s Data
     

The USB-A port supports the QC 3.0 standard and allows you to access your USB drive, mouse or controller.

 

  • Stream On A Big Monitor
     

The HDMI display port supports 4K 60Hz video transmission for stunning visuals. Hook up Dongii to your laptop and display your presentation on a big monitor. It eliminates complicated connections, saves time, and makes your work look great. 

 

 

Connect your laptop to a large monitor to mirror or extend your screen and super-size your efficiency.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Joshua Perry, and I have been crafting games of one sort or another since I was a child. I always had a fascination with taking existing rules and modifying them, or developing new ideas and stories. I became inspired to create my own games around the end of 2013 by a number of game designers such as Matt Leacock (Pandemic, Forbidden Island), James Earnest (Cheapass Games), Jesse Harasta; a high school friend who produced and crowd funded his own game, and the simple sage advice: "Why not just do it?"

So welcome, friends, to this creative journey. Bounty is a card game I developed directly inspired by the style and simplicity of the classic Cheapass Games. The game itself contains a deck of 108 cards, and in order to play it you will need a pile of around 150 coins, chips, or tokens (I recommend coins given the theme of the game). In Bounty, the players take on the role of admirals commanding a fleet of ships searching for gold to bring home to their nations. Players send out ships that collect gold over time, and they must then reel in the bounty before their enterprising opponents decide to destroy (or even steal!) their most valuable ships. And no seafaring game would be complete without pirates, which signal the end of this game.

This project is all about the journey. I am the creative mind behind the rules and the function of the cards. I have had the opportunity to reach out to artists to help bring the cards alive, and now I have the opportunity to reach out to all of you to get this game out into the world. My top goal with this project is to get copies of the game into the hands of people I have never met, who I know will get hours of entertainment. As a result, I am not looking to make much money on the project, and am attempting to provide the game for as cheap as possible in an effort to attract more supporters.

Gameplay

Players begin with a small fleet in play, and each turn their ships gather gold. The players may play additional ships in order to gather more gold per turn. However, you must play "Bounty" cards to actually secure the gold. The longer a ship is in play, the more gold it collects, but press your luck too long and the other players will set their greedy and jealous eyes on your overflowing holds.

Players can attack each other's ships in an attempt to send them (and the gold they contain) to the bottom of the sea. They may even try to steal the ship entirely and take its bounty for their own.

Finally, beware the Jolly Roger that means pirates are coming to plunder everyone's ships!

What We Need

Much of the reward for me is the process of creating and the excitement of carrying this project out. The game, however, costs money to produce, so that is where you come in!

I have set the goal for the project at $1000 which will allow me to buy all the copies that you as backers order, as well as a few copies that I can take to game stores or send to distributors/publishers for more visibility. Some of the funds will also go to the artist, since I certainly do not have the artistic skills to make this happen. I will also be offering a few stretch goals as we near this initial $1000 goal that will be group rewards (that is, if the stretch goal is met, everyone wins!).

Since the game is complete, and the art is being produced as we speak, all funds raised will go toward purchasing copies of the game and paying the artist, even if the goal is not met.

What you get (Perks)

Every donation of $5 helps this project move forward a little bit more, and you will have my sincerest gratitude. I will send you a thank-you note, and a signed copy of 1 card from the game.

$15 - A complete copy of the game with a rule book

$20 - I will hand-make you a copy of the game with the original sketches. I'm no where near as precise as a machine, and the cards will be quite a bit lower quality than the actual product. The edges will be rough and uneven, and many of the cards will have guidelines from slight miscuts. Cards will be printed on card stock and painstakingly cut by hand. So why is this a perk? I will only make a few like this so it is a unique item. You also get the satisfaction of making me work for my money! Think of it as your very own personalized deck that no one else has!

$25 - A donation at this level does much to help the project. Pick this option if you would not like a copy of the game, but still wish to support the project. Your name will appear in the rule book under "Donors" and I will send you a thank-you note with a signed copy of 1 card from the game.

$25 - One copy of the game and your name in the rule book under "Donors"

$25 - Two copies of the game with rule books, at a $5 discount! Perfect for gifts.

$50 - Earns you the right to christen one of the ship cards in the deck, and gets you a signed copy of the game with a rule book. The ships are split into 4 nations: Dutch, English, French, and Spanish. You can pick the perk specific to the nation you want, and I will ascribe your name to one ship card of the chosen nation! Your name will also appear in the rule book.

$55 - The big bundle, 5 copies of the game at an average of $11 per copy, even better for gifts, or for game stores looking to put a few copies of the game out on the shelves.

$75 - Two copies of the game and your name in the rule book under "Supporters"

story:
Project Summary

Hey Folks.  My Name is Duncan.  When I got into Unity and Atavism I found it was lacking a Feature I needed.  The Ability to use the Skinned Mesh Gear in my game.  I had never seen C# before (HTML Background) but taught myself enough to finally get it going.  This expanded into a full blown Addon.  Now, 2.5 years later its going to be integrated into Atavism.

But like anything that goes good, I kept adding to it.  Now I have All weapons setup, models, etc ready to go for any Synty user to make the models Drag and Drop into Atavism, We have an IK Hands script setup that does not require any assets (this is free), The Character customizer for Atavism, and we are working on a Full Animation Controller using Explosive RPGs Animations.

What We Need & What You Get

Right now the Add-on is more than usable.  However It could be better.  We have all worked on it for free, and it is getting harder and harder to keep going with no money (we all have families to support).

I am gonna do the Break down here by where the Money will be going and what it will be used for:

  • The First $250 will be offered to TonanBora to finish the Animation Controller.  Each weapon Type added, IK Scripts pre-implemented and ready.  Getting this done would complete the Add-on as I originally Envisioned it. 
  • **Post Removed. ** I did not talk to the person I wanted to Gift $100 to for the Help I have received and this upset them that I would Name Drop them here and offer this accordingly.  As such I have removed the Post.
  • Beyond that, if we can get another $500 that basically pays for a week of me working on the Add-on Full time.  This will be to update the Weapon and shield placements, Setup the IK Hands, and Rest Positions (Atavism Only).
    - Doing this would also allow us to release a General Version to the Public (Non-Atavism) to be used in Any Unity Version.
  • The General Release would Include the Weapons/Shields Setup, Fully ready to use Animation Controller, and IK Hands Setup without needing other Assets like Final IK.  Its 100% script based.
  • Any further Money would be split to support the Members working on this Add-on

Impact

Time is Money.  Making a Game, Especially if your an Indie Dev is a LARGE task.  This Addon lets you drag and drop the Synty Models into your game and basically be done with them.  Without the Add-on you need to setup all the Scripts for your Models.  Place Weapons/Shields.  Adjust the Position and Rotation, and sometimes scales for each Weapon and Shield (over 400).  It takes a lot of time.

In addition, IK Hands Assets can be hard to setup, or be expensive.  We got you covered at no extra charges.  Same goes with the animation controller, being fully setup and ready to go using Explosives RPG Animation pack.

 

Risks & Challenges

Honestly the Only Risk here is Not hitting the Goal.  We have this add-on Usable now.  We just want to make it less work on you.

We are setup on a Flexible Goal.  So even if we do not hit the Goal, the money will still come through.  
 

Other Ways You Can Help

When you make purchases from the Asset store, using my Affiliate Link helps as well.

https://assetstore.unity.com/?aid=1011l7xVV
