Right now the Add-on is more than usable.  However It could be better.  We have all worked on it for free, and it is getting harder and harder to keep going with no money (we all have families to support).
I am gonna do the Break down here by where the Money will be going and what it will be used for:

The First $250 will be offered to TonanBora to finish the Animation Controller.  Each weapon Type added, IK Scripts pre-implemented and ready.  Getting this done would complete the Add-on as I originally Envisioned it. 
**Post Removed. ** I did not talk to the person I wanted to Gift $100 to for the Help I have received and this upset them that I would Name Drop them here and offer this accordingly.  As such I have removed the Post.
Beyond that, if we can get another $500 that basically pays for a week of me working on the Add-on Full time.  This will be to update the Weapon and shield placements, Setup the IK Hands, and Rest Positions (Atavism Only).- Doing this would also allow us to release a General Version to the Public (Non-Atavism) to be used in Any Unity Version.
The General Release would Include the Weapons/Shields Setup, Fully ready to use Animation Controller, and IK Hands Setup without needing other Assets like Final IK.  Its 100% script based.
Any further Money would be split to support the Members working on this Add-on


Impact
Time is Money.  Making a Game, Especially if your an Indie Dev is a LARGE task.  This Addon lets you drag and drop the Synty Models into your game and basically be done with them.  Without the Add-on you need to setup all the Scripts for your Models.  Place Weapons/Shields.  Adjust the Position and Rotation, and sometimes scales for each Weapon and Shield (over 400).  It takes a lot of time.In addition, IK Hands Assets can be hard to setup, or be expensive.  We got you covered at no extra charges.  Same goes with the animation controller, being fully setup and ready to go using Explosives RPG Animation pack.
 

Risks & Challenges
Honestly the Only Risk here is Not hitting the Goal.  We have this add-on Usable now.  We just want to make it less work on you.
We are setup on a Flexible Goal.  So even if we do not hit the Goal, the money will still come through.   

Other Ways You Can Help
When you make purchases from the Asset store, using my Affiliate Link helps as well.https://assetstore.unity.com/?aid=1011l7xVV

story:
The first playable alpha version is now available!

For windows users: You can download it by clicking right here. It's a single executable file; just double click to play. I've only tested it on Windows 7 but if I've done everything right it should run on pretty much any version of windows. Let me know in the comments if you have any trouble running it or if you encounter any other bugs or problems; I'll do my best to help and/or fix things for the next version.

For non-windows users: I don't have a fancy one-file executable version for mac or linux just yet, but if you know anything about python you can download this zip file, extract it somewhere, and run 'main.py' using python 2.7 and pygame 1.9.1. If you're not sure how do to that, I apologize; Future versions will have better support for non-windows users.

One other note: Looking at the rewards, you may have noticed that you need to contribute at least $20 to gain access to testing versions of the game; that will go into effect as soon as the campaign ends. Everybody gets to try the test versions for now, but you'll have to get your contribution in before the campaign ends if you want to stay in the loop.

This initial release took me a while to get ready because I had to put a lot of time into planning stuff and writing boring engine code; now that I've finished all the basics of a playable game, I should be able to release new versions with new features fairly often.

So there are a lot of big, scary problems in the world today. Problems like sexism, homophobia, and transphobia. I don't have solutions to those problems, but I do have the ability to make games and tell stories.

So here's the plan: I want to make a game that's fun and challenging. That game will tell a story that's interesting and engaging. That story will get people thinking about real social problems. Those people will finish the game and stop playing it, but they'll keep thinking about the problems. With any luck, some of them will start thinking about solutions.

And every time someone starts thinking about solutions, the world becomes a slightly better place to live.

This is how artists and storytellers have been changing the world since the dawn of human history; now it's my turn. With your help I'm going to make this game, tell this story, and get people thinking.


First of all, a few general goals of the project:Alright, now it's time to talk about what I'm really planning to do here. Right now I'm going to have to keep things kind of general because I'm still a long way from a finished game and I don't make promises I can't keep; even so, I have a strong vision for the finished game and I'll try to share that vision in as much detail as I can.

  • Compatible with Windows, Mac OSX, and Linux
  • Playable beta within six months, completed within a year.
  • Flexible engine to facilitate mods, add-ons, and sequels.

The story of Ninmu Nanmu follows Anarchy, the guy/girl wearing red you may have seen in illustrations above. He's a fairly normal guy living in the near future, just trying to find his way in the world. He's got a job he hates, a one-room apartment, and an unshakable sense that something is missing. 

On an ordinary night at a club with his friends, Anarchy is accidentally exposed to an alchemical experiment; he is immediately transformed into a female version of himself. The situation rapidly spirals out of his control as he is caught in a crossfire between the Circle of Mages and the Artificer Union; two secret societies, each intent on concealing the accident and turning it to their own advantage.

In the chaos that ensues, Anarchy and his friends join forces with some other club-goers caught up in the experiment; together they are pulled into a world of secrets governed by ancient pacts. Several opposing factions compete for their custody; lies are told and threats are made, but they will not give up easily.

Meanwhile, Anarchy struggles to come to terms with his new gender and the revelation that it might be the result of his own secret desires. What does this mean for his future and his relationships? Will he be able to return to being male? Would he even want to, given the chance?

The game will focus on these types of suspenseful situations and character conflicts while giving the player a chance to make choices that will affect the final outcome and the course of the story.

All of this takes place in an open world that gives the player plenty of space to explore, seen from a 2D side-scrolling perspective. You'll run, jump, and fight your way past enemies and obstacles. You'll solve puzzles, search for secrets, and meet dozens of colorful characters with their own stories to tell.

There will be six playable characters, all members of the main cast and central to the main story. Each one has their own play style, move set, and powerups; pick your favorite and stick with it or switch characters at will.

I've got lots of other plans for the finished game, but I'll be keeping most of them under my hat for now. Game design is always an ongoing process; I can tell you what kind of game I'm going to make, but the details won't be certain until much later into development.

Alright, so I'm talking pretty big but you're wondering if I can really do this. It's a totally valid concern, and fortunately my answer is fairly straightforward: I've already done it before.

I've already made comics that are funny and exciting; on some occasions I've even moved readers to tears. I've already made games that are fast-paced and challenging, with vibrant art and solid mechanics.

There's just one part of this project that I haven't done before: I've never been able to work full-time on a large scale project with a greater goal in mind. That's where you come in; if this project gets funded, I'll finally have everything I need to bring all the pieces together.

Joining me for this project will be two of my friends who are also two of the most talented and reliable people I have ever known: Jeremy Smith and Cameron McLagan. I'll be handling the larger part of the project, but they'll be on call when their skills and specialties are needed; Jeremy is great for story ideas and for pointing out my mistakes while Cameron is a programmer and is particularly good at the sorts of mind-bending algorithm code I hate working on.

 

Here's the full run-down on what you can get by supporting this project.

$5 / The Fuzzy Feeling

Your name (or an alias) will appear in the credits, and you'll get that warm fuzzy feeling you get from supporting an indie project.

$10 / The Game

Your name in the credits, one fuzzy feeling, and a full copy of the game as soon as it's finished.

$20 / The Value Pack

Your name in the credits, one fuzzy feeling, three copies of the game so you can share, and regular email updates with cool stuff like concept art, screenshots, and testing versions of the game.

$50 / OMG Real Paper

Everything from the value pack and I will hand-write a personal thank-you letter and mail it to you along with a full page of concept art drawn for the game. I'll start sending these out as soon as the campaign is funded, and I'll send them as quickly as I can write letters and draw concept art.

Naturally, I'll need an address to mail the letter to. If you don't have a permanent address or you'd rather not share it, I'll be happy to email scanned copies of your letter and drawing to you.

$100 / Even More Paper

The value pack, a thank-you letter with concept art, plus two more pages of of pencil drawings! These pages can be more concept art, or I can draw something else at your request. Just like above, I'll start these as soon as the game is funded and I'll send them out as soon as I can have them ready.

$200 / Minor NPC

All the same rewards as the "Even More Paper" perk and I'll design a character based on you who will appear as a Minor NPC in the finished game; Every Minor NPC will have his or her own name, portrait, sprite, and something interesting to say to the player.

If you're shy, your character doesn't need to be based on you; we can just make something up! In either case, I'll create an interesting and compelling character that fits in with the rest of the game world.

$500 / Significant NPC

At this level, your character is upgraded to Significant NPC status. He or she will gain full-body artwork, basic animations, more extensive dialogue, and a gender-swapped form that can be triggered by the player or story events.

If for any reason you don't want your character to be gender-swapped, I could do something else like an alternate costume or some other type of transformation.

$1000 / Major NPC

At this level, your character attains Major NPC status. He or she gains additional artwork for different moods and emotions, extensive dialogue, and a personal quest or sub-plot that expands on the character's personality and background.

If you have your own ideas for your character's story, I'd love to work them in; if not, I'm happy to write it on my own. Either way, your character will be a living part of the story.

$2000 / Playable Character

At this level your character is no longer an NPC at all; her or she is a fully-playable character who joins the main storyline alongside Anarchy and the others. This means full artwork and animations, personal quests and storylines, and a role in the main storyline of the game.

This is the big one; the ultimate way to be a part of the Ninmu Nanmu story. You bring the character concept, and I'll bring it to life with all of the same care and effort I put into my own characters.

Most of the money goes toward paying me for the time and effort of making the game. Most of that will get spent on stuff like rent, groceries, electricity, etc. I'd also like to buy some new socks.  You can rest assured I won't be spending your money on huge TVs or fancy restaurants or anything; I'm much more likely to stock up on canned goods.

The other main expense will be paying other people for their help. I plan to hire one or more independent musicians for the game's sound track, and of course my fellow team members will be paid fairly.

Depending on how the budget works out and whether we exceed the goal, I may also use funding for some of the following:

  • Repair my computer so it's reliable during development.
  • Additional computers for easier cross-platform coding/testing.
  • A bigger/newer tablet for working on the game's art.
  • A nicer desk and a chair for long hours of art and coding.

On the topic of money and what I plan to do with it, here are some rough ideas of what I'll add to the project if I get extra funding.

$7500 / Expanded Content

I'm going to have more ideas than can possibly fit into one game, but with a little extra funding I can save a lot of them from the cutting room floor. The main storyline will be extended and there will be substantially more optional content to explore.

$10000 / Expanded Gameplay

With double the original funding, I can start adding features to the gameplay. This would probably mean expanded move-sets for all playable characters, a wider variety of enemies/obstacles/puzzles, and other stuff I haven't even thought of. As a side effect, the whole game would end up longer and more diverse than the basic plan.

If you can't support the project financially, you can still help by spreading the word! I would be super grateful if you post about it on your twitter/facebook/tumblr/whatever. There even some handy buttons near the top of the page to help you out with that.

That's pretty much all the information and persuasion I have for you right now. I'll be updating things as the campaign progresses, so be sure to check back often!

story:
Our Story

Hi there! My name is Luis Rosario and I'm the Writer/Creator for Wicked Wyrd Games. I started this endeavor because I love tabletop roleplaying and I love the sense of community one gets from spending time gaming with friends. The focus of Wicked Wyrd is to make gaming accessible to wide variety of easy to understand, easy to pick up, and easy to buy products for a variety of people. It's my ultimate goal to be able to give away some of our products to people who otherwise couldn't afford to buy a large amount of books by offering some in PDF form. In this way all kinds of people will have access to quality gaming on a budget.


The Impact

The greatest impact will be allowing new ideas and new ways of having fun to circulate to a wide variety of people. I think a lot of people (especially those who don't have a lot of money) lose sight of how great it can be to just sit for a few hours and have fun. Getting these games out to people so they can try them, enjoy them, and just have fun would be an awesome thing.


What We Need & What You Get

The majority of this money would go to hiring a designer to do editing and layout for the current product we're producing (a game called Bazaar: The Black Market). It's also a big goal of Wicked Wyrd to get a few physical copies of the books and supplements out to local gaming stores so that people who don't have access to the internet can also give them a try. Finally, I would really like to do some advertising via Facebook to really get the word out and give more people the option to enjoy these games.


To show my gratitude for the people who donate, anyone who gives $15 or more will get a mention in the acknowledgment section of Bazaar: The Black Market. People who donate $25 or more will get a physical copy of Bazaar sent to them once we get some printed. Finally if anyone donates $75 or more, they will get all of the above and I will model a character in our next product after them, using their name and ideas to inspire a unique creation.


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't have cash to donate, word of mouth would be awesome. If you know friends who are interested in RPGs and indie games in particular, point them in our direction and we'll be very appreciative. If you have digital design, print on demand (POD), or artistic skills we would also love to hear from you about donating your time or equipment to the project.

story:
*This will not be the final and only funding for Survival Games, instead it is funding to produce the needed materials for a full project on either Kickstarter or IndieGoGo.

To learn more about Survival Games, visit survivalgames.gazidogaming.com

If you'd like to join the discussion about Survival Games and see more FAQ or to submit your suggestions, visit the oficial Survival Games Forums!

What Is Survival Games?

Survival Games is a 24 player online FPS where your one goal is to be the last one standing, the way you get to that is up to you. Whether you team up with other tributes or become Liam Neeson in the game, everyone's goal is to survive.
  • Strategize: Team up with others or become a lone wolf. Decide whether to run for the loot when the game starts, or head for the hills. You must be one step ahead of your enemies AND your allies.
  • Gather: You will need food and water to survive. Hunt or gather food to keep healthy. Collect basic supplies to craft weapons or traps. Anything to help you survive!
  • Fight: What’s Hunger Games without fighting? Fight to defend yourself by using a huge assortment of different weapons from bows, to spears, to swords!
  • Become the Last One Standing: Outlive all your opponents and become a victor!

Key Features


Multiplayer:
  • Play online with 23 other human players
  • Leaderboards to prove you are a “career tribute”

Explore:
  • Roam around each HUGE environment, but don’t get lost!
  • Discover the beauty in every map

Craft:
  • Gather basic supplies to craft weapons or gear to survive

Sponsor Points:
  • Gain “sponsor points” by doing simple tasks during each game
    • Getting the first kill (500 sp)
    • Longshot with a bow (200 sp)
    • Two kills within 10 seconds of each other (double kill) (500 sp)
    • Picking berries (2 sp)
  • Use your sponsor points to buy items during the game that you desperately need

Environments


The environments in Survival Games are nothing short of stunning. The maps will be designed and finalized by me to ensure it fits the style of the game. In Hunger Games they have a head game maker. Despite their advanced technology, they still have someone in charge of the games. Their job is to ensure the games are both exciting and interesting for the Capital. They give each game a “human element.” If the game was to use randomly generated maps, that human element wouldn’t be there. Refer to the stretch goals to see more about these maps.

You will have to battle against everything that Mother Nature has in her arsenal. Survival Games will include a variety of climates, each one battling against you in a different way. Light a fire when it’s cold, or find cool water when it’s burning hot. Fight against temperature-induced illnesses to live another day. Don’t be the loser that gets killed because it was too chilly and your mom didn’t tell you to bring your sweater. Buck up, it’s going to get rough out there.

At the start of every game, a stockpile of weapons and supplies will be in the middle of the tributes. These items will be randomized each time the game starts to ensure it is always fair and nobody can memorize where everything is. Items won’t be placed randomly throughout the map. If the stockpile is looted before you get your share, you’ll either have to craft something from scratch or rely on your sponsor points to get you back in the fight.
 
 

This is just a little snippet of what Survival Games will become! I have so much planned, but I need your help! Anything helps! :) If you can't pledge any money, be sure to spread the word to your friends and even family! Together we can make this the Hunger Games video game we've all been waiting for :D
story_txt:
*This will not be the final and only funding for Survival Games, instead it is funding to produce the needed materials for a full project on either Kickstarter or IndieGoGo.

To learn more about Survival Games, visit survivalgames.gazidogaming.com

If you'd like to join the discussion about Survival Games and see more FAQ or to submit your suggestions, visit the oficial Survival Games Forums!
What Is Survival Games?
Survival Games is a 24 player online FPS where your one goal is to be the last one standing, the way you get to that is up to you. Whether you team up with other tributes or become Liam Neeson in the game, everyone's goal is to survive.


Strategize: Team up with others or become a lone wolf. Decide whether to run for the loot when the game starts, or head for the hills. You must be one step ahead of your enemies AND your allies.


Gather: You will need food and water to survive. Hunt or gather food to keep healthy. Collect basic supplies to craft weapons or traps. Anything to help you survive!


Fight: What’s Hunger Games without fighting? Fight to defend yourself by using a huge assortment of different weapons from bows, to spears, to swords!


Become the Last One Standing: Outlive all your opponents and become a victor!



Key Features
Multiplayer:

Play online with 23 other human players
Leaderboards to prove you are a “career tribute”

Explore:

Roam around each HUGE environment, but don’t get lost!
Discover the beauty in every map

Craft:

Gather basic supplies to craft weapons or gear to survive

Sponsor Points:

Gain “sponsor points” by doing simple tasks during each game

Getting the first kill (500 sp)
Longshot with a bow (200 sp)
Two kills within 10 seconds of each other (double kill) (500 sp)
Picking berries (2 sp)

Use your sponsor points to buy items during the game that you desperately need


Environments
The environments in Survival Games are nothing short of stunning. The maps will be designed and finalized by me to ensure it fits the style of the game. In Hunger Games they have a head game maker. Despite their advanced technology, they still have someone in charge of the games. Their job is to ensure the games are both exciting and interesting for the Capital. They give each game a “human element.” If the game was to use randomly generated maps, that human element wouldn’t be there. Refer to the stretch goals to see more about these maps.You will have to battle against everything that Mother Nature has in her arsenal. Survival Games will include a variety of climates, each one battling against you in a different way. Light a fire when it’s cold, or find cool water when it’s burning hot. Fight against temperature-induced illnesses to live another day. Don’t be the loser that gets killed because it was too chilly and your mom didn’t tell you to bring your sweater. Buck up, it’s going to get rough out there.At the start of every game, a stockpile of weapons and supplies will be in the middle of the tributes. These items will be randomized each time the game starts to ensure it is always fair and nobody can memorize where everything is. Items won’t be placed randomly throughout the map. If the stockpile is looted before you get your share, you’ll either have to craft something from scratch or rely on your sponsor points to get you back in the fight.

 
 
This is just a little snippet of what Survival Games will become! I have so much planned, but I need your help! Anything helps! :) If you can't pledge any money, be sure to spread the word to your friends and even family! Together we can make this the Hunger Games video game we've all been waiting for :D

story:
1-WHAT DO I OFFER? / Qué es lo que ofrezco?

The project I propose is a set of themed game pieces in 6 of the great civilizations of antiquity which will be compatible, among others, with The Settlers of Catan boardgame.

El proyecto que propongo son fichas de juego tematizadas en 6 de las grandes civilizaciones de la antigüedad y que serán compatible, entre otros, con el juego Los Colonos de Catan.

 

 

 

Romans, Greeks, Egyptians, Chinese, Aztecs and Hindus, will have their new pieces, which will enrich our gaming experience and will be made of solid polyurethane resin and dyed in the different colors of the game . Each set contains: 4 cities, 5 settlements and 15 roads.

 

Romanos, Griegos, Egipcios, Chinos, Aztecas y Hindus, tendrán sus respectivas nuevas fichas, que enriquecerán nuestra experiencia de juego y estarán realizadas en resina de poliuretano maciza y tintadas en los diferentes colores del juego. Cada pack contendrá: 4 ciudades, 5 poblados y 15 caminos. 

 

 

 

 The pieces are created with a hybrid modeling process using the classic hand modeling for the bases and 3D computer modeling and printing for buildings.

 Las fichas han sido creadas con un proceso hibrido entre el clásico modelado a mano para las bases y el modelado en 3D por ordenador y posterior impresión de los edificios. 

 

 

 

 

For more information about the project and its process:

Para más información sobre el proyecto y sus procesos:

 http://bajosocialproductions.blogspot.com.es/

 

 

 

 

 2- WHAT DO I NEED?/ Que necesito?

 

The target fund that I intend to raise is 500$ (about 15 backers).
This goal is the minimum required to carry out an Indiegogo campaign and marks the limit I need to acquire the products and equipment needed to produce the pieces(silicones, resins, dyes, vibrating table, extractor ...)
This first limit is low and leaves no profit margin for me. This has a reason:  as being a fan of the game, the most important in the first place for me is to produce and this way to be able to share these pieces with other players like me around the world.

 

La meta que me propongo recaudar son 500$ ( mas o menos 15 backers).

Esta cifra es el mínimo necesario para realizar una campaña en Indiegogo y marca el límite que necesito para poder adquirir los productos y maquinaria necesarios para producir las fichas ( siliconas, resinas, mesa vibrado, tintes, mesa de vibrado, extractor…)

Este primer límite es bajo y no deja margen de ganancia por mi parte, esto tiene una razón; como fan del juego que soy, lo importante en primera instancia es llegar a producirlo y poder así compartir estas fichas con otros jugadores como yo alrededor del mundo.

 

 

 

 

3- IS THAT ALL?/ Es esto todo?

 

No, that’s not all ...or at least I hope so.
Reaching the $500 target would already be a great pleasure for me, but to be able to make the most complete possible project, I seek your cooperation to make together the most ambitious project of custom pieces  for The Settlers of Catan that has existed so far.
To reach this, I propose different stretch goals:

 

No, no es todo… o al menos eso espero

Llegar a los 500$ seria ya para mi una gran alegría pero en mi meta de realizar el proyecto más completo posible busco vuestra colaboración para hacer de esto, entre todos, algo lo más grande posible; el proyecto más ambicioso de  fichas custom para Los colonos de Catan que haya existido hasta el momento.

Y para eso propongo diferentes escalones de recaudación para poder realizarlo:

 

 STRETCH GOALS:

 

 

 

 At this point, an extra model of  settlement will be made for each of the six civilizations, which means that each civilization will have 3 of their settlements of the original model and 2 of the new one.

Llegados a este punto se realizará 1 modelo extra de poblado para cada una de las 6 civilizaciones, con lo cual, cada civilización tendrá 3 de sus poblados del modelo original y 2 del nuevo modelo. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 


 

 At this point, an extra model of  city will be made for each of the six civilizations, which means that each civilization will have 2 of their cities of the original model and 2 of the new one.

Llegados a este punto se realizará 1 modelo extra de ciudad para cada una de las 6 civilizaciones, con lo cual, cada civilización tendrá 2 de sus ciudades del modelo original y 2 del modelo nuevo.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

 


 

 

 At this point,an extra model of  settlement will be made for each of the six civilizations, which means that each civilization will have 2 of their settlements of the original model, 2 of the first extra model and 1 of the new one.

Llegados a este punto se realizará 1 modelo extra de poblado para cada una de las 6 civilizaciones, con lo cual, cada civilización tendrá 2 de sus poblados del modelo original, 2 del primer modelo extra y 1 del modelo nuevo.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

 

 


 

 At this point,an extra model of city will be made for each of the six civilizations, which means that each civilization will have 2 of their cities of the original model, 1 of the first extra model and 1 of the new one.

Llegados a este punto se realizará 1 modelo extra de ciudad para cada una de las 6 civilizaciones, con lo cual, cada civilización tendrá 2 de sus ciudades del modelo original, 1 del primer modelo extra y 1 del nuevo modelo.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

 

 



 At this point, to do the most complete project in appreciation to the backers, I fuse the last three Stretch goals in one.

Two extra models of settlement and one extra model of city will be made for each of the six civilizations, which means that each civilization will have their 5 models of settlement and 4 models of city different.


Llegados a este punto, para poder realizar el proyecto más completo posible y en agradecimiento a todos los colaboradores, he tomado la decision de fusionar las tres ultimas metas de recaudacion en una.

Dos modelos extra de poblado y un modelo extra de ciudad seran realizados para cada una de las 6 civilizaciones, con lo cual, cada civilizacion tendrá sus 5 poblados y sus 4 ciudades diferentes entre ellos


 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Reaching these stretch goals doesn't depend only on me, you can help a lot sharing the proyect on boardgames pages and blogs, and on Facebook and twitter too! Let´s do the more complete proyect with your help!

Llegar a estas metas de recaudacion no solo depende de mi, tu tambien puedes ayudar mucho compartiendo el proyecto en paginas de juegos de mesa y blogs, y en Facebook y twitter! Llegemos a hacer el proyecto mas completo posible con tu ayuda!

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Bajosocial-Productions/523230007709099?ref=stream

http://bajosocialproductions.blogspot.com.es/

 

 

 

4- AND A LITTLE BIT MORE…./ Y un poco mas...

 

To thank you for your cooperation and also to keep you informed about the processes I’d like to ask you to give a like for this page on Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Bajosocial-Productions/523230007709099?ref=stream

All backers that give a like and record their Facebook Nick when ordering will receive an exclusive robber piece, which will have a different design than usual.

 

Con el fin de agradecer vuestra colaboración y a la vez manteneros informados de los procesos os pido que le deis un like a la pagina de Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Bajosocial-Productions/523230007709099?ref=stream

Todos los mecenas que den un like y dejen constancia de su Nick de facebook a la hora de hacer el pedido recibirán una exclusiva ficha de Ladron que tendrá un diseño diferente al habitual.

 

5-EXTRAS

 

To improve the product even more, I‘ll include two options:

Para mejorar más aun el producto incluiré dos opciones mas:


1 – Velvet bags: in the colors of each civilization and with its own symbol stamped on them. With a size of 10x12 cm, these bags are perfect for storing your game pieces.

The prices for the velvet bags are: 1 velvet bag-------$1,5

                                                          4 velvet bags------$5

                                                          6 velvet bags------$7

In case of being interested these costs must be added to the total sum when making the payment

 

1 -  Bolsas de terciopelo: Serán bolsas de terciopelo de los colores de cada civilización y con su respectivo símbolo estampado en ellas. Con un tamaño de 10x12 cm, estas bolsas son el complemento perfecto para almacenar vuestras fichas de juego.

Los precios por las bolsas son:  1 velvet bag----------$1,5

                                             4 velvet bags---------$5

                                             6 velvet bags---------$7

En caso de estar interesados estos costes se deben añadir al total a la hora de hacer el pago.

 

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2 - Possibility of a washing ink, which provides the pieces with new shades of colors, highlighting their details even more.

The prices for the washing ink are: 1 set wash-----------$1

                                                           4 sets wash----------$3

                                                           6 sets wash----------$4

 

In case of being interested these costs must be added to the total sum when making the payment

 

2 - Posibilidad de un lavado de tinta, con lo cual las fichas ganaran un nuevo matiz de colores que hará resaltar aun más el detalle.

 Los precios por los lavados de tinta son:  1 set lavado-----------$1

                                                            4 sets lavado----------$3

                                                            6 sets lavado----------$4

 

En caso de estar interesados estos costes se deben añadir al total a la hora de hacer el pago.

 

 

 

 

6-AND WHAT ABOUT THE FUTURE? Y qué pasará en el futuro?

 

 Who knows about future… but I ‘m absolutely sure that my intention is to follow, - although this is another question -, first I would like to see the response to the product, and if everything goes well, we’ll all know The Settlers of Catan expansions.

For my part,I let you know that I’d  be more than happy to continue customizing the game with new pieces: boats, walls, metropolis, soldiers, ports ... and who knows what else.

 

Quien sabe que pasará en el futuro…pero yo tengo muy claro que mi intención es seguir, aunque esto es otra cuestión, primero me gustaria ver como se responde al producto, y en caso de que todo fluya de una buena manera todos conocemos las ampliaciones de Los colonos de Catan, y por mi parte solo comunicar que estaria mas que encantado de poder seguir customizando el juego con nuevas fichas: Barcos, murallas, metrópolis, soldados, puertos… y quien sabe que mas.

 

 

 

 

 

7-SHIPPING COSTS / Costes de envio

 

Apart from the cost of the pieces, for internacional biders, you’ll have to pay shipping costs detailed in the next table. Shipping costs vary according to the shipping zone and weight of the package
These costs must be added to the total sum when making the payment.

All shipping to Spain are free.

 

A parte del coste de las piezas, para los envíos internacionales, habrá que pagar unos costes de envio que detallaré en la siguiente tabla .Estos varian según la zona de envio y el peso del paquete.

Estos costes deberán sumarse al total a la hora de hacer el pago.

Todos los envíos a España son gratuitos.

 

 

 

 

 8- CLARIFICATIONS/ Avisos



Bajosocial productions and its products are in no way related, affiliated, supported, or in agreement with Klaus Teuber, The Settlers of Catan, or any of its distributors.
It is the backer of the Bajosocial Productions product that has the responsibility to use the product for what it is; pieces to use instead of the original ones that the game has, assuming that the backer has a complete original copy of the game or wants the customized pieces as collector's items or for exposition.

 

Bajosocial productions y sus productos no están de ninguna manera afiliados, relacionados, con el apoyo, o de acuerdo con Klaus Teuber, settlers of catan, o alguno de sus distribuidores.

Es el comprador del producto de Bajosocial productions el que tiene la responsabilidad de usar el producto como lo que es, unas fichas para poder usarlas en lugar de las originales que tiene el juego, dando por hecho que este tiene una copia completa original del mismo o que las quiere como objeto de coleccionista o para exposición.

 

 

 

 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES / riesgos y desafíos

 

This is my first project on a crowdfunding platform but this is not my first time using silicone and resins to make miniatures. For years my friends and I have used these materials to make copies and use them in a large number of our hobbies.


If the project is approved but reaches no stretch goals, it’s only a matter of production as the pieces are already made, except the 6th civilization that will be made before the end of the fundraising period. In this case the delivery date may be advanced.


If the project is approved and reaches levels of stretch goals, the work process will change since I’ll need more time for the design and  the production because the total set will be more expanded.
The upside is that now I have no employment obligations so I can dedicate my whole time to complete the project and I have several friends in the same situation that could join the production process if necessary, so that a greater number of orders would not be a problem,  it would rather be a blessing.

 

 

Este es mi primer proyecto en una plataforma de Crowdfunding pero no soy nuevo en el uso de siliconas y resinas para hacer miniaturas. Durante años mis amigos y yo hemos utilizado estos materiales para sacar copias y utilizarlas en un un gran numero de nuestros hobbies.

Si el proyecto es aprobado pero no alcanza ningúna meta de recaudación( stretch goal), tan solo será cuestión de producirlo ya que las fichas ya están hechas, a falta de la 6ª civilización que estará realizada antes de que acabe el periodo de recaudación. En este caso la fecha de entrega será posiblemente adelantada.

Si el proyecto es aprobado y alcanza niveles de stretch goals el proceso de trabajo cambiara ya que tendré que utilizar mas tiempo en el diseño y también en su producción ya que el total de packs será superior.El lado positivo es que ahora no tengo ninguna obligación laboral por lo que mi horario diario puede ser utilizado integro al proyecto y tengo varios amigos en la misma situación que podrían unirse al proceso de producción en caso de ser necesario, con lo cual un mayor numero de encargos no seria un problema si no mas bien una bendición.

 Who knows about future… but I ‘m absolutely sure that my intention is to follow, - although this is another question -, first I would like to see the response to the product, and if everything goes well, we’ll all know The Settlers of Catan expansions.

For my part,I let you know that I’d  be more than happy to continue customizing the game with new pieces: boats, walls, metropolis, soldiers, ports ... and who knows what else.
 
Quien sabe que pasará en el futuro…pero yo tengo muy claro que mi intención es seguir, aunque esto es otra cuestión, primero me gustaria ver como se responde al producto, y en caso de que todo fluya de una buena manera todos conocemos las ampliaciones de Los colonos de Catan, y por mi parte solo comunicar que estaria mas que encantado de poder seguir customizando el juego con nuevas fichas: Barcos, murallas, metrópolis, soldados, puertos… y quien sabe que mas.
 
 
 
 
 
7-SHIPPING COSTS / Costes de envio
 
Apart from the cost of the pieces, for internacional biders, you’ll have to pay shipping costs detailed in the next table. Shipping costs vary according to the shipping zone and weight of the package These costs must be added to the total sum when making the payment.
All shipping to Spain are free.
 
A parte del coste de las piezas, para los envíos internacionales, habrá que pagar unos costes de envio que detallaré en la siguiente tabla .Estos varian según la zona de envio y el peso del paquete.
Estos costes deberán sumarse al total a la hora de hacer el pago.
Todos los envíos a España son gratuitos.
 
 

 
 
 8- CLARIFICATIONS/ Avisos
  Bajosocial productions and its products are in no way related, affiliated, supported, or in agreement with Klaus Teuber, The Settlers of Catan, or any of its distributors. It is the backer of the Bajosocial Productions product that has the responsibility to use the product for what it is; pieces to use instead of the original ones that the game has, assuming that the backer has a complete original copy of the game or wants the customized pieces as collector's items or for exposition.
 
Bajosocial productions y sus productos no están de ninguna manera afiliados, relacionados, con el apoyo, o de acuerdo con Klaus Teuber, settlers of catan, o alguno de sus distribuidores.
Es el comprador del producto de Bajosocial productions el que tiene la responsabilidad de usar el producto como lo que es, unas fichas para poder usarlas en lugar de las originales que tiene el juego, dando por hecho que este tiene una copia completa original del mismo o que las quiere como objeto de coleccionista o para exposición.
 
 
 

 
 
RISKS AND CHALLENGES / riesgos y desafíos
 
This is my first project on a crowdfunding platform but this is not my first time using silicone and resins to make miniatures. For years my friends and I have used these materials to make copies and use them in a large number of our hobbies.

 If the project is approved but reaches no stretch goals, it’s only a matter of production as the pieces are already made, except the 6th civilization that will be made before the end of the fundraising period. In this case the delivery date may be advanced.

 If the project is approved and reaches levels of stretch goals, the work process will change since I’ll need more time for the design and  the production because the total set will be more expanded. The upside is that now I have no employment obligations so I can dedicate my whole time to complete the project and I have several friends in the same situation that could join the production process if necessary, so that a greater number of orders would not be a problem,  it would rather be a blessing.
 
 
Este es mi primer proyecto en una plataforma de Crowdfunding pero no soy nuevo en el uso de siliconas y resinas para hacer miniaturas. Durante años mis amigos y yo hemos utilizado estos materiales para sacar copias y utilizarlas en un un gran numero de nuestros hobbies.
Si el proyecto es aprobado pero no alcanza ningúna meta de recaudación( stretch goal), tan solo será cuestión de producirlo ya que las fichas ya están hechas, a falta de la 6ª civilización que estará realizada antes de que acabe el periodo de recaudación. En este caso la fecha de entrega será posiblemente adelantada.
Si el proyecto es aprobado y alcanza niveles de stretch goals el proceso de trabajo cambiara ya que tendré que utilizar mas tiempo en el diseño y también en su producción ya que el total de packs será superior.El lado positivo es que ahora no tengo ninguna obligación laboral por lo que mi horario diario puede ser utilizado integro al proyecto y tengo varios amigos en la misma situación que podrían unirse al proceso de producción en caso de ser necesario, con lo cual un mayor numero de encargos no seria un problema si no mas bien una bendición.

story:
POSTWORLD is a mixture of hurricane shooter, hardcore souls-like slasher and contemplative post apocalyptic survival gameplay with a multi-path role-playing system and a non-linear plot.

The game events take place in 2120, after a lengthy period of civilization’s gradual collapse has resulted in a nuclear war. Several factions are savagely striving for survival throughout the dead wastelands, and the player character threads his way between them, all while trying to escape from agents of the mysterious Corporation hunting his down.

The development has been being done by a small Russian indie studio Screwdriver Entertainment, supported by the community, for 2 years already. The game has been done for about 75% so far. All of it has taken us 2 years and approximately 20 000$.


We have decided to give away POSTWORLD Alpha to get your feedback and prove that we really have working game at this moment!
Here is the link:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zu4ADKmS39cRYK...

Please, check it out and support us to get much better game this autumn!

The game is going to be released on Steam Autumn 2018 no matter what the campaign results will be. Indiegogo simply let us emerge from the shadows and raise a certain amount of money to be spent on adding new content, better localization and tweaking the product.

Also it will grant our community a favorable opportunity to join alpha testers now and get the POSTWORLD key on Steam upcoming autumn.

Apocalypse did not come in an instant: it took a whole century. As globalization and overpopulation were gradually contributing to weakening national governments and spreading pest holes of chaos, transnational corporations were increasing their influence, and by the mid-to-late twenty-first century the world had been turned into their battleground and military test site.

Animal mutations, unknown epidemics outbreaks, dirty bombs owned by radical cults – it all had become trivial. The majority of mankind had already fallen into the darkness of ignorance, when the growing pressure was finally released in a full-scale atomic war.

It happened in 2082. Nuclear flames took millions of souls. Hunger, cold, thirst, diseases and local quarrels devoured billions of them. The planet became badlands inhabited by mutants, and the rare survivors had nothing better to do with themselves than split into factions and start striving for leftovers of resources.

The player will meet three of these groups: Railwaymen, Cultists and Slavers.






 

Each faction has its own point and its own vision of the better future for the post nuclear world. The player may join any Faction and lead it either to the victory… or to the disaster.

But one should also keep in mind the mysterious transnational corporation (TNC) that survived the war and tries to put the old world’s shatters to right. The player character has old grudges with this organization. He used to be a test subject in one of its secured laboratory facilities but was lucky enough to escape. However now there is an experimental implant (with quite an unstable combat AI) in his head, and the corporation’s agents are not going to let their cutting-edge technology slip through their fingers.

We grant the player a large choice of devices to bring death and destruction with. Melee weapons, firearms, bulletproof shields, various ammo, explosives, stimulators: all of it combined with dozens of different skills let the player follow her preferred gaming style. A cold-blooded sharpshooter with a rifle? A doped up berserker with an axe? An armor-clad stormtrooper with a submachine-gun and a shield? Pick to your liking!

Area-based damage system allows to shoot enemies’ body parts off; but losing an arm and a leg does not matter to tough wasteland dwellers, and they go on shooting back. So that any combat encounter ends up as a blood bath!

The player character may also lose a limb but it’s far from a game over, as powerful combat prostheses shall replace weak flesh. They may help the player to customize her character even deeper.

Weapons are also fully customizable. Any part can be replaced: barrels, hand guards, sights and buttstocks of firearms, as well as handles, guards and blades of melee weapons. Every detail has its own stats, directly influencing on the weapon’s combat effectiveness.

 

Ranging from simple wooden bucklers that can hardly bear an axe blow, to high tech bulletproof shields equipped with built-in flamethrowers and stunning devices, they are all an essential part of equipment. They can be customized and upgraded as well as destroyed by dense hostile fire.

Quests that you receive depend on what decisions you have made and what faction you have joined. One will have to beat the game multiple times to see all possible endings.

The wastelands are large, and the mechanics of travel between distinct game locations are inspired by the classical Fallout 1-2. Various events and random encounters lie in wait for the player. These may be procedurally generated combat encounters, as well as text quests à la Space Rangers.

Traveling throughout vast expanses of the post apocalyptic world takes a lot of time, and the player will have to overcome hunger, thirst and sleep deprivation by clever choice of supplies and choosing safe places to rest in.

It all started in February 2016 as an idea to design a post apocalyptic Action RPG to the taste of every Fallout, S.T.A.L.K.E.R. or Metro admirer. Naturally this idea attracted many postapocalypse fans, and as Unreal Engine 4 had switched to a free distribution plan, it became technically feasible for us to create the game without overwhelming expenses to buy or design an appropriate game engine.

Post apocalyptic festival After Us 2017

The project was facing numerous complications from the very beginning. Our team was scattered throughout all the former USSR territory and could only work on the game in spare time. Few of us had actual design experience, understood how pipelines worked, or realized the complexity of implementing certain technical details. Different people had different vision of the project and sometimes it turned out to be impossible to come to a consensus.

Long story short, we had suffered each and every trouble that any aspiring indie team usually faces. Everyone seemed to keep telling us to scale back our ambitions and have some practice with smaller projects first.

POSTWORLD showcase at post apocalyptic festival After Us 2017

However, by the end of the first year we had achieved reasonable goals. Firstly, we formed an established team of people who were constantly and systematically working at the project. Secondly, we acquired our own visual style and wrote the game lore. Thirdly, a list of mechanics to be used in game was made.

In spring 2017 or so we «got out into the world». From then on we have been taking part in various conferences focusing on game development (DevGAMM, White Nights) and some post apocalypse related events, all while paying much more attention to social media advertising and community management.

From left to right: Nikolay Isamidinov, Chris Taylor, and Peter Leontev

Concurrently we have been working hard designing the software components, testing game mechanics and adding new content. We had released and tested endless new builds getting invaluable feedback.

POSTWORLD showcase at DevGAMM 2017 conference in Moscow

Although we were already contemplating at launching a crowdfunding campaign, we were unwilling to impose extra obligations on ourselves and finally decided to continue the development only using internal resources.

Towards the end of the year we had already had a somewhat playable prototype. It was when we made our biggest mistake: we tried to attract publishers. Meetings, discussions, scheduling, endless planning, budget development, implementation of necessary additional feature prototypes and legal matters followed as a result taking us two months – and all without any result. We joked that maybe that is all because POSTWORLD lacks loot boxes and/or Battle Royale mode.

POSTWORLD showcase at post apocalyptic festival After Us 2017

Having realized that we were on our own, we have proceeded with the initial schedule aiming to release on Steam Early Access in Autumn 2018.

Naturally our possibilities are limited and should we rely upon our own resources alone, a lot of planned content will not be covered by Early Access and will only appear in further constant updates. It was to avoid such a situation that we started this fundraising. Thanks to Indiegogo everyone interested will be able to learn about the project as soon as possible and support it while we will be empowered to not just release the game but put it into the originally intended shape.

From left to right: Nikolay Isamidinov, Peter Leontev and Michael Kemski from Obsidian Entertainment

There are none! It might look weird, but it is true. We already have a playable Alpha version. We already invested 2 years and approximately 20000$ in POSTWORLD and we will not stop the development at any cost. Moreover we are going to fully implement above feature list. We will release the game on Steam no matter how much money the campaign will actually raise. We want to develop POSTWORLD much much further taking into account community feedback! Support us to turn this goal into reality!

We launched this campaign not to design the game from scratch. What we sought was to let our community support the project that is already in progress and good state. We wanted to give all the backers Steam key to Alpha version of the game now and its automatic upgrade to release version in Autumn 2018 as our sincere gratitude for support.

These are the reasons we put such a modest sum as our first goal. Everything raised in excess of it will serve to improve the project and add extra content such as new weapons, monsters and implants (see stretch goals).

We believe the support is always two sided. Help us now and we will bring you more fun this autumn!

  • Nikolay Isamidinov - Project Manager, 2D Artist, Level Designer, Game designer
  • Peter Leontev - Lead Programmer, Game designer
  • Andrey Kolesnik - Lead Game designer, Programmer, Screenwriter
  • Alexey Voronin - Lead 2D/3D Artist
  • Angelica Werner - PR & Community manager
  • Alexey Ignatiev - Community manager
  • Maksim Horsun - Screenwriter
  • Evgeny Peshkin - Screenwriter
  • Alexander Chernetsov - Lead Level Designer
  • Andrey Abramov - Lead Animator
  • Anton Shvedov - 3D Artist
  • Alexandra Khodjayan - 2D Artist
  • Alexander Peterson - 2D Artist
  • Andrey Khrutsky - 2D Artist
  • Artyom Antipov - 3D Artist
  • Dmitry Smirnov - 3D Artist
  • Amal Bakirov - 3D Artist
  • Denis Popyrkin - Interpreter
  • Fedor Shuteyev - 3D Artist
  • Daniel Chelnokov - 2D Artist
  • Yuri Pushkin - Riger
  • Denis Sizov - 2D Artist
  • Dmitry Smekhov - 2D Artist
  • Evgeny Kozlov - 3D Artist
  • Ilya Krizhepolskiy - Sound designer

   Steam Youtube IndieDB Twitter Facebook Vkontakte Website Email

story:
Somos un grupo de amantes a los juegos de mesa y wargames situados en Conil de la frontera, Cádiz.

    Nuestra idea nace desde la pasión por este gran juego de mesa  y como jugadores sentíamos la necesidad de llevar el juego a su máxima expresión, esta idea nos lleva  a la conclusión de fabricar un estadio completo para jugar partidas con todo el contexto que este juego se merece pero sin la necesidad de tener nuestro estadio montado en todo momento ocupando una habitación completa de nuestra casa.

    Después de estudiar el proyecto con detenimiento surgió la propuesta de hacer una campaña, para con vuestra ayuda, llevar nuestra idea a las casas de aquellos aficionados que como nosotros vivimos con apasionamiento este hobby.

     Nuestro estadio transportable intenta transmitir la mejor estética de un estadio con la funcionalidad de poder llevarlo a casa de amigos, torneos y poder guardarlo en cualquier rincón de vuestra casa.

     Esta es nuestra idea... esperamos poder salir adelante con vuestra ayuda ya que sin ella solo se nos quedaría en un proyecto particular.

El plazo de entrega sera en marzo de 2015, si algun comprador rectifica su compra no nos queda otro remedio que devolver el 80% del total invertido en concepto de tramites, tanto de indiegogo como de paypal.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We are a group of enthusiasts to board games and wargames located in Conil de la Frontera, Cádiz.

  Our idea was born from the passion for this great board game as players felt the need to bring the game to its fullest, this idea leads to the conclusion manufacture a full stadium to play games with the whole context that this game deserve but without the need to have our stadium mounted at all times occupying an entire room of our house.

  After carefully studying the draft proposal emerged to campaign for your help, our concept to the homes of those fans who passionately as we live this hobby.

  Our transportable stadium trying to convey the best aesthetics of a stadium with the functionality to take home to friends, tournaments and to keep it in any corner of your home.
  This is our idea ... hope to succeed with your help because without it we are only stay in a particular project.

Delivery will be in March 2015, if any buyer purchase rectified we have no other choice but to return 80 % of the total invested by way of paperwork , both indiegogo and paypal .

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

que sin ella solo se nos quedaría en un proyecto particular.El plazo de entrega sera en marzo de 2015, si algun comprador rectifica su compra no nos queda otro remedio que devolver el 80% del total invertido en concepto de tramites, tanto de indiegogo como de paypal.-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------We are a group of enthusiasts to board games and wargames located in Conil de la Frontera, Cádiz.  Our idea was born from the passion for this great board game as players felt the need to bring the game to its fullest, this idea leads to the conclusion manufacture a full stadium to play games with the whole context that this game deserve but without the need to have our stadium mounted at all times occupying an entire room of our house.  After carefully studying the draft proposal emerged to campaign for your help, our concept to the homes of those fans who passionately as we live this hobby.  Our transportable stadium trying to convey the best aesthetics of a stadium with the functionality to take home to friends, tournaments and to keep it in any corner of your home.  This is our idea ... hope to succeed with your help because without it we are only stay in a particular project.

Delivery will be in March 2015, if any buyer purchase rectified we have no other choice but to return 80 % of the total invested by way of paperwork , both indiegogo and paypal .

story:
We made a playable demo-version of SpellFront.  You can download it here.

 

Here is a brief description of some of the features of our game:

The magic is in your hands

Your every spell is unique and has a special role in the battle: set fire to enemies, lure them into electric traps and destroy with acid bombs.

Break and change

Use magic to influence your surroundings. Use your surroundings to win the enemies: melt, crash and freeze.

Classic shooter in its pure form

One hero is against hundreds of enemies. Change spells on the run, use the environment, adjust and shoot in all directions!

Explore the world

Pick up suitable spells to find secrets, traverse traps and solve puzzles.

Kill them all

Challenge the most diverse types of opponents: from combat robots to stone golems. Each of them has its own strengths and weaknesses; each needs its own approach.

 

- Steppe Hare Studio consists of people who love games since childhood. We grew up in the same village, played together on NES and Sega, shared cartridges and dreamed of creating games themselves one day. Many years have passed since that time, but we are still friends and now we are engaged in our hobby on a professional level. We started with the creation of games for mobile platforms, and one of our first works was a top-down shooter called Ink Defense. Later we released on Steam such games as Mother Simulator and Irony of Nightmare - they both received a very positive reviews from players.

Our new game SpellFront is a love letter to the classic shooters of the past, where interesting guns, fast gameplay and various enemies make that magic mixture, because of which in childhood we could not tear ourselves away from computers.

 

- We try to put something new and prove ourselves in every project. Irony of Nightmare opened the doors on Steam for us, thanks to Mother Simulator the sites like Kotaku, IGN, PC Gamer and Game Spark wrote about us, and the videos with the game collected millions of views (thanks to the YouTube channels like Markplier, Kuplinov, GamesEduUu, Jelly, PockySweets and others).

With our new game, we want to take a fresh look at the shooters of the past, with whom our childhood passed. But we are still the same small team of friends, we are still living in the same village, and we haven’t enough money to give this project its due. We want to add more spells, more locations and more enemies. And to do this we need your help.

We think that SpellFront is a great game, and in order to give it all the necessary time, we need support from the outside. Most of the collected funds will go to this goal.

In SpellFront, we try to recreate the atmosphere of old shooters of those times when they were not launched to watch interactive film. And this means - hordes of various enemies, many types of weapons and endless skirmishes. Below we will give some examples of what is already in the game.

During the game you have to fight with alien foot troops, mythical beasts and just strange and terrible monsters. Thanks to the use of Epic Games assets (such as Infinity Blade or Paragon), we can pay more attention to the development of gameplay, the behavior of opponents and spells. These enemies are already in the game, the rest are on the way:

Iron grunts are stormtroopers of our game. Ordinary members of the interstellar army are armed with various types of weapons: from halberds to rocket-propelled guns. You will destroy them in force.

 

Clawfoots – most of these giant animals previously lived only in the forbidden valley of the Lotus. Actually, the valley became forbidden because of them. The first alien troops became interested in these stupid but aggressive beasts, and took them under their control. Now the clawfoots act as living rams for the invader forces.

 

Kobolds - these little evil creatures have only the beginnings of intelligence. They consider the newcomers to be gods, and are happy to give their lives for them, preferably someone else's.

 

The forest troll is a dumb and violent creature, which, to the great regret of all the inhabitants of the forgotten lands, has incredibly high level of strength and incredibly low level of patience.

Acid bombs are the embodiment of corrosion, these acid-load projectiles can stick to almost any solid surface (including enemies). With a press of a button you will blow up all the released bombs, damaging those who are in the radius of the explosion. Acidic charges also excel at destroying metal. Among other things, this means that steel bars or doors are no longer a barrier to you.

 

Devil's hands - this spell allows you to dramatically increase the length of your hand for a short period of time, causing serious crushing damage over a huge distance. Devil's hands have excellent accuracy, but the rapid use of this spell is impossible - before the attack, the magic must be restored. The strike is accompanied by a powerful impulse, allowing you to easily push even very heavy objects ... or enemies.

Spheres of thunder – these sorcery creates a dozen tiny spheres, each of which contains a discharge of several thousand volts inside. Spheres do great damage at close distance, but this is not the only way to use them. The released spheres stay in the air for quite a long time, which will allow you to use them as improvised traps. These areas can also power alien mechanisms that mean you can use alien technology against them.

 

The ray of cold - this spell creates a thin ray of spontaneous energy, freezing everything that it touches, including your opponents. A ray of cold will allow you to not only slow down enemies, but also create ice tracks to walk on water or lava. This spell will also slow down particularly fast mechanisms, making the world exploration a bit safer.

 

 

Risks and Challenges

For our previous work, we also tried to raise funds for Indiegogo - and although we did not succeed, we completed Mother Simulator on our own, and it was well received by the players. Therefore, regardless of whether we can achieve the goal on Indiegogo or not, we are still going to finish the project. But thanks to you, we hope to make the SpellFront even better and more colorful.

 

Other ways you can help

Many people choose games because of friend advice. If you think that our game is something a certain person would like, please tell them about it. Or just share news about project on social media that will help too.

Therefore, regardless of whether we can achieve the goal on Indiegogo or not, we are still going to finish the project. But thanks to you, we hope to make the SpellFront even better and more colorful. Other ways you can helpMany people choose games because of friend advice. If you think that our game is something a certain person would like, please tell them about it. Or just share news about project on social media that will help too.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
