story:
Update 10.07.2014:

Let your voice be heard! Take just a few minutes to tell us what you would like the trophy room to be like!

Tell us now



We got mentioned by our affiliate media outlets!


GOAL 2014 Football Manager is a completely free football (soccer) management game, with no in-app purchases or pay-to-win options for iOS and Android operating systems. It was developed by the creative minds of the staff at Goal Games in just over six months. We are now able to provide daily entertainment to over 10,000 users! GOAL 2014 Football Manager has become a mindset for those who engage in it. It is a community. It is a game. And it is ever evolving.


Watch our Trailer to get a feeling for our game! 




First and foremost we want to develop the highest-quality product while always keeping it free for you! Currently we are self-funded and we can only live up to our aspirations and goals by gaining more users. Today our game is one of the best mobile football managers out there, but we want to implement big improvements so that it can be not just great, but top of the class! Support us and allow us to make the best possible mobile game for you and other sports fans and managers alike.

If you don’t know GFM yet, you can download it and play for free in Android and iOS devices: 


                  





GOAL Football Manager is the only mobile football manager simulation in the industry with no in-game purchases or pay-to-win options. We want to be able to keep it this way but at the same time give you the improvements and features that you ask for and expect. We are a small company, with games and football fans, and as such, we like to be part of this community and take good care of our users.

So we started gathering all the requests and suggestions from all of the football managers. We evaluated which ones are most wanted, how much time it would take us to implement and decided that it was too long! We want to do them all, and we want to do them much faster than what our current capabilities allow us to do. So we need your help so that you can enjoy all of the features that you can see here!


We have a very particular plan on what exactly we will use the funds for! Take a look:



Improved live ticker: $1000

  • Our live-ticker will be improved to show many realistic goal situations.

National and worldwide ranking: $2500

  • You will be able to see where you rank against opponents from your own country as well as a worldwide scale.

Player positions: $5000

  • You will able to choose more specific positions than only defender, midfielder or attacker.

Trophy room: $7500

  • Take a look at your awards! You will be able to access a special “Trophy room” where you will find all the trophies and awards that you receive from the Cup,  League, contests and other in-game achievements. We will be asking for your opinion to know what kind of awards you might like to receive.

Player characteristics: $10000

  • You will be able to see more detailed information and characteristics of your players such as faces, height, weight, nationality, dominant foot, etc. We will be asking for your opinion to know what kind of information and characteristics of your players you would like to see.

Youth academy: $15000

  • You will be able to invest in young players to improve your team in the future or just to get some money.

Improved / Revamped Transfer list: $20000

  • You will able to hire a football scout to search for specific players with specific attributes. 

Stadium infrastructure: $25000

  • You will be able to invest in additional buildings/shops for your stadium to be able to earn more money in other ways.

Facebook app integration: $30000

  • GOAL Football Manager will be available to play on the Facebook platform


Here is the plan for how the support funds will be distributed:




The idea came to Arne when he was in Cologne a couple of years ago. He was bored in his hotel room after a long day and wanted to play a game that was fun, enjoyable and entertaining. The problem was that he could not find a game that would also be free, without in-app purchases and without other payment requirements! He saw a hole in the market and decided to develop a game that would be both fun and free, and pledged to keep it free at whatever the cost. We have learned so much throughout this journey - experiments that failed, things that worked, and the evolution of an idea that now exists as something more than just an app. 

Q1: What is GFM 2014?

GOAL 2014 Football Manager (GFM) is a mobile game for iOS and Android phones and tablets. The game’s main focus is to let players manage their own team in order to win the league and other competitions. It is, was and always will be free.

With GOAL 2014 FM, managers can:

·    Create their own club

·    Manage finances by choosing sponsors, improving stadiums, setting ticket           prices etc.

·    Buy and sell players

·    Set training to improve their player's attributes

·    Compete in 7 leagues and a global Cup

·    Set the line-up and choose a playing style

·    Follow the game through the live-ticker

·    Much, much more

Q2: Where is GFM 2014 available?

GFM 2014 is available worldwide in every country! 

Q3: Where can I download GFM 2014?

You can download GFM 2014 in the iTunes App Store, Google Play Store and many other alternative markets.

Q4: What are your plans with the received funds?

With the received funds, we plan to expand our team and expertise so that we can improve the quality and quantity of our updates and new features. The main objective however is to increase our speed of work so that we can progress quicker with our goals, in order to keep our football managers happy and continue to keep it free. In the description of our campaign you can see a detailed list of the features we plan to implement depending on the goal that we reach.

Q5: When will the new features be available?

If everything goes by plan and we reach our goals, we intend to start implementing the updates in August, and have them all ready by the end of January 2015.

Q6: Will GFM 2014 always stay free?

GFM 2014 was, is and always will be free.

Q7: If GFM will always be free, why should I support your project?

Because we want to be able to give you all the best features which we are not capable of implementing at the moment.

Q8: How can I promote your project?

Any form of spreading the word is encouraged! You can talk to friends about it, post on social media such as Twitter, Facebook, Google+, YouTube and anything else you may use. Please share your opinions!

Q9: How can I contact you?

You can always engage with us in the comments section. We will make sure to get back to you as soon as possible.

However, if you would like to know more, or you are a journalist or blogger, feel free to email us at marketing@goal-games.de

Another way of getting in touch with us is via Social media platforms!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayGOALFM

Twitter: https://twitter.com/GFM_2014

Google +: https://plus.google.com/111131011290686340972/about

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/GFM2014

You can also visit our website: http://www.goal-games.de/

Q9: Where do I join the discussion community and share my ideas?

You can join the discussion on this platform in the comment section or you can visit our own forum http://forum.goal-games.de/ .

Q10: I don't have a credit card or a Paypal account. How can I support you?

If you don't have a credit card or a Paypal account you can also support us with a bank transfer. Please contact us! support@goal-games.de



GOAL 2014 Fußball Manager ist eine komplett kostenlose Fußball Manager-Simulation für iOS- und Android-Geräte, die vollständig auf In-Game-Käufe und Pay-to-win-Optionen verzichtet. Das Mobile Game wurde innerhalb von sechs Monaten von Goal Games’ kreativen Köpfen entwickelt. Momentan kommen täglich über 10.000 User in den Genuss unseres Spiels. Rund um GOAL 2014 Fußball Manager hat sich eine eigenständige Denkweise entwickelt. Es ist eine Community. Es ist ein Spiel, das sich ständig weiterentwickelt.

Schaut Euch unseren Trailer an, um ein Gefühl für das Spiel zu bekommen!




In erster Linie wollen wir für Euch ein qualitativ hochwertiges Spiel entwickeln, das immer kostenlos kostenlos bleiben soll. Derzeit sind wir eigenfinanziert und können unseren hohen Ansprüchen nur dann gerecht werden, wenn wir mehr Spieler für GOAL 2014 Fußball Manager gewinnen. Aus heutiger Sicht ist unser Spiel eines der besten mobilen Fußball Manager. Um GFM weiter zu verbessern, haben wir viele Verbesserungen geplant, die das Spiel besser als je zuvor machen werden! Unterstützt uns und erlaubt uns, das bestmöglichste Mobile Game für euch und andere Sport- und Manager-Fans zu entwickeln.

Falls Ihr GFM noch nicht kennt, könnt Ihr es hier kostenlos für Android und iOS herunterladen:


         


GOAL 2014 Fußball ist die einzige mobile Fußball Manager-Simulation auf dem Markt, die ohne In-Game-Käufe und Pay-to-win-Optionen auskommt. Wir wollen Euch auch weiterhin das Spiel kostenlos anbieten und mit den von Euch gewünschten Verbesserungen und neuen Features erweitern. Mit unserer kleinen Firma samt Gamern und Fußballfans wollen wir Teil dieser Community sein und uns um eure Anliegen kümmern.

Daher haben wir damit angefangen all die Wünsche und Anregungen von unserer Community zu sammeln und diese nach verschiedenen Kriterien, wie Verbesserung des Spielerlebnisses, Zeitaufwand etc. auszuwerten.Da wir die neuen Features für Euch so schnell wie möglich umsetzen möchten, brauchen wir Eure Unterstützung!



Wir haben einen Plan ausgearbeitet, der euch verdeutlicht, wofür die zusätzlichen Mittel verwenden werden! Schaut es Euch an:



Verbesserter Live-Ticker: $1000

  • Unser Live-Ticker wird verbessert und wird realistische Spielsituationen beinhalten.

Nationales und Weltweites Ranking-System: $2500

  • Mit dem neuen Ranking-System könnt ihr sehen, wie ihr Euch im Vergleich zu Gegnern aus Eurem eigenen Land sowie weltweit schlagt.

Neue Spielerpositionen: $5000

  • Die neuen Spielerpositionen geben Euch die Möglichkeit exakte Positionen auszuwählen anstatt lediglich (Torwart), Vertreidiger, Mittelfeldspieler und Stürmer.

Trophy room: $7500

  • Mit dem „Trophy room“ könnt Ihr einen Blick auf Eure Auszeichnungen und Trophäen werfen, die Ihr in den Pokal- und Liga-Wettbewerben sowie durch andere Achievements bekommen habt. Während der Kampagne werden wir euch bezüglich der Auszeichnungen nach Eurer Meinung fragen.

Erweiterte Spielereigenschaften: $10000

  • Die Spielereigenschaften werden erweitert und werden Gesichter, Größe, Gewicht, Nationalität, bevorzugter Fuß, etc. beinhalten. Während der Kampagne werden wir euch bezüglich der Spielereigenschaften nach Eurer Meinung fragen.

Jugendakademie: $15000

  • Mit der Jugendakademie könnt Ihr euer Geld in junge, talentierte Spieler investieren, um entweder Euer Team langfristig zu verbessern und/oder später mit Ihnen Geld zu verdienen.

Überarbeitete Transferliste: $20000

  • Mit der überarbeiteten Transferliste werdet Ihr die Möglichkeit bekommen einen Scout zu verpflichten, mit dem Ihr nach bestimmten Spielern (Spielerpositionen) mit bestimmten Attributen suchen könnt.

Stadiuminfrastruktur: $25000

  • Mit der Stadiuminfrastruktur kommt eine weitere Einnahmensquelle ins Spiel, die es Euch erlaubt in zusätzliche Gebäude / Shops zu investieren.

Facebook App-Einbindung: $30000

  • Spielt GOAL Fußball Manager auf der Facebook-Plattform.





Die Idee zum GOAL 2014 Fußball Manager kam Arne vor ein paar Jahren in Köln. Nach einem langen Tag saß er gelangweilt in seinem Hotelzimmer und sehnte sich nach einem Spiel, das ihm Spaß und Unterhaltung bietet. Das Problem war, dass er kein Spiel finden konnte, das kostenlos ist und ohne In-Game-Käufe sowie Pay-to-win-Optionen auskommt. Darin sah er eine Marktlücke und entschied sich dafür ein Spiel zu entwickeln, das unterhaltsam und kostenlos ist; mit dem Versprechen das dies immer so bleiben wird. Auf unserem Weg haben wir so viel gelernt - Experimente, die schief gegangen sind; Dinge, die nicht funktioniert haben; Die Entwicklung einer Idee, die mittlerweile mehr ist als eine bloße App.

Q1: Was ist GOAL 2014 Fußball Manager?

GOAL 2014 Fußball Manager (GFM) ist ein komplett kostenloses Mobile Game für iOS- und Android-Geräte. Beim GOAL 2014 Fußball Manager handelt es sich - wie der Name bereits verrät - um einen klassischen Fußballmanager. 

Beim GFM könnt ihr als Manager:

  • Einen eigenen Verein ins Leben rufen
  • Deine Finanzen verwalten (Sponsoren auswählen, Stadion ausbauen, Ticketpreise bestimmen)
  • Kaufe und verkaufe Spieler auf dem Transfermarkt
  • Lege das Training für die Spieler fest und verbessere deren Attribute
  • Trete in 7 verschiedenen Ligen und einem ligenübergreifenden Pokalwettbewerb an
  • Bestimme die Aufstellung und wähle eine Taktik aus
  • Verfolge deine Partien im Live-Ticker
  • Und viel, viel mehr

Q2: Wo ist GFM überhaupt verfügbar?

GFM ist weltweit verfügbar!

Q3: Wo kann ich GFM herunterladen?

Du kannst GFM im Google Play Store, in Apple‘s App Store und in vielen alternativen Stores herunterladen.

Q4: Was planen wir mit den zusätzlichen Geldmitteln? 

Mit Eurer Unterstützung wollen wir unser Team und Know-how erweitern, um die Qualität und Quantität der Updates und Features zu verbessern. Unser Hauptanliegen ist es, unsere Arbeitsgeschwindigkeit zu erhöhen, damit wir unsere Ziele schneller erreichen und die Wünsche unserer Fussball Manager-Community erfüllen können. In der Beschreibung unserer Kampagne könnt Ihr Euch unsere detaillierte Features-Liste anschauen, die wir mit den zusätzlichen Mitteln entwickeln möchten.

Q5: Wann werden die neuen Features verfügbar sein?

Wenn alles nach Plan verläuft und wir unsere Ziele erreichen, werden wir anfangen Euch die neuen Features ab August 2014 bis Ende Januar 2015 bereitzustellen.

Q6: Wird GFM für immer kostenlos bleiben?

GFM war, ist und wird immer kostenlos bleiben.

Q7: Warum sollte ich euch unterstützen, wenn GFM immer kostenlos bleiben wird?

Ganz einfach: Wir brauchen Eure Unterstützung, da wir Euch schnellstmöglichst die besten Features für den GFM liefern möchten, was ohne Euch nicht möglich ist.

Wie kann ich euer Projekt andersweitig fördern?

Jegliche Form von Promotion ist erwünscht. Sprich mit Freunden über GFM, poste über / teile unser Projekt auf Facebook, Google+, Twitter, YouTube und anderen sozialen Netzwerken.

Q8: Wie kann ich euch kontaktieren?

Auf der Fragen- / Kommentare-Seite werden wir alle eure Fragen schnellstmöglichst beantworten.

Falls du mehr über GFM erfahren möchstest oder ein Journalist oder Blogger bist, schreib uns doch bitte eine E-Mail an marketing@goal-games.de.

Natürlich kannst du uns auch auf den sozialen Netzwerken erreichen:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/GOAL-Football-Manager/727431880609164

Twitter: https://twitter.com/GOAL 2014 FM_2014

Google +: https://plus.google.com/111131011290686340972/about

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/GFM2014

Schau doch auch einmal auf unserer Website vorbei: http://www.goal-games.de/

Q9: Wo kann ich mit anderen Unterstützern diskutieren und meine Ideen teilen?

Du kannst auf der Plattform selbst mit anderen Unterstützern diskutieren oder unserem offiziellen Forum einen Besuch abstatten: http://forum.goal-games.de/.

Q10: Ich habe keine Kreditkarte und keinen PayPal-Account. Wie kann ich euch trotzdem unterstützen?

Falls Ihr keine Kredikarte euer Eigen nennt oder keinen PayPal-Account besitzt, könnt Ihr uns auch per Banküberweisung unterstützen. Bitte schreibt uns dafür an support@goal-games.de
story_txt:
Update 10.07.2014:Let your voice be heard! Take just a few minutes to tell us what you would like the trophy room to be like!Tell us now

We got mentioned by our affiliate media outlets!
 GOAL 2014 Football Manager is a completely free football (soccer) management game,
with no in-app purchases or pay-to-win options for iOS and Android operating
systems. It was developed by the creative minds of the staff at Goal Games in just over six months. We are now able to provide daily entertainment to over
10,000 users! GOAL 2014 Football Manager has become a mindset for those who
engage in it. It is a community. It is a game. And it is ever evolving.Watch our Trailer to get a feeling for our game! 
First and foremost we
want to develop the highest-quality product while always keeping it free for you!
Currently we are self-funded and we can only live up to our aspirations and
goals by gaining more users. Today our game is one of the best mobile football
managers out there, but we want to implement big improvements so that it can be
not just great, but top of the class! Support us and allow us to make the best possible
mobile game for you and other sports fans and managers alike.If you don’t know GFM
yet, you can download it and play for free in Android and iOS devices: 

         


        
GOAL Football Manager
is the only mobile football manager simulation in the industry with no in-game
purchases or pay-to-win options. We want to be able to keep it this way but at
the same time give you the improvements and features that you ask for and
expect. We are a small company, with games and football fans, and as such, we
like to be part of this community and take good care of our users.
So we started gathering
all the requests and suggestions from all of the football managers. We evaluated
which ones are most wanted, how much time it would take us to implement and
decided that it was too long! We want to do them all, and we want to do
them much faster than what our current capabilities allow us to do. So we need
your help so that you can enjoy all of the features that you can see here!We have a very particular plan on what exactly we will use the funds for! Take a look:Improved
live ticker: $1000

Our
     live-ticker will be improved to show many realistic goal situations.
National and worldwide
ranking: $2500

You
     will be able to see where you rank against opponents from your own country
     as well as a worldwide scale.
Player positions: $5000

You
     will able to choose more specific positions than only defender, midfielder
     or attacker.
Trophy room: $7500

Take a
     look at your awards! You will be able to access a special “Trophy room”
     where you will find all the trophies and awards that you receive from the
     Cup,  League, contests and other in-game achievements. We will be
     asking for your opinion to know what kind of awards you might like to
     receive.
Player characteristics: $10000

You
     will be able to see more detailed information and characteristics of your
     players such as faces, height, weight, nationality, dominant foot, etc. We
     will be asking for your opinion to know what kind of information and
     characteristics of your players you would like to see.
Youth academy: $15000

You
     will be able to invest in young players to improve your team in the future
     or just to get some money. 
Improved / Revamped
Transfer list: $20000

You
     will able to hire a football scout to search for specific players with specific attributes. 
Stadium infrastructure: $25000

You
     will be able to invest in additional buildings/shops for your stadium to
     be able to earn more money in other ways.
Facebook app integration: $30000

GOAL
     Football Manager will be available to play on the Facebook platform
Here is the plan for how the support funds will be distributed:The idea came to Arne when
he was in Cologne a couple of years ago. He was bored in his hotel room after a
long day and wanted to play a game that was fun, enjoyable and entertaining.
The problem was that he could not find a game that would also be free, without
in-app purchases and without other payment requirements! He saw a hole in the
market and decided to develop a game that would be both fun and free, and
pledged to keep it free at whatever the cost. We have learned so much
throughout this journey - experiments that failed, things that worked, and the
evolution of an idea that now exists as something more than just an app. Q1: What is GFM 2014?
GOAL 2014 Football Manager (GFM) is a mobile game for iOS and Android phones and
tablets. The game’s main focus is to let players manage their own team in order
to win the league and other competitions. It is, was and always will be free.
With GOAL 2014 FM, managers can:
·    Create their own club
·    Manage finances by
choosing sponsors, improving stadiums, setting ticket           prices etc.
·    Buy and sell players
·    Set training to improve
their player's attributes
·    Compete in 7 leagues
and a global Cup
·    Set the line-up and
choose a playing style
·    Follow the game through
the live-ticker
·    Much, much more
Q2: Where is GFM 2014 available?
GFM
2014 is available worldwide in every country! 
Q3: Where can I download GFM 2014?
You can download GFM 2014 in
the iTunes App Store, Google Play Store and many other
alternative markets.
Q4: What are your plans with the received funds?
With the received funds, we
plan to expand our team and expertise so that we can improve the quality and
quantity of our updates and new features. The main objective however is to
increase our speed of work so that we can progress quicker with our goals, in
order to keep our football managers happy and continue to keep
it free. In the description of our campaign you can see a detailed list of the
features we plan to implement depending on the goal that we reach.
Q5: When will the new features be
available?
If
everything goes by plan and we reach our goals, we intend to start implementing
the updates in August, and have them all ready by the end of January 2015.
Q6: Will GFM 2014 always stay free?
GFM
2014 was, is and always will be free.
Q7: If GFM will always be free, why
should I support your project?
Because
we want to be able to give you all the best features which we are not capable of
implementing at the moment. 
Q8: How can I promote your project?
Any
form of spreading the word is encouraged! You can talk to friends about it,
post on social media such as Twitter, Facebook, Google+, YouTube and anything else you
may use. Please share your opinions!
Q9: How can I contact you?
You
can always engage with us in the comments section. We will make sure to get
back to you as soon as possible.
However,
if you would like to know more, or you are a journalist or blogger, feel free
to email us at marketing@goal-games.de 
Another
way of getting in touch with us is via Social media platforms! 
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/PlayGOALFM
Twitter:
https://twitter.com/GFM_2014
Google
+: https://plus.google.com/111131011290686340972/about
Youtube:
https://www.youtube.com/user/GFM2014
You
can also visit our website: http://www.goal-games.de/
Q9: Where do I join the discussion
community and share my ideas?
You
can join the discussion on this platform in the comment section or you can
visit our own forum http://forum.goal-games.de/ .Q10: I don't have a credit card or a Paypal account. How can I support you?If you don't have a credit card or a Paypal account you can also support us with a bank transfer. Please contact us! support@goal-games.de 

 GOAL 2014 Fußball Manager ist eine
komplett kostenlose Fußball Manager-Simulation für iOS- und Android-Geräte, die
vollständig auf In-Game-Käufe und
Pay-to-win-Optionen verzichtet. Das Mobile Game wurde innerhalb von sechs Monaten
von Goal Games’ kreativen Köpfen entwickelt. Momentan kommen täglich über 10.000
User in den Genuss unseres Spiels. Rund um GOAL 2014 Fußball Manager hat sich
eine eigenständige Denkweise entwickelt. Es ist eine Community. Es ist ein
Spiel, das sich ständig weiterentwickelt.Schaut Euch unseren Trailer an, um ein Gefühl für das Spiel zu bekommen!In erster Linie wollen wir für
Euch ein qualitativ hochwertiges Spiel entwickeln, das immer kostenlos kostenlos bleiben soll.
Derzeit sind wir eigenfinanziert und können unseren hohen Ansprüchen nur dann
gerecht werden, wenn wir mehr Spieler für GOAL 2014 Fußball Manager gewinnen. Aus
heutiger Sicht ist unser Spiel eines der besten mobilen Fußball Manager. Um GFM
weiter zu verbessern, haben wir viele Verbesserungen geplant, die das Spiel besser
als je zuvor machen werden! Unterstützt uns und erlaubt uns, das bestmöglichste
Mobile Game für euch und andere Sport- und Manager-Fans zu entwickeln.Falls Ihr GFM noch nicht kennt, könnt Ihr es hier kostenlos für Android
und iOS herunterladen:         GOAL 2014
Fußball ist die einzige mobile Fußball Manager-Simulation auf dem Markt, die
ohne In-Game-Käufe und Pay-to-win-Optionen auskommt. Wir wollen Euch auch
weiterhin das Spiel kostenlos anbieten und mit den von Euch gewünschten Verbesserungen
und neuen Features erweitern. Mit unserer kleinen Firma samt Gamern und
Fußballfans wollen wir Teil dieser Community sein und uns um eure Anliegen
kümmern.

Daher haben wir damit
angefangen all die Wünsche und Anregungen von unserer Community zu sammeln und
diese nach verschiedenen Kriterien, wie Verbesserung des Spielerlebnisses, Zeitaufwand
etc. auszuwerten.Da wir die neuen Features für Euch so schnell wie möglich
umsetzen möchten, brauchen wir Eure Unterstützung!Wir haben einen Plan ausgearbeitet, der euch verdeutlicht,
wofür die zusätzlichen Mittel verwenden werden! Schaut es Euch an:Verbesserter Live-Ticker:
$1000
Unser Live-Ticker wird verbessert und wird
realistische Spielsituationen beinhalten.

Nationales und Weltweites Ranking-System: $2500
Mit dem neuen Ranking-System könnt ihr sehen,
wie ihr Euch im Vergleich zu Gegnern aus Eurem eigenen Land sowie weltweit
schlagt.

Neue Spielerpositionen: $5000
Die neuen
Spielerpositionen geben Euch die Möglichkeit exakte Positionen
auszuwählen anstatt lediglich (Torwart), Vertreidiger, Mittelfeldspieler und
Stürmer.

Trophy room: $7500
Mit dem „Trophy room“ könnt Ihr
     einen Blick auf Eure Auszeichnungen und Trophäen werfen, die Ihr in den
     Pokal- und Liga-Wettbewerben sowie durch andere Achievements bekommen habt.
     Während der Kampagne werden wir euch bezüglich der Auszeichnungen nach
     Eurer Meinung fragen.

Erweiterte Spielereigenschaften: $10000
Die Spielereigenschaften werden
     erweitert und werden Gesichter, Größe, Gewicht, Nationalität, bevorzugter
     Fuß, etc. beinhalten. Während der Kampagne werden wir euch bezüglich der
     Spielereigenschaften nach Eurer Meinung fragen.

Jugendakademie: $15000
Mit der Jugendakademie könnt
     Ihr euer Geld in junge, talentierte Spieler investieren, um entweder Euer
     Team langfristig zu verbessern und/oder später mit Ihnen Geld zu verdienen.

Überarbeitete Transferliste: $20000
Mit der überarbeiteten
     Transferliste werdet Ihr die Möglichkeit bekommen einen Scout zu
     verpflichten, mit dem Ihr nach bestimmten Spielern (Spielerpositionen) mit
     bestimmten Attributen suchen könnt.

Stadiuminfrastruktur: $25000
Mit der
     Stadiuminfrastruktur kommt eine weitere Einnahmensquelle ins Spiel, die es
     Euch erlaubt in zusätzliche Gebäude / Shops zu investieren.

Facebook App-Einbindung: $30000
Spielt GOAL Fußball Manager auf
     der Facebook-Plattform.

story:
It has been brought to my attention that there is some confusion about the alpha/beta-mode access. You will recieve the game when it enters alpha/beta mode and recieve updates. When the game is finished you will own it.
I wont give my loyal fans alpha/beta mode only and expect them to buy the finished game... thats just wrong.

So...Who Are You?

Hello Everyone. My name is Justin Hornsby and I am the founder (and the only member) of an indie video game development company called Hidden Clan Studio which is currently based in me and my wife's tiny rented studio apartment. I am entirely self taught on how to make games and started tinkering with video games with my older brother when I was around 13 years old.   My goal is to provide people with fun and original games that challenge players but also allows them to feel in control of the game instead of being led from point to point.

 

What Is Your Project's Goal?

My current goal is simple but probably the most important:  Spread news about this great game to more people! No matter how great a game is, if no one knows about it, how can they enjoy it? 

By helping me with this goal, you not only help someone achieve one of their dreams of making a great game that people will love, you help more people become aware of this game, which means more people to play with!

What Is Wolf's Moon?

 

So what is Wolf's Moon, you ask?  It is a 1st person multiplayer game that combines survival, teamwork, betrayal, subterfuge, and werewolves.  The premises of the game is a group of friends (the players) go camping together,out in a remote mountain resort. But unfortunently one of the players is a werewolf (random chosen player) who decides this would be the best time to increase his/her pack (infect other players) or enjoy a nice buffet. Of course, s/he doesnt want any human players to escape.  Their goal is simple. kill or infect all the other players.  The players that are human have one goal: escape.  They do not need to kill the werewolf to win, but doing so will make the escape easier! They only need to make it back to civilization.

The enviroment will play factors in a human's survival. They need to eat and stay warm to survive! Werewolves do not (although they can pretend they do).

 The game encourages players to lie and trick each other to convince the other members who is a werewolf or not. Werewolves can change into humans and back at will, and human players have no way of telling who is a werewolf or not, short of actually witnessing them transform.

For example: A werewolf can reveal his wolfy nature to the players and choose to be hunted, while secretly he has already infected another player, who uses the oppurtunity to gain the human players trust, setting them up for potential traps.  Another example is human suspects the werewolf is hiding in a cabin that contains much needed supplies. He can suggest to one of the human players to scout inside while he provides backup, but instead uses his "friend" as wolf-bait to try and escape.

It is entirely up to the player's imagination on how to fool the other players or be honest and enjoy being hunted while hunting!

 

 

Check out our Youtube channel to see more videos!

 

Why Do You Need Our Help?

All donations are strictly to help me advertise the game to the public. I am currently married, a college student trying to get his Bachelor's degree, and working while barely making enough for me and my wife to get...and bless my wife's heart. She has shown infinite support and patience with me and the game! All left over money I have after bills goes to funding Wolf's Moon, which is at most $50 a month.
   The $800 I'm asking help to achieve will be used strictly to help advertise the game to the public. (commericals, ads, youtube commericals, etc...).  

The truth is, it will actually cost more than $800 to advertise on a large scale, but I will continue to use my personal funds to help with that. The $800 is to help get started. Everyone knows the hardest part of almost anything is getting started. And that is all im asking for right now: To help get me started.

Any additional donations will also be used to help advertise the game or help the game itself. (upgrading the system, hiring extra help, etc.)     Not one penny will be used for personal use. My dream is to make a great game, and I will not do anything to jeopordize it. Buisiness before Pleasure as the saying goes. :P

Even if my goal is not reached, all donated funds will be used to advertise the game, and I will still give out rewards!

Why Should I Help?

Aside from helping me make this game more open to the public which results in more players for you to play the game with, I will be giving out great rewards! Who doesn't love those!?

For $25 or more:

 Your name in the Credits!  Show everyone that you helped make this game!

For $30 or more:    **For only the first 20 people**
Aside from your name being in the credits you will also recieve an email from me to thank you personally.
(I will need your email address)

For $50 or more:
Recieve a Wolf's Moon Unisex T-shirt and have your name added into the credits! What a great way to show your Wolf's Moon spirit! (please say which color you would like and what size!)  You will also recieve access to the beta-mode!

Colors available are Black and White. Any size is good!

 

*Says "Support Us on Facebook" on the back under company logo*

*Will also say "Support Us on Facebook" on the back under the company logo*

 

For $75 or more:  **For only the first 10 people**
 Your name will be added into the credits, but you will also recieve an autographed Wolf's Moon T-shirt from me as well as a personal handwritten thank you letter! You will also recieve access to the beta-mode!

**** All rewards from here on will include access to the Beta-mode****

For $100 or more :   **For only the first 20 people**
  Immortalize your face in the game!  Send us a photo, and we will add it into the game. See if you can find your picture while playing the game!
(nothing inappropriate please!)
 You will also recieve a Wolf's Moon Unisex T-shirt as well as have your name added into a new place in the credits.

For $125 or more:

Recieve 2 Wolf's Moon Unisex T-shirts and your name added into another section of the credits.

For $150 or more:
Not only will you recieve 2 Wolf's Moon Unisex T-shirts and have your named moved to a special section of the credits, You will also be given access to the playable demo when it is released! The demo will be in the form of a singleplayer tutorial.  Get an extra edge on the other players!

For $250 or more:

You will recieve 2 Wolf's Moon Unisex T-shirts, your name moved to a special section of the credits, given the demo, AND have access to the alpha-mode of the game!
   Perfect your skills on the demo, and then show them to everyone on the alpha-mode!

 For $300 or more:  ** For only the first 5 people!!!*

Recieve Wolf's Moon3-Tshirts signed by me, the demo when it is finished, your name added into the game's credits (unique section), access to alpha-mode of the game, and a unique custom made plush werewolf doll that you cant get anywhere else! The doll is hand-woven by my wife so it may arrive in a seperate package.

For $500 or more:
 You will recieve everything from the previous tier (Spread the Infection) minus the doll. But you will also recieve a rare book  that is related to the Wolf's Moon game.  (The contents of the book are a secret!)

For $1000 or more:   **limited to only the first 3 people!!**

Besides the previous gifts you will also recieve a ONE OF A KIND custom made T-shirt featuring you as one of the Hidden Clan Members, photos showing how changed your photo to the hidden clan logo, Your name will be IN the game (not just credits), will be the first person to know of any upcoming games (which will be included for free as a gift once released),and finally will be added into Hidden Clan Studio's Hall of Fame Members list.

You will also recieve a unique prize that I will mention in a personal email!

 

Why Is It So Important? 

By helping advertise the game, you not only recruit more players to enjoy the game with, you help increase the chances of the game being greenlit on steam and supported on other media as well!

 If I am unable to build a large enough audiance, it will take longer for the game to be greenlit on steam and will take longer to be released to the world.  But I want to assure everyone, that even if I am unalbe to meet my goal and advertise the game, I will CONTINUE TO WORK ON THIS GAME!  Producton for the game will not stop until it is 100% finished.  So win or lose, I promise you, this game will be released.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that some people are unable to donate at this time... But that doesnt mean you can't still help out!    There are various free ways to help out as well!

Please be sure to tell your friends about Wolf's Moon!  The more people know about it, the better!
Like and Share us on facebook! https://www.facebook.com/#!/HiddenClan.WolfsMoon

Tell everyone about this project!

Be sure to vote for us once we are on Steam's Greenlight!

 

Thank you everyone for taking the time to read this and helping this game become a reality!!
story_txt: It has been brought to my attention that there is some confusion about the alpha/beta-mode access. You will recieve the game when it enters alpha/beta mode and recieve updates. When the game is finished you will own it. I wont give my loyal fans alpha/beta mode only and expect them to buy the finished game... thats just wrong. So...Who Are You?Hello Everyone. My name is Justin Hornsby and I am the founder (and the only member) of an indie video game development company called Hidden Clan Studio which is currently based in me and my wife's tiny rented studio apartment. I am entirely self taught on how to make games and started tinkering with video games with my older brother when I was around 13 years old.   My goal is to provide people with fun and original games that challenge players but also allows them to feel in control of the game instead of being led from point to point. What Is Your Project's Goal?My current goal is simple but probably the most important:  Spread news about this great game to more people! No matter how great a game is, if no one knows about it, how can they enjoy it?  By helping me with this goal, you not only help someone achieve one of their dreams of making a great game that people will love, you help more people become aware of this game, which means more people to play with!What Is Wolf's Moon? So what is Wolf's Moon, you ask?  It is a 1st person multiplayer game that combines survival, teamwork, betrayal, subterfuge, and werewolves.  The premises of the game is a group of friends (the players) go camping together,out in a remote mountain resort. But unfortunently one of the players is a werewolf (random chosen player) who decides this would be the best time to increase his/her pack (infect other players) or enjoy a nice buffet. Of course, s/he doesnt want any human players to escape.  Their goal is simple. kill or infect all the other players.  The players that are human have one goal: escape.  They do not need to kill the werewolf to win, but doing so will make the escape easier! They only need to make it back to civilization.The enviroment will play factors in a human's survival. They need to eat and stay warm to survive! Werewolves do not (although they can pretend they do). The game encourages players to lie and trick each other to convince the other members who is a werewolf or not. Werewolves can change into humans and back at will, and human players have no way of telling who is a werewolf or not, short of actually witnessing them transform.For example: A werewolf can reveal his wolfy nature to the players and choose to be hunted, while secretly he has already infected another player, who uses the oppurtunity to gain the human players trust, setting them up for potential traps.  Another example is human suspects the werewolf is hiding in a cabin that contains much needed supplies. He can suggest to one of the human players to scout inside while he provides backup, but instead uses his "friend" as wolf-bait to try and escape.It is entirely up to the player's imagination on how to fool the other players or be honest and enjoy being hunted while hunting!  Check out our Youtube channel to see more videos! Why Do You Need Our Help?All donations are strictly to help me advertise the game to the public. I am currently married, a college student trying to get his Bachelor's degree, and working while barely making enough for me and my wife to get...and bless my wife's heart. She has shown infinite support and patience with me and the game! All left over money I have after bills goes to funding Wolf's Moon, which is at most $50 a month.   The $800 I'm asking help to achieve will be used strictly to help advertise the game to the public. (commericals, ads, youtube commericals, etc...).  The truth is, it will actually cost more than $800 to advertise on a large scale, but I will continue to use my personal funds to help with that. The $800 is to help get started. Everyone knows the hardest part of almost anything is getting started. And that is all im asking for right now: To help get me started.Any additional donations will also be used to help advertise the game or help the game itself. (upgrading the system, hiring extra help, etc.)     Not one penny will be used for personal use. My dream is to make a great game, and I will not do anything to jeopordize it. Buisiness before Pleasure as the saying goes. :PEven if my goal is not reached, all donated funds will be used to advertise the game, and I will still give out rewards!Why Should I Help?Aside from helping me make this game more open to the public which results in more players for you to play the game with, I will be giving out great rewards! Who doesn't love those!?For $25 or more: Your name in the Credits!  Show everyone that you helped make this game!For $30 or more:    **For only the first 20 people** Aside from your name being in the credits you will also recieve an email from me to thank you personally. (I will need your email address)For $50 or more:Recieve a Wolf's Moon Unisex T-shirt and have your name added into the credits! What a great way to show your Wolf's Moon spirit! (please say which color you would like and what size!)  You will also recieve access to the beta-mode!Colors available are Black and White. Any size is good!  *Says "Support Us on Facebook" on the back under company logo**Will also say "Support Us on Facebook" on the back under the company logo* For $75 or more:  **For only the first 10 people** Your name will be added into the credits, but you will also recieve an autographed Wolf's Moon T-shirt from me as well as a personal handwritten thank you letter! You will also recieve access to the beta-mode!**** All rewards from here on will include access to the Beta-mode****For $100 or more :   **For only the first 20 people**  Immortalize your face in the game!  Send us a photo, and we will add it into the game. See if you can find your picture while playing the game! (nothing inappropriate please!) You will also recieve a Wolf's Moon Unisex T-shirt as well as have your name added into a new place in the credits. For $125 or more:Recieve 2 Wolf's Moon Unisex T-shirts and your name added into another section of the credits.For $150 or more:Not only will you recieve 2 Wolf's Moon Unisex T-shirts and have your named moved to a special section of the credits, You will also be given access to the playable demo when it is released! The demo will be in the form of a singleplayer tutorial.  Get an extra edge on the other players!For $250 or more:You will recieve 2 Wolf's Moon Unisex T-shirts, your name moved to a special section of the credits, given the demo, AND have access to the alpha-mode of the game!   Perfect your skills on the demo, and then show them to everyone on the alpha-mode! For $300 or more:  ** For only the first 5 people!!!*Recieve Wolf's Moon3-Tshirts signed by me, the demo when it is finished, your name added into the game's credits (unique section), access to alpha-mode of the game, and a unique custom made plush werewolf doll that you cant get anywhere else! The doll is hand-woven by my wife so it may arrive in a seperate package.For $500 or more: You will recieve everything from the previous tier (Spread the Infection) minus the doll. But you will also recieve a rare book  that is related to the Wolf's Moon game.  (The contents of the book are a secret!)For $1000 or more:   **limited to only the first 3 people!!**Besides the previous gifts you will also recieve a ONE OF A KIND custom made T-shirt featuring you as one of the Hidden Clan Members, photos showing how changed your photo to the hidden clan logo, Your name will be IN the game (not just credits), will be the first person to know of any upcoming games (which will be included for free as a gift once released),and finally will be added into Hidden Clan Studio's Hall of Fame Members list.You will also recieve a unique prize that I will mention in a personal email! Why Is It So Important? By helping advertise the game, you not only recruit more players to enjoy the game with, you help increase the chances of the game being greenlit on steam and supported on other media as well! If I am unable to build a large enough audiance, it will take longer for the game to be greenlit on steam and will take longer to be released to the world.  But I want to assure everyone, that even if I am unalbe to meet my goal and advertise the game, I will CONTINUE TO WORK ON THIS GAME!  Producton for the game will not stop until it is 100% finished.  So win or lose, I promise you, this game will be released.Other Ways You Can HelpI understand that some people are unable to donate at this time... But that doesnt mean you can't still help out!    There are various free ways to help out as well!Please be sure to tell your friends about Wolf's Moon!  The more people know about it, the better!Like and Share us on facebook! https://www.facebook.com/#!/HiddenClan.WolfsMoonTell everyone about this project!Be sure to vote for us once we are on Steam's Greenlight! Thank you everyone for taking the time to read this and helping this game become a reality!!

story:
UPDATE #13: PRODUCTION STATUS UPDATE


DreadOut Point of announcement

It's been a while guys, and thank you for your support until this day. Some of you might wonder with DreadOut development status. Right now we are still waiting for the legal, tax and others business document between our government and United States government. Meanwhile here's some our report regarding DreadOut production :

·  you can check our latest DreadOut teaser

http://youtu.be/EKMqm9xIxfE

·  DreadOut story mode will be split into two parts, first part will be release hopefully before end of the year tentative, and 2nd part will be unlockable later.
as for our special ghost design (design by all of you indiegogo backers) will be available as free roam mode DLC. Our backers will receive those DLC without any additional cost.

·  To  our beloved backers, we will give you DreadOut Beta key...the first chapter of the game. You guys will be the first one to experience what happen after end of DreadOut demo before we release DreadOut via Early Access in Steam.

·  For our Tortured Soul and backers and above, we'll send you the download link of DreadOut Digital OST, Digital Manga by email. Please kindly check your spam folder in the next couple days :D.

·  This is the picture of your DreadOut official merchandise, hope you guys love it. You guys will get this by the time we release our game, but if any of you urgently need this merchandise as soon as possible (in a matter of life and death), please give us a message. We'll arrange the delivery date of this merchandise to your door :)

·  For you guys Heart of Darkness, Angel of Darkness, Dark One backers, we will also send you some of our progress of your special ghosts design via email. Your ghosts will available in DreadOut free roaming ghost haunting mode.

·  Since we are still having some small issues regarding tax and administration, right now we cannot say the exact date of DreadOut public worldwide release. But if anything goes as we plan, DreadOut will be available late this year...wish us luck guys :)

For further info, we will open an AMA session on reddit DreadOut on 5th Thursday 11 am - 1pm EST , please join and ask us anything,meanwhile you can ask us anything, chat through steam or you can drop us email at contact@digitalhappiness.net We apologize for the inconvenience, we would like to thank you for all the support you have given us throughout the development of the DreadOut. We are looking forward to its release, estimated to be announced, as soon as the issue has been resolved."

best regards

Rachmad Imron

DreadOut Game Producer


UPDATE #12: THANK YOU

Thanks to all of you DreadOut backers here on indiegogo, we have moved our office to the new building with bigger space allowing everyone on the team to work under the same roof. Please kindly take this a short tour to our new office in this video:


Thank you again for all of your kind supports.

The DreadOut Team.

===========================================================

UPDATE #11:

The Dark One

Heavy Metal Inferno Poster Design

===========================================================

UPDATE #10:

We Made it :)

DreadOut is Fully Funded via Indiegogo, we are so excited, but we don't understand why somehow she looked so sad :)

Maybe this is not the best thank you letter, because actually we can't find the appropriate 
words to express our gratitude to all you guys. 

First of all We would like to announce that Digital Happiness has finally reach its goal in crowd funding DreadOut Game. We have surpassed $25.000 before the deadline, until the last minute we have gathered approximately Thanks to the people all around the world that have contribute and making it happen for our Game, without you we couldn't achieve this. Although we are strangers, we give our deepest respect for each other. 

The next phase for DreadOut is to full steam ahead in our game development while waiting for Steam Greenlight, We hope that DreadOut can pass the greenlight (crossing finger). Now DreadOut have been fully funded, we can put all our people resources to finish this game until November 2013, no more distraction. We are now responsible for 500++ people as our backers, We have the responsibility to give the best game experience for all of you. 

Thanks to GOD, all of our funders, fans, supporter, youtubers, game journalist, local international media, family, friends and relatives. We can't mention all you in this short announcement but You know who you are 

PS: For our funders We will add you in our newsletter, to give you update on DreadOut.

Cheers

DreadOut Development Team

===========================================================

UPDATE #9:

Okay guys, this is it.

Our campaign is nearing it's end, and we're about 22% short of our initial target. We need every bit of your help. The next few days will be the last chance to put your name on our credit title :)

Although we are on flexible funding, we put our heart and soul to achieve our campaign goal, because, we believe, the success of this crowdfunding campaign will play an important factor in getting through steam's greenlight program.

We value your support and contributions very highly. And as we've said before, even if the campaign fell short, you can be sure that our team will do whatever it takes to complete the development of DreadOut.

Hopefully, we'll accomplish returning the favor, when you guys are in the middle of playing the full release and screaming ! :p

DreadOut Development Team

===========================================================

UPDATE #8:

Here's a recap of our rewards. 
Hopefully it can give you a detailed information on what we want to present as rewards for your contributions :)

http://dreadout.com/images/perks-recap_high.jpg

===========================================================

UPDATE #7:

Additional Reward for $300 "Heart of Darkness" & $500 "Angel of Darkness" Perks!

will receive 17 cm Linda Unpainted Resin figure

here's our prototype sample  

also for "Angel of Darkness" will also receive Associate Producer on Credit Title 

===========================================================

UPDATE #6:

Additional Reward for $50 "Damned Soul" upwards Perks!

a digital copy of "Mystery magazine" : A ghost lore encyclopedia in the form of a cheap Indonesian supernatural magazine, peppered with clues relating to the game. :)

Additional Reward for $300 "Heart of Darkness" upwards Perks!

a printed copy of the aforementioned "Mistery magazine" 


===========================================================

UPDATE #5:

Thank You The Dark One!

here's our design progress so far regarding Linda's Silver Necklace replica

Made by silver craft specialists in Bali, You can also put your name on the box package/ leather bag or you can attach another name on it...:)

===========================================================

UPDATE #4:

We have made enhancements regarding some of our perks/rewards

We are giving additional DreadOut Exclusive A3 Print 70's Style Poster to all contributors for the $150 upwards tier rewards. :)

===========================================================

UPDATE #3:

Yay! DreadOut is featured on Bloodydisgusting.com as one of 

6 Upcoming Horror Games That Look Absolutely Terrifying

Greetings from us! Digital happiness Team from Indonesia

Thank you for your contributions so far :)

===========================================================

UPDATE #2:

3d Printing W.i.P

DreadOut also will be support by one of our dearest friend on
http://ada-ide.com/
https://www.facebook.com/adaide3dprinting


Thanks guys for bringing those ghost alive! next target Linda Figurine! :) 

===========================================================

UPDATE #1 :

We made MAJOR enhancements regarding some of our perks/rewards

1. We give additional digital copies to all contributors for the $75 upwards tier rewards;

  •  $75 = 2 copies (1 extra DreadOut Digital Copy)
  •  $150 = 3 copies 
  •  $300 = 5 copies
  •  $500 = 10 copies
  •  $1000 = 20 copies

2. For "Tortured Soul" Perks / $30 upwards will receive special key to unlock extra costumes   

DreadOut is 3D adventure horror game within an authentic local Indonesian setting.

  • Explore the mystical world of a cursed city from a 3rd person perspective.
  • Come face to face with your worst nightmares; terrifying authentic Indonesian ghosts like Tuyul, Pocong, Kunti, etc.
  • Share your ghost photographs through our online integration via facebook.
  • Experience an original and thrilling storyline.
  • Enjoy diverse gameplay elements as you explore the world.

We hope DreadOut can provide a similar survival-horror experience to some of the very best games available, whilst simultaneously taking advantage of the rich traditions of Indonesian horror to add an unique flavor.

 

We're absolutely over the moon to be able to offer prizes not just of the game, but also of many fun extras on it. Scroll down to see everything we have to offer! 

 

Anything else? If you have any questions or enquiries about the prizes or are interested in making some kind of arrangement for a private donation, please feel free to contact us at: contact@digitalhappiness.net

Our Dreadout Demo Ver 1.0.107 is available for download now. PC/Windows, Mac, and Linux are supported.

You can download through this websites :

PC

http://www.atomicgamer.com/files/103563/dreadout-demo-pc

http://www.indiedb.com/downloads/dreadout-demo

http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?h8xi5djwnr8ch28

MAC

http://www.moddb.com/downloads/dreadout-demo-mac

http://www.atomicgamer.com/file.php?id=103663

http://www.mediafire.com/?lhxazza9i88suoz

LINUX

http://www.indiedb.com/games/dreadout/downloads/dreadout-demo-linux

Don't forget to share your experiences with us, to make an improvement on our next full release

Our first priority is to create a great game with an authentic local theme without demanding any specific gameplay aspects. We are aiming to keep both the gameplay design and the storyline logical, meaningful, and connected as natural a way as possible.

  • DRM-Free and available on PC, Mac, and Linux.
  • Variety of gameplay:The world of DreadOut will require players to think creatively in order to solve the many puzzles they will encounter.
  • Remember your childhood fear: The player will be taken back to their childhood to explore their fears in a realistic world designed to evoke feelings of nostalgia by being full of memorabilia and emotional content.
  • An emphasis on both side-quests AND story:Although DreadOut has a main linear storyline, the player will constantly be given options to further explore the world and attempt to solve the mysteries within in the optional side quests presented.
  • Online Integration:Photos that have been collected by the player will be displayed on their Facebook wall so players can help each other to finish the game and share their experiences along the way.

Well you guys should help us if you don’t want to get haunted by those spirits lol

While the DreadOut development team are continuing to work hard in developing DreadOut toward its final release, the development rate has not been fast enough. For a reference, it took more than a year for DreadOut demo to see the light.

Well, things can be made faster in the process by gaining more resources to support the development. But we unfortunately are financially limited such that simply adding more resources to speed up the development is not feasible.

This is where you can help making difference! You can backing us to speed upon development by donating some amount to your liking.

Your donation supports will be used to fund more contractual jobs, to recruit more team members and/or to purchase development and test equipments, speeding up DreadOut's acquisition of audios, 3d models, animations, textures, voiceovers, and overall production which in effect will help us to speed up reaching our each milestones

Here's some of our specific use regarding your support and donations will help us in many vital ways including:

  • Accelerating the production process enabling a sooner release schedule.
  • Enabling us to work with famous local indie music artists on music creation and sound design for the game and soundtrack.
  • Allowing us to expand our design team with local concept artists.
  • Adding value to the game by working together with comic/ manga artists so we can port the game into a digital comic, expanding the story.
  • Basically helping us to build a bigger and richer world. We can add more ghosts, more animations, more diverse landscapes, more music, engaging animated cut-scenes and much, much, more including free roam options etc.
  • Allowing us to complete additional work such as translating DreadOut into other languages (1st release will be in dual audio English and Bahasa Indonesia with English subtitles and menus).
  • Enabling us to spend the necessary time creating high quality movies throughout the game, including intro and outro movies in full 3D CGI.

Although we can't be compared with some AAA titles out there with hundred people, hundred million budget, yet we already invested our energy, time and money for the sake of our love on this game. DreadOut had been developed almost 2 years now, with start with only 2 people we are now expanding our team with almost 5-15 people now. Even we can handle the most expensive parts of the game such as 3D modeling, animating and texturing assets, because most of our internal team has some form of 3D artistry in our work experience, so the need for 3D assets is offset by using internal resources only, and yet we still need more time and more funds to speed up our production. So here's the breakdown of how the additional money will be spent:

Digital Happiness comprises a number of 3D artists who have years of experience doing 3D animation work on a previously contracted-only basis. Our first original game was Hallway Raid, a game paying tribute to The Raid: Redemption movie. The game was released free and received a positive response from the public but unfortunately we couldn’t continue it due to a licensing issue. it's funny even though we create a free game based on our love on that film, sadly some company complaining to us to takes down that game…:) you can see it how it plays on you tube http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9gyxXSnnp_Y

it's not game related but here's some of our contractual animation; http://teknis.irisdesain.com  

Q: Why Crowd funding?

A: Dreadout has been in development for almost 2 years now and, besides the limited resources, what makes the development process longer is balancing the production costs with the company cash flow. We have split our team in two: the first team is handling DreadOut and the second team is ensuring the company cash flow remains secure by completing regular client-based animation contract work. With the support of crowdfunding we hope to secure our budget to release DreadOut without depending on the second team’s funding resource. In fact we are planning to merge both teams into one big team to speed up the release.

Q: Why not try to find an investment on VC?

The computer games industry in our country is still in the early days of development. We are way behind, even when compared to other countries in South East Asia! The investors we spoke with were more comfortable if we created games and apps for mobile platforms. Some prospective investors even tried to change our horror theme which we couldn’t accept due to our belief in this project and the hard work we have already invested. We Stand it for PC Game! :D

Q: Why IndieGoGo?

A: We are an Indonesian based company and Kickstarter is not available to us. While KS is widely perceived to be the more influential source for video games funding, we still have faith that we can achieve our modest goal through IndieGoGo just as well.

 

By creating DreadOut we hope we can make a good survival horror game for the love of us in that genre, and maybe can inspire our peers across South East Asia, and especially in our home country of Indonesia.  Together we can develop our industry and, of course, the creative industries in general.

We would like to thank you all for this opportunity and we promise to try our best to make this game something special. Please send all Suggestions and criticism to: contact@digitalhappiness.net and stay connected with us at http://www.dreadout.com.

Give us a shout at our twitter/dreadoutgame

Don’t forget to head on our steam greenlight page to support us

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=114109333

Thank you to God Almighty. Thank you to our families and friends who have helped us every step of the way so far. We wouldn’t be able to do it without your kind support.THANK YOU!

UPDATE #1 :
We made MAJOR enhancements regarding some of our perks/rewards
1. We give additional digital copies to all contributors for the $75 upwards tier rewards;

 $75 = 2 copies (1 extra DreadOut Digital Copy)
 $150 = 3 copies 
 $300 = 5 copies
 $500 = 10 copies
 $1000 = 20 copies

2. For "Tortured Soul" Perks / $30 upwards will receive special key to unlock extra costumes   


DreadOut is 3D adventure horror game within an authentic local Indonesian setting.

Explore the mystical world of a cursed city from a 3rd person perspective.
Come face to face with your worst nightmares; terrifying authentic Indonesian ghosts like Tuyul, Pocong, Kunti, etc.
Share your ghost photographs through our online integration via facebook.
Experience an original and thrilling storyline.
Enjoy diverse gameplay elements as you explore the world.

We hope DreadOut can provide a similar survival-horror experience to some of the very best games available, whilst simultaneously taking advantage of the rich traditions of Indonesian horror to add an unique flavor.


 
We're absolutely over the moon to be able to offer prizes not just of the game, but also of many fun extras on it. Scroll down to see everything we have to offer! 
 









Anything else? If you have any questions or enquiries about the prizes or are interested in making some kind of arrangement for a private donation, please feel free to contact us at: contact@digitalhappiness.net


Our Dreadout Demo Ver 1.0.107 is available for download now. PC/Windows, Mac, and Linux are supported.
You can download through this websites :
PC
http://www.atomicgamer.com/files/103563/dreadout-demo-pc
http://www.indiedb.com/downloads/dreadout-demo
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?h8xi5djwnr8ch28
MAC
http://www.moddb.com/downloads/dreadout-demo-mac
http://www.atomicgamer.com/file.php?id=103663
http://www.mediafire.com/?lhxazza9i88suoz
LINUX
http://www.indiedb.com/games/dreadout/downloads/dreadout-demo-linux
Don't forget to share your experiences with us, to make an improvement on our next full release




Our first priority is to create a great game with an authentic local theme without demanding any specific gameplay aspects. We are aiming to keep both the gameplay design and the storyline logical, meaningful, and connected as natural a way as possible.


DRM-Free and available on PC, Mac, and Linux.


Variety of gameplay:The world of DreadOut will require players to think creatively in order to solve the many puzzles they will encounter.

Remember your childhood fear: The player will be taken back to their childhood to explore their fears in a realistic world designed to evoke feelings of nostalgia by being full of memorabilia and emotional content.

An emphasis on both side-quests AND story:Although DreadOut has a main linear storyline, the player will constantly be given options to further explore the world and attempt to solve the mysteries within in the optional side quests presented.

Online Integration:Photos that have been collected by the player will be displayed on their Facebook wall so players can help each other to finish the game and share their experiences along the way.






Well you guys should help us if you don’t want to get haunted by those spirits lol

While the DreadOut development team are continuing to work hard in developing DreadOut toward its final release, the development rate has not been fast enough. For a reference, it took more than a year for DreadOut demo to see the light.
Well, things can be made faster in the process by gaining more resources to support the development. But we unfortunately are financially limited such that simply adding more resources to speed up the development is not feasible.
This is where you can help making difference! You can backing us to speed upon development by donating some amount to your liking.
Your donation supports will be used to fund more contractual jobs, to recruit more team members and/or to purchase development and test equipments, speeding up DreadOut's acquisition of audios, 3d models, animations, textures, voiceovers, and overall production which in effect will help us to speed up reaching our each milestones
Here's some of our specific use regarding your support and donations will help us in many vital ways including:

Accelerating the production process enabling a sooner release schedule.
Enabling us to work with famous local indie music artists on music creation and sound design for the game and soundtrack.
Allowing us to expand our design team with local concept artists.
Adding value to the game by working together with comic/ manga artists so we can port the game into a digital comic, expanding the story.
Basically helping us to build a bigger and richer world. We can add more ghosts, more animations, more diverse landscapes, more music, engaging animated cut-scenes and much, much, more including free roam options etc.
Allowing us to complete additional work such as translating DreadOut into other languages (1st release will be in dual audio English and Bahasa Indonesia with English subtitles and menus).
Enabling us to spend the necessary time creating high quality movies throughout the game, including intro and outro movies in full 3D CGI.


Although we can't be compared with some AAA titles out there with hundred people, hundred million budget, yet we already invested our energy, time and money for the sake of our love on this game. DreadOut had been developed almost 2 years now, with start with only 2 people we are now expanding our team with almost 5-15 people now. Even we can handle the most expensive parts of the game such as 3D modeling, animating and texturing assets, because most of our internal team has some form of 3D artistry in our work experience, so the need for 3D assets is offset by using internal resources only, and yet we still need more time and more funds to speed up our production. So here's the breakdown of how the additional money will be spent:





Digital Happiness comprises a number of 3D artists who have years of experience doing 3D animation work on a previously contracted-only basis. Our first original game was Hallway Raid, a game paying tribute to The Raid: Redemption movie. The game was released free and received a positive response from the public but unfortunately we couldn’t continue it due to a licensing issue. it's funny even though we create a free game based on our love on that film, sadly some company complaining to us to takes down that game…:) you can see it how it plays on you tube http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9gyxXSnnp_Y
it's not game related but here's some of our contractual animation; http://teknis.irisdesain.com  








Q: Why Crowd funding?
A: Dreadout has been in development for almost 2 years now and, besides the limited resources, what makes the development process longer is balancing the production costs with the company cash flow. We have split our team in two: the first team is handling DreadOut and the second team is ensuring the company cash flow remains secure by completing regular client-based animation contract work. With the support of crowdfunding we hope to secure our budget to release DreadOut without depending on the second team’s funding resource. In fact we are planning to merge both teams into one big team to speed up the release.
Q: Why not try to find an investment on VC?
The computer games industry in our country is still in the early days of development. We are way behind, even when compared to other countries in South East Asia! The investors we spoke with were more comfortable if we created games and apps for mobile platforms. Some prospective investors even tried to change our horror theme which we couldn’t accept due to our belief in this project and the hard work we have already invested. We Stand it for PC Game! :D
Q: Why IndieGoGo?
A: We are an Indonesian based company and Kickstarter is not available to us. While KS is widely perceived to be the more influential source for video games funding, we still have faith that we can achieve our modest goal through IndieGoGo just as well.


 
By creating DreadOut we hope we can make a good survival horror game for the love of us in that genre, and maybe can inspire our peers across South East Asia, and especially in our home country of Indonesia.  Together we can develop our industry and, of course, the creative industries in general.


We would like to thank you all for this opportunity and we promise to try our best to make this game something special. Please send all Suggestions and criticism to: contact@digitalhappiness.net and stay connected with us at http://www.dreadout.com.
Give us a shout at our twitter/dreadoutgame
Don’t forget to head on our steam greenlight page to support us
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=114109333
Thank you to God Almighty. Thank you to our families and friends who have helped us every step of the way so far. We wouldn’t be able to do it without your kind support.THANK YOU!

story:
A New Game for the Quick Witted

The whole purpose of this campaign is to introduce my new "witty" card game, How Do You Like it?. The main premise of this game is to point out a common factor between 2 objects. Whether it is clean or dirty is totally up to you. The game is easy to learn and has an unlimited amount possibilities. Plus, it's portable so you can enjoy the fun at restaurants, bars, house parties, waiting rooms...really anywhere with a table or a floor. There is a more thorough walkthrough of the game below. 

How To Play

Like I said this is an easy game to learn and understand, but mastering the game doesn't come easy to everyone. Here is a walkthrough of the game:

  • Pass 5-7 cards out to everyone (depending on players and time)
  • Flip one of the cards over to start the game
  • Go counter clockwise in play
  • Here's an example: (Refer to the picture) I have 5 cards in my hand and Clowns is the card in play. I have to pick one of my cards and announce the comparison between them. For this I would play Leprechauns. I would lay my card down and say "I like my Clowns like my Leprechauns; small and creepy". Then the next player will have to play off my Leprechauns card.
  • Be careful, if everyone thinks your answer doesnt work then you have to pick your card back up and draw 2 other cards as a penalty. To play it safe you can pass, but then you will have to pick a card up. 
  • The object of the game is to run out of cards first. 

The Goal

Pretty simple, raise the awareness of How Do You Like it?. If I can get enough people interested in this game I can start pre ordering everything and keep the price low for everyone. 

I appreciate you taking the time to read about my project and for not making fun of it (at least to me). 

Thank you, 

- Bobby

story:
Short Summary

Hello, my name is Wyne and I'm creating this project to raise funds for my trip to Nationals in November for the Weiss Schwarz tournament in an attempt to win an invitation and paid trip to the Weiss Schwarz Worlds tournament. I'm a passionate player in my local area and have already secured an invitation for Nationals through my local regionals tournament that has happened.

I'm an avid player and have personally helped with the growth of my local scene to draw more players to playing this card game by hosting panels at anime conventions in my local area in order to teach newer players what are the benefits of playing such a game and how to enjoy it.

I would love to end up going to nationals in order to compete with more knowledgeable players, I have previously traveled to Vancouver to compete in one of their local tournaments and it has shown that there are better players out there and that there is room to improve in my personal gameplay.

What We Need & What You Get

Basically, the money you are placing into this funding for my trip will only cover the cost of airfare to the location.
Here is the breakdown:
  • ~$500 for airfare and ground transportation
  • Any extra funding incurred will be going towards subsidizing my accommodations and any other costs such as food.
  • In the event I do not reach my goal, any funding that you have kindly put into this project will be subsidizing my airfare and I will have to pay for accommodations, ground transportation and any other costs out of my own pocket.

    The Impact

    By helping me pay for airfare, this trip would benefit me greatly since I love to travel. It also helps me grow as a player by playing more experienced and knowledgeable people in order to bring such back to my local area and increase the quality of players and perhaps draw in more players by showing this is a game that can be competitive while enjoying something you are passionate about.

      Risks & Challenges

      There are always risks involved with these kinds of lofty goals, as it is quite unlikely that strangers are inclined to give some random person money in order to achieve such a goal, therefore I feel grateful to anyone who has read up to this point at least.
      Risks involved will be lack of funding and in order to combat this, I will end up working extra hours in order to compensate for the working hours lost and to pay for any overhead aside from airfare, accommodations, ground transportation and living expenses while attending this tournament in the event that I receive no funding at all.

        Other Ways You Can Help

        Even though you might be unable to contribute or justify helping me monetarily, I appreciate your time for reading up to this point. But that doesn't mean there aren't other ways to assist me in my venture!
        All you have to do is just promote my Indiegogo page to anyone you know such as friends, family, co-workers or anyone you want to. Feel free to use the Indiegogo sharing tools that are available.

        Personal thanks

        I would like to extend my thanks to the local players, who suggested me to try and fund my trip through Indiegogo, and you, as a reader, that have read up to this point.
