story:
The Story of 'LEV: The Game'

"A fascinating new game to promote longevity research."
- Aubrey De Grey, PhD.
"For years, I have advocated gamification of this vital idea as one of the most powerful ways to change. I am immensely pleased to now witness such an effort taking off."

- Gennady Stolyarov II, http://www.rationalargumentator.com/

In LEV: The Game, you will monitor the health of your avatar, while making smart strategic decisions. Your goal? Let your avatar live a 1000 years! Players will also be able to personalize their avatar, do mini-games, and discover other fun features, all of which will keep the game exciting throughout!

Few game developers can claim they will be able to serve a specific and loyal niche of customers. LEV: The Game is one of those rare gems, being the world’s first game about longevity – the art & science of living long, very long! People have already showed an active interest for our game, as some of the testimonials in the video prove.

We are a small and passionate team of 3: A developer, graphical designer, and concept designer. We have created a first playable version for Android and prepared a lot to expand the game further.

Our biggest challenge is two-fold:

  1. Develop the more technically challenging parts of the game (which tend to be the most interesting for players)
  2. Spread the word via online marketing

In addition, people have also been asking to play the game on iOS, so we want to make it available for Apple devices as well.

The purpose of this campaign is to help us face these challenges - for your avatar's sake!

(I mean: Just look how sad he is right now!)


Contribute and get perks!

To make this game really great for you, we are looking for 6000 euro. This money will be used on the more difficult coding challenges and make sure we speed up the game´s development progress, so you can play sooner! We'll also use it to spread the game more quickly through online channels, reaching more players.

When you contribute, you will gain full access to the game @ Go Live. You can also unlock additional perks for larger donations, such as the option to have your own personalized avatars in the game. Last but not least, very significant donations will allow you to advertise in the free version of our game, based on agreed terms.

Your support will help us keep the momentum up!



More than a game…

Finally, 'LEV: The game' is not just a game. The concept stems from leading health research. "LEV" stands for "Longevity Escape Velocity", a concept coined by Aubrey de Grey, Ph.D. 

LEV essentially means that a person is expected to live longer and longer thanks to technological progress. And because technology seems to keep evolving faster and faster, that person might, theoretically, never die at all!

Our idea is not to create “just” a genuinely fun game, but to promote the idea that it is okay to watch your health and live a long, healthy and fun life. Doing so acknowledges longevity is becoming a reality thanks to the intense work of many men and women!


Aubrey De Grey (right), holding an early version of LEV: The Game.


Sharing is caring

There are of course other ways you can help. We have an active Facebook page where we share regular updates: Your “Likes” will boost our project’s visibility, and we will consider any ideas you post there for future versions!

Want to play the Alpha version of the game? Then you will need to become a member of our Google Group in order to gain access to it. Just go to our Google Group, become a member, and follow the instructions.

Thank you for your contribution!
story_txt:
The Story of 'LEV: The Game'

"A fascinating new game to promote longevity research."- Aubrey De Grey, PhD.

"For years, I have advocated gamification of this vital idea as one of the most powerful ways to change. I am immensely pleased to now witness such an effort taking off."- Gennady Stolyarov II, http://www.rationalargumentator.com/
In LEV: The Game, you
will monitor the health of your avatar, while making smart strategic decisions. Your goal? Let your avatar live a 1000
years! Players will also be able to personalize their avatar, do mini-games,
and discover other fun features, all of which will keep the game exciting
throughout!Few game developers can claim they will be able to serve a specific and loyal niche of customers. LEV: The Game is one of those rare gems, being the world’s first game about longevity – the art & science of living long, very long! People have already showed an active interest for our game, as some of the testimonials in the video prove.
We are a small and
passionate team of 3: A developer, graphical designer, and concept designer.
We have created a first playable version for Android and prepared a lot to expand the game further.Our biggest challenge is two-fold:
Develop the more technically challenging parts of the game (which tend to be the most interesting for players)
Spread the word via online marketing
In addition, people have also been asking to play the game on iOS, so we want to make it available for Apple devices as well.The purpose of this campaign is to help us face these challenges - for your avatar's sake!(I mean: Just look how sad he is right now!)Contribute and get perks!
To make this game really great for you, we are looking for 6000 euro. This
money will be used on the more difficult coding challenges and make sure
we speed up the game´s development progress, so you can play
sooner! We'll also use it to spread the game more quickly through online channels, reaching more players.
When you contribute, you
will gain full access to the game @ Go Live. You can also unlock additional perks for larger donations, such as the option
to have your own personalized avatars in the game. Last but not least, very
significant donations will allow you to advertise in the
free version of our game, based on agreed terms.
Your support will help us keep the momentum up!
More than a game…
Finally, 'LEV: The game' is not just a game. The concept stems from leading health research. "LEV" stands for "Longevity Escape Velocity", a concept coined by Aubrey de Grey, Ph.D. LEV essentially means that a person is expected to live longer and longer thanks to technological progress. And because technology seems to keep evolving faster and faster, that person might, theoretically, never die at all!Our idea is not to create “just” a genuinely fun game, but to
promote the idea that it is okay to watch your health and live a long, healthy
and fun life. Doing so acknowledges longevity is becoming a reality thanks to
the intense work of many men and women!Aubrey De Grey (right), holding an early version of
LEV: The Game.

Sharing is caring
There are of course
other ways you can help. We have an active Facebook page where we share regular
updates: Your “Likes” will boost our project’s visibility, and we will consider any ideas you post there for future versions!
Want to play the Alpha version of the game? Then you will need to become a member of our Google Group in order to gain access to it. Just go to our Google Group, become a member, and follow the instructions.
Thank you for your
contribution!

story:
Grumpy Zombies is a survival shoot ‘em up game for iOS and Android where you, Timmy, the main character, will have to stop hordes of grumpy zombies! Use everything at your disposal (even rubber ducks!) to protect yourself from the incoming zombies!

( Spanish - Español )

Grumpy Zombies es un juego de supervivencia para iOS y Android. Tú controlas a Timmy, el personaje principal y tendrás que detener hordas de zombies gruñones que acechan tu casa. Tendrás que hacer uso de todo lo que encuentres ( inclusive patitos de hule ) para protegerte de los zombies.

Grumpy Zombies is set on a post apocalyptic cartoonish world. Through the game, you will engage deadly hordes of zombies over different locations, using an arsenal of weaponry ranging from tennis balls to grenades.

With more than 20 weapons, you will have to defend yourself from different kinds of zombies, each with its unique strengths. Likewise, every weapon has its own differences, some might be less powerful, while others although powerful will be quite scarce. Several power-ups or special items will become available during the game to assist you.

The game features two modes: Campaign and Endless. The first will allow you to progress through the story, while the second will let you compete against your friends. Playing on endless mode allows you to earn extra money which may be used to purchase new weapons during the campaign. Play the campaign to beat challenges to unlock new achievements!

( Spanish - Español )

Grumpy Zombies se desarrolla en un mundo post apocalíptico caricaturesco. Durante el juego tendrás que enfrentar a hordas de zombies en diferentes escenarios usando un arsenal de armas que van desde pelotas de tenis hasta granadas. 

Con mas de 20 armas, tendrás que defenderte de diferentes tipos de zombies, cada uno con cualidades únicas. Asimismo, cada arma es diferente, algunas no serán muy fuertes, pero las poderosas no aparecerán tan frecuentemente. Habrá varios power-ups o items especiales que aparecerán durante el juego para ayudarte. 

El juego tiene dos modos: Campaña e Infinito. En la campaña progresaras a través de la historia, igualmente tendrás que completar retos para desbloquear logros. En el modo infinito podrás competir con tus amigos por ver quien es mejor. En este modo también podrás ganar dinero que podrás usar para comprar nuevas armas para la campaña.

  • Common Carl: he is pretty much cannon fodder; abundant but not much of a threat.
  • Punk Patrick: faster than a bullet, terrifying scream; not to strong yet quite fast!
  • Hillbilly Harry: He might not be the brightest nor the fastest, but he knows how to take a hit!
  • Riot Ralph: That riot shield makes him quite a challenge! Have you heard about testudo formation?
  • Hockey Hank: Not very friendly. 'Nuff said.
  • Three zombies that can be designed by our backers who pledge for the necromancer perk. *Restrictions apply read below.
  • Each map has a final boss, a very big one. Become the final's level boss by pledging for "the boss" perk.
  • Many more unannounced Zombies, stay tuned.
  • More zombies will be added after the game is released.

( Spanish - Español )

  • Common Carl: velo como si fuera carne de cañon, hay muchos, pero no son una amenaza.
  • Punk Patrick: rápido y feroz, afortunadamente no es muy fuerte.
  • Hillbilly Harry: No sera el mas inteligente, ni el mas rápido, pero como aguanta golpes!
  • Riot Ralph: Su escudo lo convierte en un gran enemigo!
  • Hockey Hank: No es muy amigable, tampoco hay mas que decir.
  • Tres zombies que podrán diseñar nuestros donadores! *Aplican restricciones, lee abajo.
  • Cada mapa tendrá un jefe final, uno grande. Tú te puedes convertir en el jefe final con el perk “The boss” 
  • Muchos mas zombies no anunciados!
  • Y todavía mas zombies serán añadidos después del lanzamiento!

Yes, I’m also wondering where did Timmy got an almost unlimited stock of rubber ducks, moreover, grenades? Who keeps grenades at home? I guess GrumpyLand is a strange place after all.

Our game will have 20 weapons when released, additionally more will be added. Most of the ideas to create these have so far came from our own imagination or our friends’ suggestions. If you have any suggestions for new types of weapons tell us! Remember the weapon-crafter perks allow you to design your own weapon! *Restrictions apply read below.

Each weapon aims to fulfill a role, for example tennis balls are meant to be your most abundant ammunition, explosives are intended to be used for crowd control. Additionally you have weapons like cupcakes that slow down zombies or rubber ducks that are pretty much useless, however they are quite hilarious.  Our weapons will add balance to the game, yet their supply rate will keep up the challenge.

( Spanish - Español )

Sí, yo también me estoy preguntando de donde obtuvo Timmy un número ilimitado de patitos de hule, ¿y las granadas qué? ¿Quién las guarda en su casa? Supongo que GrumpyLand es un lugar extraño después de todo. 

Nuestro juego tendrá 20 armas cuando sea lanzado, posteriormente se añadan más. La mayoría de las ideas en las que nos basamos para crear las armas han venido de nuestra imaginación o de las sugerencias de nuestros amigos. Si tienes algunas sugerencia para nuevas armas, ¡dinos! Recuerda que obtener el perk weapon-crafter te permitirá diseñar tu propia arma! *Aplican restricciones, lee abajo.

Cada arma cumple un rol, por ejemplo, las pelotas de tenis serán tu munición más abundante, en cambio, los explosivos te servirán para mantener a ralla a los enemigos. Ademas, tienes armas como pastelitos que alentaran a los zombies, o patitos de hule que no sirven para nada, pero están chistosos! Nuestras armas añadirán balance al juego, pero también la velocidad de suministro mantendrá el reto.


These items will enhance playability! Each time you kill a zombie the power-up bar will fill up. There are 3 fill levels, each level will allow you to acquire more powerful items. You can get anything from extra lives, a blizzard slowing down zombies, the very useful atomic bomb and many others! Additionally our backers who get the Grumpy UFO perk or above will get a special power-up!

( Spanish - Español )

Estos items hacen más entretenido el juego. Cada vez que matas a un zombie la barra de poder se va llenando. Hay tres niveles de llenado, cada nivel te permitirá obtener items más poderosos. Puedes obtener vidas extras, tormenta de hielo, la muy útil bomba atómica, ¡y muchos más! Adicionalmente, nuestros donadores que obtengan el perk Grumpy UFO y en adelante, tendrán un power-up especial que nadie más tendrá.

We are 4 Mexican computer science and digital art students who casually decided to start a game this January 2013. So far we have been working on the game for a year, and we have really enjoyed it.

We are:

  • David, artist
  • Daniel, designer, programmer
  • Carlos, programmer
  • Gustavo, programmer

Carlos, Gustavo and Daniel ( all studying computer science ) met at school, Daniel and David are siblings. Like you, we love playing video games, and as gamers one always dreams on creating or collaborate on a game, so naturally the idea of creating our own is quite appealing. As creative and talented people we decided to take this on our hands, and thats how Grumpy Zombies was born!

Being able to work with your friends on something you enjoy is an unique experience!

( Spanish - Español )

Somos 4 estudiantes mexicanos de ciencias computacionales y arte digital quienes casualmente decidimos empezar a hacer un video juego en enero de 2013. Hemos trabajado en el juego por un año y realmente lo hemos disfrutado.

Somos:

  • David, artista
  • Daniel, diseñador, programador
  • Carlos, programador
  • Gustavo, programador

Carlos, Gustavo y Daniel ( los tres estudiantes de ciencias computacionales ) se conocieron en la escuela, Daniel y David son hermanos. Como tú, nos encantan los video juegos, y como gamers siempre hemos soñado con crear o colaborar en un videojuego, así que naturalmente la idea de crear nuestro propio videojuego es muy atractiva. Como gente talentosa y creativa decidimos tomar esto en nuestras manos y así es como Grumpy Zombies nació.

El poder trabajar con tus amigos en algo que disfrutas es una experiencia única.

David has dedicated his life to traditional art where he stands out. Currently he is exploring new territories, aiming at conquering the digital frontier; switching from pencil to stylus, where results have been amazing. This translates to amazing in-game visuals, carefully drawn textures and beautiful 3D models. We spare no time at ensuring every texture detail is at its finest, this has let to the game looking terrific.

( Spanish - Español )

David ha dedicado su vida al arte tradicional donde ha sobresalido. Actualmente él está explorando nuevos territorios, con el objetivo de conquistar la frontera digital cambiando el lápiz por un stylus y los resultados han sido fantásticos. Esto se traduce en gráficas de juego sorprendentes, texturas cuidadosamente dibujadas y hermosos modelos 3D. No escatimamos en tiempo para asegurar que cada detalle de las texturas este a su máximo, esto ha echo que el juego se vea muy bien.

The game favors humorous encounters and situations that enhance playability. The game is fun, challenging and rewarding, we can guarantee you’ll enjoy it.

Last October Facebook visited our campus and they did a hackathon ( a 24 hour marathon where you have to create a unique app ). We participated, and created a game from scratch ( nothing too fancy, just an endless runner ). The Facebook engineers liked it and we won the first place in the hackathon, so they flew us to their hackathon finals at their headquarters on Silicon Valley. This time we did a collaborative multiplayer game. This occasion we won third place, and for sure we have realized that our passion is video game development, and that we are more than capable to create games.

During the past year we have taken the challenge of making this game, we have always taken the approach of building this game with the best quality, and we believe our progress reflects that. Our only wish is to ensure we give this project a proper conclusion, that is why we are reaching to you, we want your help to finish our year long game.

( Spanish - Español )

El octubre pasado Facebook visitó nuestra escuela dónde hicieron un hackathon ( un maratón de programación donde tienes que crear una app única ) Nosotros participamos y creamos un juego desde cero ( nada muy complicado ). A los ingenieros de Facebook les gustó y así ganamos el primer lugar, así que nos fuimos a la final en Silicon Valley, California, esta ocasión hicimos un juego multijugador cooperativo, esta vez ganamos el tercer lugar y con seguridad nos dimos cuenta que nuestra pasión es el desarrollo de video juegos y que somos más que capaces de hacer juegos.

Durante todo el año pasado hemos tomado el reto de hacer este juego, siempre enfocados en hacer este juego con la mejor calidad y creemos que nuestro progreso refleja esto. Lo único que queremos es darle a este juego la conclusión que se merece, es por esto que acudimos a ti, necesitamos tu ayuda para terminar nuestro juego.

Well, back in January 2013 when we started developing the game we were just 4 moneyless students with some free time on their hands looking to create something amazing, 13 months later we are still moneyless students, but now with no time to spare. It has been one amazing ride and we know we have something great on our hands, yet we have also realized that making a game is not actually free, and its quite time consuming. 

Some of us have part time jobs to pay for tuition fees, we would like to use part of the money we raise to quite those jobs so that we can dedicate full time to the game together as a team without worrying about anything other than this amazing project and college of course.

Furthermore, there are a lot of expenses related to music & sound, licensing, marketing etc. Although Daniel has made the main game's theme, a proper game needs a full soundtrack, we wish to hire a talented local musician to help us with that! Also we need an audio engineer that will work on matching the quality of our sound effects to that of our art & gameplay.

With your help we can finish this game properly, because we believe that leaving it unfinished would be terrible.

( Spanish - Español )

Bueno, de vuelta en enero de 2013 cuando empezamos a desarrollar el juego éramos 4 estudiantes sin dinero con un poco de tiempo libre en sus manos buscando crear algo sorprendente, 13 meses después seguimos siendo estudiantes sin dinero pero ahora sin nada de tiempo libre. Ha sido algo maravilloso y sabemos que tenemos algo grande en nuestras manos, pero también nos hemos dado cuenta que hacer un video juego no es del todo gratis y definitivamente consume mucho tiempo.

Algunos de nosotros tenemos trabajos para pagar nuestros estudios, queremos usar parte de el dinero que recaudemos para dejar de trabajar y dedicar tiempo completo al desarrollo del juego juntos como equipo sin tener que preocuparnos por nada más que este maravilloso proyecto y la escuela por supuesto.

Además, hay muchos otros gastos relacionados con música, sonido, licencias, mercadotecnia etc. A pesar de que Daniel ha hecho el tema musical principal un juego necesita un soundtrack completo. Queremos contratar a algún músico local talentoso que nos ayude con esto. También necesitamos un ingeniero en audio que nos ayude a que nuestros efectos de sonido estén relacionados con el concepto de arte.

Con tu ayuda podemos terminar este juego apropiadamente, porque creemos que dejarlo incompleto sería terrible.

Backer ribbon: When you connect to Facebook with our game you can keep track of your scores and see how your friends are doing. All our backers who claim the Grumpy Friend or above perk will get a ribbon by their scores so they can brag that they supported Grumpy Zombies before it was cool.

Credits: All those who made possible Grumpy Zombies are mention here, this includes you of course!

Grumpy UFO: This is a special power-up for our backers it won't be available on any other way. The UFO will… You require to login to Facebook on our game to get this power-up. This won't break game balance or difficulty.

Wallpaper pack: These are the wallpapers we created along the game development, approximately David makes one every month highlighting some of his work, like a new zombie, or new game elements. We are proud of these wallpapers because in some way they represent our game road map. No one else has these, they are special to us, cherish them just like we do ;)

Digital sketchbook: All house has blueprints, all video games have blueprints. This sketchbook contains raw drawings that helped define the game’s art. A highlight of this book is the storyboard used to create the game’s intro cut scene. This is quite a nice piece of work.

Music: Daniel’s hobby, apart from video games, has been music, he created the game’s main theme and other pieces.

Digital Art Compendium: This reward contains all art used on the game, it is a catalog that exhibits all game art, including some that never were released with the game.

T-shirt: These are made by teelaunch, a very popular brand used by crowdfunders. You’ll get a t-shirt of your favourite color with a sketch of Common Carl.

Poster: A 18in x 24in poster featuring some of our best art!

Keychain: Keep the infamous rubber duck protecting your keys from zombies!

Vitruvian zombie t-shirt: The teams’ favourite piece of art, get a t-shirt with this amazing anatomically correct zombie!

3D statue: Punk Patrick printed for you from our very own game, don’t worry he won’t eat your brains. An awesome addition for collectors. You want him drinking a grumpy cola? no problem!

Case: It worked great for Riot Ralph, so it should protect your iPhone perfectly!

Design a weapon: Be part of our game design by creating your very own weapon! Choose something unique, funny or deadly! All sketches used to create your weapon will be sent to you!

*Restrictions apply, we don’t want any offensive or inappropriate material in our game, contact us if you have questions.

Design a zombie: Just like a true game designer, make your own zombie! Choose his strengths, weakness and special attributes! Come up with something funny that has never been seen before on a game! All sketches used to create your zombie will be sent to you!

*Restrictions apply, we don’t want any offensive or inappropriate material in our game, your design has to be obviously a zombie and cannot be anything that promotes racism, hate or other inappropriate behaviors, contact us if you have questions.

Be the boss: Every game level has a boss, but the strongest, toughest boss will be the final one. With this opportunity you get to be in a game! Send us a picture of you, and we will first sketch you as a zombie, then we will create a 3d model of you, and you’ll be on the game!! All art used to create your zombie, like sketches and others drawings will also be sent to you!

A week in paradise: Ever wanted to visit cancun? We’ll be your guides! Culture you want? We’ll go to the ruins! Party? There’s plenty of that? Hungover? The beach is always sunny!

( Spanish - Español )

Backer ribbon: Cuando te conectas a Facebook con nuestro juego puedes ver tu puntuación y también la de tus amigos. Todos los donadores quienes reclamen Grumpy Friend en adelante recibirán una medalla única junto a su puntuación para que puedan jactarse de que ayudaron a Grumpy Zombies antes de que fuera genial.

Credits: Todos los que hicieron posible Grumpy Zombies son mencionados aquí

Grumpy UFO: Este es un power-up para nuestros donadores, no se podrá conseguir de ninguna otra manera, La OVNI podrá ser usado como un ítem especial para matar esos zombies que estén causando problemas. Tendrás que accesar con tu cuenta de Facebook para ver este power-up. Esto no romperá el balance del juego o dificultad.

Wallpaper pack: Estos son los fondos de escritorio que hemos creado a lo largo del proceso de desarrollo, David hace uno cada mes aproximadamente para acentuar algo de su trabajo durante ese mes, como un nuevo zombie o algún nuevo elemento en el juego. Estamos orgullosos de esos fondos de escritorio porque en cierta manera representan la ruta del juego. Nadie los tiene, son especiales para nosotros, aprecialos como nosotros.

Digital sketchbook: Cada casa tiene planos al igual que cada video juego tiene planos. Este libro de bocetos contiene dibujos que nos ayudaron a definir el arte. Algo interesante de este libro es el storyboard usado para crear el intro y las escenas desechadas. Este es una muy buena pieza.

Music: el hobby de Daniel, a parte de hacer video juegos es la música, él creó el tema principal de Grumpy Zombies y algunas otras piezas. Estas serán incluidas en el soundtrack del juego.

Digital Art Compendium: Este premio contiene el arte usado en el juego, es un catálogo que exhibe todo el arte del juego, incluye todo aquel arte que no se usó en el juego.

T-shirt: Las playeras son echas por Teelaunch, una marca muy popular en las campañas de Crowdfunding. Recibirás una playera de tu color favorito con un boceto de Common Carl.

Poster: Un poster de 18 x 24 pulgadas con algo de nuestro mejor arte.

Keychain: Lleva contigo el famoso patito de hule protegiendo tus llaves de los zombies.

Vitruvian zombie t-shirt: La pieza de arte favorita del equipo, obtén una playera con  la anatomía de un zombie.

3D statue: Punk Patrick impreso para ti directo de nuestro juego, no te preocupes, no comerá tu cerebro. Un precioso artículo para los coleccionistas.

Case: Funcionó perfectamente con Riot Ralph, así que deberá proteger tu iPhone perfectamente también.

Design a weapon: Se parte del diseño del juego creando tu propia arma. Escoge algo único, divertido o mortífero! Los bocetos requeridos para la creación de este ítem se te enviarán.

*Se aplican restricciones, no queremos nada ofensivo o material inapropiado en nuestro juego, contactamos si tienes cualquier duda.

Design a zombie: Como un verdadero diseñador de video juegos, haz tu propio zombie, escoge su poder y su debilidad como sus atributos especiales. Aporta alguna idea que jamás se ha visto en algún video juego. Todos los bocetos requeridos para la creación de tu zombie se te mandarán.

*Aplican restricciones, no queremos nada ofensivo o material inapropiado en nuestro juego, tu diseño tendrá que ser obviamente un zombie y no puede promover en ninguna manera el racismo, odio o comportamientos inapropiados, contactamos si tienes alguna duda.

Be the boss: Cada juego tiene su Jefe, pero el más fuerte de todos será el del nivel final. Tienes la oportunidad de estar dentro del juego. Mándanos una foto de ti, te haremos un boceto a la manera Grumpy Zombies luego crearemos un modelo 3D de ti y serás el jefe final de Grumpy Zombies. Todos los bocetos que se requieran para la creación del personaje se te mandarán.

A week in paradise: Alguna vez has querido visitar Cancún? Seremos tus guías! Iremos a las ruinas, fiesta y mucho más! La playa está siempre soleada ;)

Thanks for taking the time to check out our campaign, we hope you like our project. Here is a cute baby tapir that will make your day!


Gracias por ver nuestra campaña, esperamos les guste nuestro proyecto. Aquí les dejamos una imagen de un tapir bebe!

Additionally you have weapons like cupcakes that slow down zombies or rubber ducks that are pretty much useless, however they are quite hilarious.  Our weapons will add balance to the game, yet their supply rate will keep up the challenge.( Spanish - Español )Sí, yo también me estoy preguntando de donde obtuvo Timmy un número ilimitado de patitos de hule, ¿y las granadas qué? ¿Quién las guarda en su casa? Supongo que GrumpyLand es un lugar extraño después de todo. Nuestro juego tendrá 20 armas cuando sea lanzado, posteriormente se añadan más. La mayoría de las ideas en las que nos basamos para crear las armas han venido de nuestra imaginación o de las sugerencias de nuestros amigos. Si tienes algunas sugerencia para nuevas armas, ¡dinos! Recuerda que obtener el perk weapon-crafter te permitirá diseñar tu propia arma! *Aplican restricciones, lee abajo.Cada arma cumple un rol, por ejemplo, las pelotas de tenis serán tu munición más abundante, en cambio, los explosivos te servirán para mantener a ralla a los enemigos. Ademas, tienes armas como pastelitos que alentaran a los zombies, o patitos de hule que no sirven para nada, pero están chistosos! Nuestras armas añadirán balance al juego, pero también la velocidad de suministro mantendrá el reto.These items will enhance playability! Each time you kill a zombie the power-up bar will fill up. There are 3 fill levels, each level will allow you to acquire more powerful items. You can get anything from extra lives, a blizzard slowing down zombies, the very useful atomic bomb and many others! Additionally our backers who get the Grumpy UFO perk or above will get a special power-up!( Spanish - Español )Estos items hacen más entretenido el juego. Cada vez que matas a un zombie la barra de poder se va llenando. Hay tres niveles de llenado, cada nivel te permitirá obtener items más poderosos. Puedes obtener vidas extras, tormenta de hielo, la muy útil bomba atómica, ¡y muchos más! Adicionalmente, nuestros donadores que obtengan el perk Grumpy UFO y en adelante, tendrán un power-up especial que nadie más tendrá.We are 4 Mexican computer science and digital art students who casually decided to start a game this January 2013. So far we have been working on the game for a year, and we have really enjoyed it.We are:

David, artist


Daniel, designer, programmer


Carlos, programmer

Gustavo, programmer
Carlos, Gustavo and Daniel ( all studying computer science ) met at school, Daniel and David are siblings. Like you, we love playing video games, and as gamers one always dreams on creating or collaborate on a game, so naturally the idea of creating our own is quite appealing. As creative and talented people we decided to take this on our hands, and thats how Grumpy Zombies was born!Being able to work with your friends on something you enjoy is an unique experience!( Spanish - Español )Somos 4 estudiantes mexicanos de ciencias computacionales y arte digital quienes casualmente decidimos empezar a hacer un video juego en enero de 2013. Hemos trabajado en el juego por un año y realmente lo hemos disfrutado.Somos:

David, artista

Daniel, diseñador, programador

Carlos, programador

Gustavo, programador
Carlos, Gustavo y Daniel ( los tres estudiantes de ciencias computacionales ) se conocieron en la escuela, Daniel y David son hermanos. Como tú, nos encantan los video juegos, y como gamers siempre hemos soñado con crear o colaborar en un videojuego, así que naturalmente la idea de crear nuestro propio videojuego es muy atractiva. Como gente talentosa y creativa decidimos tomar esto en nuestras manos y así es como Grumpy Zombies nació.El poder trabajar con tus amigos en algo que disfrutas es una experiencia única.David has dedicated his life to traditional art where he stands out. Currently he is exploring new territories, aiming at conquering the digital frontier; switching from pencil to stylus, where results have been amazing. This translates to amazing in-game visuals, carefully drawn textures and beautiful 3D models. We spare no time at ensuring every texture detail is at its finest, this has let to the game looking terrific.( Spanish - Español )David ha dedicado su vida al arte tradicional donde ha sobresalido. Actualmente él está explorando nuevos territorios, con el objetivo de conquistar la frontera digital cambiando el lápiz por un stylus y los resultados han sido fantásticos. Esto se traduce en gráficas de juego sorprendentes, texturas cuidadosamente dibujadas y hermosos modelos 3D. No escatimamos en tiempo para asegurar que cada detalle de las texturas este a su máximo, esto ha echo que el juego se vea muy bien.The game favors humorous encounters and situations that enhance playability. The game is fun, challenging and rewarding, we can guarantee you’ll enjoy it.Last October Facebook visited our campus and they did a hackathon ( a 24 hour marathon where you have to create a unique app ). We participated, and created a game from scratch ( nothing too fancy, just an endless runner ). The Facebook engineers liked it and we won the first place in the hackathon, so they flew us to their hackathon finals at their headquarters on Silicon Valley. This time we did a collaborative multiplayer game. This occasion we won third place, and for sure we have realized that our passion is video game development, and that we are more than capable to create games.During the past year we have taken the challenge of making this game, we have always taken the approach of building this game with the best quality, and we believe our progress reflects that. Our only wish is to ensure we give this project a proper conclusion, that is why we are reaching to you, we want your help to finish our year long game.( Spanish - Español )El octubre pasado Facebook visitó nuestra escuela dónde hicieron un hackathon ( un maratón de programación donde tienes que crear una app única ) Nosotros participamos y creamos un juego desde cero ( nada muy complicado ). A los ingenieros de Facebook les gustó y así ganamos el primer lugar, así que nos fuimos a la final en Silicon Valley, California, esta ocasión hicimos un juego multijugador cooperativo, esta vez ganamos el tercer lugar y con seguridad nos dimos cuenta que nuestra pasión es el desarrollo de video juegos y que somos más que capaces de hacer juegos.Durante todo el año pasado hemos tomado el reto de hacer este juego, siempre enfocados en hacer este juego con la mejor calidad y creemos que nuestro progreso refleja esto. Lo único que queremos es darle a este juego la conclusión que se merece, es por esto que acudimos a ti, necesitamos tu ayuda para terminar nuestro juego.Well, back in January 2013 when we started developing the game we were just 4 moneyless students with some free time on their hands looking to create something amazing, 13 months later we are still moneyless students, but now with no time to spare. It has been one amazing ride and we know we have something great on our hands, yet we have also realized that making a game is not actually free, and its quite time consuming. Some of us have part time jobs to pay for tuition fees, we would like to use part of the money we raise to quite those jobs so that we can dedicate full time to the game together as a team without worrying about anything other than this amazing project and college of course. Furthermore, there are a lot of expenses related to music & sound, licensing, marketing etc. Although Daniel has made the main game's theme, a proper game needs a full soundtrack, we wish to hire a talented local musician to help us with that! Also we need an audio engineer that will work on matching the quality of our sound effects to that of our art & gameplay.With your help we can finish this game properly, because we believe that leaving it unfinished would be terrible.( Spanish - Español )Bueno, de vuelta en enero de 2013 cuando empezamos a desarrollar el juego éramos 4 estudiantes sin dinero con un poco de tiempo libre en sus manos buscando crear algo sorprendente, 13 meses después seguimos siendo estudiantes sin dinero pero ahora sin nada de tiempo libre. Ha sido algo maravilloso y sabemos que tenemos algo grande en nuestras manos, pero también nos hemos dado cuenta que hacer un video juego no es del todo gratis y definitivamente consume mucho tiempo.Algunos de nosotros tenemos trabajos para pagar nuestros estudios, queremos usar parte de el dinero que recaudemos para dejar de trabajar y dedicar tiempo completo al desarrollo del juego juntos como equipo sin tener que preocuparnos por nada más que este maravilloso proyecto y la escuela por supuesto.Además, hay muchos otros gastos relacionados con música, sonido, licencias, mercadotecnia etc. A pesar de que Daniel ha hecho el tema musical principal un juego necesita un soundtrack completo. Queremos contratar a algún músico local talentoso que nos ayude con esto. También necesitamos un ingeniero en audio que nos ayude a que nuestros efectos de sonido estén relacionados con el concepto de arte.Con tu ayuda podemos terminar este juego apropiadamente, porque creemos que dejarlo incompleto sería terrible.Backer ribbon: When you connect to Facebook with our game you can keep track of your scores and see how your friends are doing. All our backers who claim the Grumpy Friend or above perk will get a ribbon by their scores so they can brag that they supported Grumpy Zombies before it was cool.Credits: All those who made possible Grumpy Zombies are mention here, this includes you of course!Grumpy UFO: This is a special power-up for our backers it won't be available on any other way. The UFO will… You require to login to Facebook on our game to get this power-up. This won't break game balance or difficulty.Wallpaper pack: These are the wallpapers we created along the game development, approximately David makes one every month highlighting some of his work, like a new zombie, or new game elements. We are proud of these wallpapers because in some way they represent our game road map. No one else has these, they are special to us, cherish them just like we do ;)Digital sketchbook: All house has blueprints, all video games have blueprints. This sketchbook contains raw drawings that helped define the game’s art. A highlight of this book is the storyboard used to create the game’s intro cut scene. This is quite a nice piece of work.Music: Daniel’s hobby, apart from video games, has been music, he created the game’s main theme and other pieces.Digital Art Compendium: This reward contains all art used on the game, it is a catalog that exhibits all game art, including some that never were released with the game.T-shirt: These are made by teelaunch, a very popular brand used by crowdfunders. You’ll get a t-shirt of your favourite color with a sketch of Common Carl.Poster: A 18in x 24in poster featuring some of our best art!Keychain: Keep the infamous rubber duck protecting your keys from zombies!Vitruvian zombie t-shirt: The teams’ favourite piece of art, get a t-shirt with this amazing anatomically correct zombie!3D statue: Punk Patrick printed for you from our very own game, don’t worry he won’t eat your brains. An awesome addition for collectors. You want him drinking a grumpy cola? no problem!Case: It worked great for Riot Ralph, so it should protect your iPhone perfectly!Design a weapon: Be part of our game design by creating your very own weapon! Choose something unique, funny or deadly! All sketches used to create your weapon will be sent to you! *Restrictions apply, we don’t want any offensive or inappropriate material in our game, contact us if you have questions.Design a zombie: Just like a true game designer, make your own zombie! Choose his strengths, weakness and special attributes! Come up with something funny that has never been seen before on a game! All sketches used to create your zombie will be sent to you! *Restrictions apply, we don’t want any offensive or inappropriate material in our game, your design has to be obviously a zombie and cannot be anything that promotes racism, hate or other inappropriate behaviors, contact us if you have questions.Be the boss: Every game level has a boss, but the strongest, toughest boss will be the final one. With this opportunity you get to be in a game! Send us a picture of you, and we will first sketch you as a zombie, then we will create a 3d model of you, and you’ll be on the game!! All art used to create your zombie, like sketches and others drawings will also be sent to you!A week in paradise: Ever wanted to visit cancun? We’ll be your guides! Culture you want? We’ll go to the ruins! Party? There’s plenty of that? Hungover? The beach is always sunny!( Spanish - Español )Backer ribbon: Cuando te conectas a Facebook con nuestro juego puedes ver tu puntuación y también la de tus amigos. Todos los donadores quienes reclamen Grumpy Friend en adelante recibirán una medalla única junto a su puntuación para que puedan jactarse de que ayudaron a Grumpy Zombies antes de que fuera genial.Credits: Todos los que hicieron posible Grumpy Zombies son mencionados aquíGrumpy UFO: Este es un power-up para nuestros donadores, no se podrá conseguir de ninguna otra manera, La OVNI podrá ser usado como un ítem especial para matar esos zombies que estén causando problemas. Tendrás que accesar con tu cuenta de Facebook para ver este power-up. Esto no romperá el balance del juego o dificultad.Wallpaper pack: Estos son los fondos de escritorio que hemos creado a lo largo del proceso de desarrollo, David hace uno cada mes aproximadamente para acentuar algo de su trabajo durante ese mes, como un nuevo zombie o algún nuevo elemento en el juego. Estamos orgullosos de esos fondos de escritorio porque en cierta manera representan la ruta del juego. Nadie los tiene, son especiales para nosotros, aprecialos como nosotros.Digital sketchbook: Cada casa tiene planos al igual que cada video juego tiene planos. Este libro de bocetos contiene dibujos que nos ayudaron a definir el arte. Algo interesante de este libro es el storyboard usado para crear el intro y las escenas desechadas. Este es una muy buena pieza.Music: el hobby de Daniel, a parte de hacer video juegos es la música, él creó el tema principal de Grumpy Zombies y algunas otras piezas. Estas serán incluidas en el soundtrack del juego.Digital Art Compendium: Este premio contiene el arte usado en el juego, es un catálogo que exhibe todo el arte del juego, incluye todo aquel arte que no se usó en el juego.T-shirt: Las playeras son echas por Teelaunch, una marca muy popular en las campañas de Crowdfunding. Recibirás una playera de tu color favorito con un boceto de Common Carl.Poster: Un poster de 18 x 24 pulgadas con algo de nuestro mejor arte.Keychain: Lleva contigo el famoso patito de hule protegiendo tus llaves de los zombies.Vitruvian zombie t-shirt: La pieza de arte favorita del equipo, obtén una playera con  la anatomía de un zombie.3D statue: Punk Patrick impreso para ti directo de nuestro juego, no te preocupes, no comerá tu cerebro. Un precioso artículo para los coleccionistas.Case: Funcionó perfectamente con Riot Ralph, así que deberá proteger tu iPhone perfectamente también.Design a weapon: Se parte del diseño del juego creando tu propia arma. Escoge algo único, divertido o mortífero! Los bocetos requeridos para la creación de este ítem se te enviarán.*Se aplican restricciones, no queremos nada ofensivo o material inapropiado en nuestro juego, contactamos si tienes cualquier duda.Design a zombie: Como un verdadero diseñador de video juegos, haz tu propio zombie, escoge su poder y su debilidad como sus atributos especiales. Aporta alguna idea que jamás se ha visto en algún video juego. Todos los bocetos requeridos para la creación de tu zombie se te mandarán.*Aplican restricciones, no queremos nada ofensivo o material inapropiado en nuestro juego, tu diseño tendrá que ser obviamente un zombie y no puede promover en ninguna manera el racismo, odio o comportamientos inapropiados, contactamos si tienes alguna duda.Be the boss: Cada juego tiene su Jefe, pero el más fuerte de todos será el del nivel final. Tienes la oportunidad de estar dentro del juego. Mándanos una foto de ti, te haremos un boceto a la manera Grumpy Zombies luego crearemos un modelo 3D de ti y serás el jefe final de Grumpy Zombies. Todos los bocetos que se requieran para la creación del personaje se te mandarán.A week in paradise: Alguna vez has querido visitar Cancún? Seremos tus guías! Iremos a las ruinas, fiesta y mucho más! La playa está siempre soleada ;)Thanks for taking the time to check out our campaign, we hope you like our project. Here is a cute baby tapir that will make your day!Gracias por ver nuestra campaña, esperamos les guste nuestro proyecto. Aquí les dejamos una imagen de un tapir bebe!

Intro:

First, thank you for clicking in to check out our game!
Supper Duck is the first game we are making as indie developers. We started with a small team, but with you joining us, we will be less smaller XD


Supper Duck is the hero in a world called dUcktopia, where Ducks rule the world. 

There are all kinds of cute and hilarious Ducks that are only serious when making fun of each other. They will go to very great extent just to have a good laugh!
It's the kind of world we hope to bring to all players while enjoying our game!


Do you know Supper Duck is not actually a Duck?
(Sounds stupid? Check out more in our website: http://www.chickeninnovations.com/)

  

Back to  TOP

 

                                          

Ducks God - Sardine explained~

Ducks love sardine fish as a daily meal. The King of sardines cannot withstand it and started a plan to stop these ducks. He disguised himself as an enormous Duck taller than a mountain that shows up behind a curtain.


Definitely not controlled by fear, ducks were amazed by the huge muscular body of Sardin and praise him like a God. They worship him day by day and prepares his favorite Tomato hot spring pool inside a volcano every month. Ducks are so busy and have no time for fishing!


Things were going well until one day, the smartest looking duck contributed a Fat chili instead of a tomato and caused the Beak Bang explosion.

The son of Sardin, Dhor wanted to restore peace to dUcktopia and started his journey. Dhor suited up as a duck and went to the scattered islands that was formed by the Beak Bang to rescue all the ducklings.


 

"Supper Duck : To the Rescue" is the first game of our Supper Duck series.

It starts with the story where dUcktopia fell into chaos by a huge explosion due to a misplaced fat chilli into the tomato hot spring bath for their sardine God.
The Beak-Bang explosion sent ducks flying and stuck in the Scattered Islands. 

Supper Duck is a 2D action puzzle game where you will play as Supper Duck to dive into the dangerous Scattered Islands while ducking fire, fighting monsters and finding the best way to rescue ducks.

We like games with a lot of choices and different ways to win. In every Level, you get to rescue different Ducks with super powers. They will be available to be chosen for the next Level to help you with their powers to solve puzzles and kill monsters! Every level has their own challenges, there is never one best combination of Ducks for the game.

We get tired of games very easily, so this game must be good or we won't be making it!


New Gameplay Update - Pink Stars are Falling!


Go rescue all those hilarious Ducks in dUcktopia now!

 

Here are some of the ducks in dUcktopia:   

 

 Back to  TOP

 

   

 Ducks are loyal followers, when you rescue them in the game, they will follow each other all the way - this forms The Followship of the Ducks.


 Join The Followship now! Go to our website and register in our The Followship forum to give us your ideas and thoughts on Supper Duck!

 

We are giving away FREE Codes for 1mRuler for every registered account!

Official Site: http://www.chickeninnovations.com/

  Still reading? You must love us!

We started this project a few months ago working on our spare time and now we would love to put all our time on it with your help! We would go slowly even without much help, but there are things that time can't pay off, such as the sound effects and music, license fees and legal stuff. 

If you like Supper Duck, please support us to reach our goals below! 


       


We have a ton of awesome perks in return for you! (Check out our perks!)  

You can buy them directly in our Duck Shop:  http://www.chickeninnovations.com/#!shop/c1f48

Or get them at 10% Cheaper by contributing to our perks!

  

It's ok if you can't contribute, just help us spread the word to everyone around you!

Click on the "Share This Campaign" Link above!

 Back to  TOP

 

 

Making a game is challenging and surprises may happen.To ensures that we can deliver the game, we made a running prototype of the game before we started this campaign. We had friends trying it out and they find the game mechanics and the multi-choices are surprisingly challenging and addicting. They kept wanting to try out the different combinations until we had to kick them out of the house! This made us very confident in starting this campaign.

We still need to implement more graphics, sound and cut scenes. We also need to have the game running on different platforms before we can formally release. It does take time and we hope to finish it around 6 months. If we're lucky to have all the features on our stretch goals, it may take a bit more time. But whatever happens, we will do all we can to release Supper Duck as soon as possible!


 Back to  TOP

 

  

Q:How can I Buy add ons?

A:Just tell us in your comments when paying a perk. Write as much to let us know which add ons you want in your preferred design. Don't worry, we'll carefully read every line you write!
(Or buy in our Duck Shop directly: http://www.chickeninnovations.com/#!shop/c1f48)

  

Q: When can I receive the perks?

A: Digital Perks would be sent out right after we get the funding from Indiegogo, which is a few weeks after the campaign (Except for the Supper Tips and Tricks e-book and the Art-book, which will be delivered when the game is done). In-Game perks will be received when the game is released. Physical perks will take 6-10 weeks after the campaign depending where in the world you are. But be prepared to receive them much earlier.

  

 Q: Can I upgrade my perks to a higher tier?

A: Yes! Of course! Just donate the additional Amount and leave comment to let us know to which tier level you want. You will receive all the items in the tier level of your choice.

   

Q: How can I tell you what design I want in the perks?

A: Simple, we will send you a form to your email to let you fill in your choices. We'll make sure to get it right! 

 

Q: Can I register in The Followship forum with a different Email address than the one in indiegogo?

A: Yes. Just let us know which email address you will use for register. Just in case you change your mind after donation, you can email us with details and we will allocate the correct Duck to the account you registered!

 

Q: Will the game be paid or free?

A: The game will be free on release. We want everyone to enjoy Supper Duck. But only you backers get to play the exclusive Secret Levels! 


Q: Will there be a reward for reading all the FAQ?

A: Of course! You get to know most of our secrets in this campaign, and also........... 
it shows how much you like us! So don't hesitate and Like us on Facebook now!!


 

 Back to  TOP
story_txt:
**if you're donating less than $5, we would appreciate it if you donate by Credit Card, since most of your great donation would go to the handling fees in Paypal.**
Official Site: http://www.chickeninnovations.com/
What is Supper Duck | The Game | The Followship | Our Goal | The Duck Perks | Risks & Challenges | FAQ 
Recently Mentioned on:"A Quest Only A Duck is Worthy of Taking" - Julie Morley , Cliqist  Get these #SupperDuck Coaster, EyeMask, Bag for FREE now by sharing our campaign!Item Details: http://www.chickeninnovations.com/#!shop/c1f48^ All 4 coasters would be the same design.^^ You can choose 1 Duck Bag for Life from the 5 Designs we have.* We can only track Successful referrals when you use the Share Bar to refer to your friends* Please send us an email to (share.chick.inno@gmail.com) with your name so that we can contact you (your name must be the same as the account you logged in)Note:- We will notify you by email( in 1-2 working day) when you earned 3 stars after your 3rd referee buys any of our perks (Even the $5 one!)- Share Bar is under the video of our indiegogo page, it includes using Facebook, tweeter, g+, email, html or Link sharing.- You will be asked to log in to your Facebook, Twitter or g+ account while sharing, this helps us keep track of your referrals.- We will email you a form after the end of our campaign to let you choose the design you want- Terms and conditions are subject to the interpretation of “Chicken Innovations” which shall be final and conclusive.Intro:

First, thank you for clicking in to check out our game!Supper Duck is the first game we are making as indie developers. We started with a small team, but with you joining us, we will be less smaller XD
Supper Duck is the hero in a world called dUcktopia, where Ducks rule the world. 
There are all kinds of cute and hilarious Ducks that are only serious when making fun of each other. They will go to very great extent just to have a good laugh!It's the kind of world we hope to bring to all players while enjoying our game!

Do you know Supper Duck is not actually a Duck?(Sounds stupid? Check out more in our website: http://www.chickeninnovations.com/)
  
Back to  TOP
                                           Ducks God - Sardine explained~Ducks love sardine fish as a daily meal. The King of sardines cannot withstand it and started a plan to stop these ducks. He disguised himself as an enormous Duck taller than a mountain that shows up behind a curtain.Definitely not controlled by fear, ducks were amazed by the huge muscular body of Sardin and praise him like a God. They worship him day by day and prepares his favorite Tomato hot spring pool inside a volcano every month. Ducks are so busy and have no time for fishing!Things were going well until one day, the smartest looking duck contributed a Fat chili instead of a tomato and caused the Beak Bang explosion.The son of Sardin, Dhor wanted to restore peace to dUcktopia and started his journey. Dhor suited up as a duck and went to the scattered islands that was formed by the Beak Bang to rescue all the ducklings.

 

"Supper Duck : To the Rescue" is the first game of our Supper Duck series.
 It starts with the story where dUcktopia fell into chaos by a huge explosion due to a misplaced fat chilli into the tomato hot spring bath for their sardine God. The Beak-Bang explosion sent ducks flying and stuck in the Scattered Islands. 

Supper Duck is a 2D action puzzle game where you will play as Supper Duck to dive into the dangerous Scattered Islands while ducking fire, fighting monsters and finding the best way to rescue ducks.
We like games with a lot of choices and different ways to win. In every Level, you get to rescue different Ducks with super powers. They will be available to be chosen for the next Level to help you with their powers to solve puzzles and kill monsters! Every level has their own challenges, there is never one best combination of Ducks for the game.
We get tired of games very easily, so this game must be good or we won't be making it!New Gameplay Update - Pink Stars are Falling!
Go rescue all those hilarious Ducks in dUcktopia now!
 
Here are some of the ducks in dUcktopia:   


 
 Back to  TOP
 
   

 Ducks are loyal followers, when you rescue them in the game, they will follow each other all the way - this forms The Followship of the Ducks.

 Join The Followship now! Go to our website and register in our The Followship forum to give us your ideas and thoughts on Supper Duck!
 
We are giving away FREE Codes for 1mRuler for every registered account!
Official Site: http://www.chickeninnovations.com/
  
Back to  TOP
 

  Still reading? You must love us!
We started this project a few months ago working on our spare time and now we would love to put all our time on it with your help! We would go slowly even without much help, but there are things that time can't pay off, such as the sound effects and music, license fees and legal stuff. 
If you like Supper Duck, please support us to reach our goals below! 
       
We have a ton of awesome perks in return for you! (Check out our perks!)  
You can buy them directly in our Duck Shop:  http://www.chickeninnovations.com/#!shop/c1f48
Or get them at 10% Cheaper by contributing to our perks!
  
It's ok if you can't contribute, just help us spread the word to everyone around you!
Click on the "Share This Campaign" Link above!

story:
“Eternal Desert Sunshine” is a third-person adventure game with platform and shooter elements. The game is set in ancient Egypt with numerous references to the myth of Horus and Seth. You will be living a surreal adventure under the sun of Egyptian desert and along the legendary Nile River. Use the power of the Ankh and save Egypt from the return of Seth.


The major inspirations for Eternal Desert Sunshine are: Shadow of the Colossus, Journey, To the Moon and Future Boy Conan (Miyazaki).

"A long time ago after the death of Osirid Seth ruled Egypt bringing chaos and destruction but 5000 years ago one warrior sealed Seth in a mortal fight, this warrior was known as Horus the son of Osirid. The power of Seth was sealed in two: the red Ankh and a human body..."

Our story begins after these events our Hero is the son of Osiris and he is a young wizard who is training to become the magician of the 1st Egyptian dynasty. His master Shu (the God of air), was a great friend of his father Horus and he was chosen to protect the Ankh until our Hero was ready. Princess Kheti the young girl that you can see in the trailer is the daughter of Pharaoh Menes; Horus sealed part of Seth power inside her to prevent the return of darkness on earth. The Egyptian peoples regards Kheti as if she were Seth himself and she was shunned by her classmates, who out of fear and anger, hated her. Our hero will become the only friend of Kethi and this is why he will do anything to save her life and prevent the return of Seth.

Nut the fox your inseparable friend, will help you discover the Sahara Desert.


Eternal Desert Sunshine combines the precision of a first person shooter with the connection to the character you get from a third person game. You can twist and turn with the target always on your sight, the game was designed around mouse and keyboard controls. Your weapon the legendary "Eye of Ra" behaves as an independent living entity and during the missions you will unlock new powers including the ability to create and build.
In This journey you will meet strange and terrifying characters and in the giant Sahara desert you will find many temple complexes that will feature platforms and rpg elements. Be ready to live a dramatic and cinematic adventure!

The game environments are inspired from some of the most incredible Places of Egypt: Abu Simbel, Valley of the Kings, Karnak Temple and Giza Necropolis are only few of the monuments and temples that you will see.

"So my mind skins in this immensity: and foundering is sweet in such a sea.”

Giacomo Leopardi -The Infinite


In these dramatic political events that have put Egyptian tourism sector 'on its knees' this project can be seen as a small dream in a Land full of magic and history.

All the dialogues in the game are written but that does not stop us from giving facial animation to the characters of the game.
For us it's important to express feelings and emotions in the best way possible!



Karnak Arts is a new studio. Indiegogo is the easiest way for us to find and chat with players like you in an open and honest way. We hope you’ll share your opinions with us and help us refine the game.

We also chose IndieGoGo because we hope to raise enough money to make the best game we can. Here is what we will use the money for:

Software: Help us afford the software needed for pushing this game even forward.

Audio & voiceover: For this trailer we have used low budget voiceover we would love to have other amazing professional voiceover inside the game! We are in contact with 3 musicians that show interest in the project and have already joined the team:

-Fabrizio Santososso


-Isthar

-Gabe Castro

And we don't think they should work for free.

The music that have inspired this story is "The host of Seraphin" from the album "The Serpent's Egg" of English-Australian neoclassical band "Dead Can Dance" we obviously will never be able to afford the rights for this song we thoughts anyway to let you know.

Create an Editor: We are considering making a level editor, in that way after completing the game experience you will be able to play with custom platform levels, the level editor will never happen without your help.

Polish: We generally don't like releasing anything unless it has undergone a lot of polish.

Our vision for Eternal Desert Sunshine is innovation and fun and by contributing to our campaign you will empower that idea and make this happens.

We have been working hard on "Eternal Desert Sunshine" for the past 2 years and we believe that with your help we can improve almost every aspect of this game.


Karnak Arts is an independent game studio based in Milan(Italy), founded in 2012 by Ahmed Awad.

“I was born in Egypt in the village of Karnak surrounded by the beauty of Karnak temple complex, Luxor temple and the Valley of the Kings and Queens.

With Eternal Desert Sunshine my hope is to bring the old magic sensation of ancient Egypt in a surrealistic game experience.”

Ahmed Awad


Karnak Arts is a group of devolopers with a deep passion for videogames and 3d art in general. We started working on Eternal Desert Sunshine 2 year ago focusing on every aspect of the game (Story, character design, game programming, game design , 3d models…) in the trailer you can see the first working prototype of the game. We have also invested some money to buy the essential software and the rights for the music and sounds inside the Trailer because we believe that "Eternal Desert Sunshine" with your help can become a great story.

www.usgamer.net
www.multiplayer.it
www.gamersvault.com

www.eternaldesertsunshine.com

we've just been Greenlighted by Valve! Thank you all for your support!
Steam Greenlight

story:
We are Shorebound Studios -  a small team of two people with a passion for developing games. Our first project, Spectraball, was a simple physics-based platformer based off of one of my childhood favorites, Marble Madness. Our second project, Dead Sky, takes the fun of a top down zombie shooter and adds in strategic tower defense aspects as well as addictive cooperative online play. We aren't re-inventing the wheel by any means; our goal with Dead Sky is simply to deliver a satisfying and refreshing top-down shooter game that is action-packed, easy to enjoy with friends and affordable.

So, what brings us to Indiegogo? In short, we are here to seek exposure as well as take preorders in order to help us pay for additional assets as we approach release. We aim to release by mid October 2013, if not sooner. Regardless of whether we meet our goal or not, we still aim to deliver the game, but the level of polish as well as whether the game will be available on Steam will depend entirely on how much exposure we receive. We cannot do this without you.

If you really enjoy our trailer and cannot pre-order then please tell a friend.

Support us on Greenlight!

story:
Who we are

Crooked Claw started two years ago as a private venture with the intention to build up a range of 28mm Goblin miniatures sculpted by Kevin Adams, the man behind the late 80s Citadel Orcs & Goblin ranges.

Goals of the campaign

With about 40 infantry sized miniatures and two war machines available Kevin started on more ambitious projects in late 2013:   


a Trebuchet manned by three goblins 

a goblin shaman

and a wolfrider boss 

With the sculpting done master and production moulds have to be made in order get the new miniatures cast up. Moulding and casting add considerable costs to each addition to the existing range and come with the risk of overstocking on items, in turn reducing my financial capabilities to commision new sculpts. 

This is where this campaign and you come in. By funding this campaign you will guarantee to get existing sculpts cast up and in return get your hands on them first and at a discounted rate within a few weeks after the campaign ends. Please keep in mind that you are not funding vapor ware or digital concepts but a physical product ready for production.

Stretch Goals

500 GBP - Achieved !!!

A new perk is available for 25 GBP which contains the five riders shown below as well as five wolves in three poses (two to be done when the master castings are avaialbale) 

1000 GBP - Achieved !!!


A new perk is available for two additional archers, two spearmen and one standard bearer.These miniatures will only be available through the campaign and later be part of the respective packs already in production.

1500 GBP

Aperk for five wolf rider scouts -lighthly armored gobilns on wolves with bows incl. one champion- will be available for 25 GBP.



Final Countdown

With three days to go a capaign only Wolf Rider Hero has been added as a perk. Armed with a crossbow and his trusty knife he makes a nice addition to both wolf rider units.


Shipping

All pledge levels include international airmail shipping


When will I receive my perk

Please note that I will combine shipping for multiple perks. The more you pledge for the longer you will wait. I´m sorry for that but given the scale of this campaign paying for shipping multiple times would undermine the whole purpose as a significant part of the funds would go towards paying for postage. That said you will receive the new minis weeks before they will become regualrily avaiable.

A production mould for the shaman and trebuchet incl. crew will be ready by the end of the campaign and the above mentioned items will be shipped by the middle of Febuary. Depending on your location airmail shipping will take between 3 and 10 buisness days.

In order to have the production moulds reasonably laid out the wolfrider boss, the four remaining figures of the unit and three different wolf mounts will go on another production mould. The master casting of the first wolf has to be modified by Kev Adams and thus perks including any kind of wolf mounted greenskinned pillager will most probably NOT be send before the middle of March. 


Perks with already available miniatures

For miniatures already in production that are part of a perk please visit:

http://crooked-claw.blogspot.de/
story_txt:
Who we areCrooked Claw started two years ago as a private venture with the intention to build up a range of 28mm Goblin miniatures sculpted by Kevin Adams, the man behind the late 80s Citadel Orcs & Goblin ranges. Goals of the campaignWith about 40 infantry sized miniatures and two war machines available Kevin started on more ambitious projects in late 2013: 
 a Trebuchet manned by three goblins 


a goblin shaman

story:
Our Story

Blackwyrm Books And Games is a publisher of experimental fiction and quality roleplaying games. In conjunction with Hero Games' release of the Star Hero 6th Edition roleplaying game at GenCon 2011, we are attempting to simultaneously release seven science fiction settings that can be played using the Star Hero rules.  

 

We're calling this entire undertaking Project WyrmStar. 

The Impact

Hero Games isn't planning on releasing any settings for Star Hero: only the core rulebook and some equipment books. We are hoping to "fill the gap" that leaves by releasing unique and interesting setting books that can be used to play the game immediately, rather than forcing Game Masters to take the time to create their own setting. 

 

The Widening Gyre for HERO System 6th Edition is one of these settings. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise about $1000.00 to get a print run of The Widening Gyre out of the door in time for GenCon 2011.

Introduction

Welcome to the 19th Century that never was! It is a world of wonder, of horror, of adventure, of magic, of strange technology and unprecedented cultural revolution. This is an age that should have been, filled with radium-powered flying machines, clockwork automata, and steam-driven computers. It is an age of dark magic, sinister secrets, and unholy cults. It is a time in which the world teeters on the edge of chaos, where the enlightened scientific mind battled against ancient superstition and ignorance, in which the souls of all mankind hung in the balance.

 

Bill Keyes The Widening Gyre presents a glimpse at the Industrial Age as it truly was, envisioned by those far-sighted luminaries and Savants who looked beyond the feeble limitations of man and created a world in which science, technology, and logic triumphed over the mundane physical limitations of the Universe. And yet, Logic’s victory is far from complete. This is also a dark and gothic world, where monsters from ages long past still prowl and men with evil motives call upon ancient sorceries to grant them the power to control the world.

 

The Widening Gyre is a world in which you'll play consulting detectives and adventuring academics, occultist thrill-seekers and Savants both heroic and insane, all working for a secretive organization of benevolent technologists who seek to prevent the dark monsters of humanity’s past from overwhelming its bright and burgeoning future.

 

Welcome to the Widening Gyre!

 

 

What’s In This Book?

The Widening Gyre presents an entire world of adventure in the 19th Century That Never Was, but it is not a complete game in itself. To use it, Game masters should have a copy of the HERO System 6th Edition Volumes 1 and 2, or the Hero System Basic Rulebook.

 

Game masters should read the entire book through to learn about the genre and the world of the Widening Gyre. Pay special attention to Chapter One, which gives the history of the world, Chapter Three, which outlines character creation, and Chapter Six, which talks about the core concepts of Steampunk, including sugges­tions for different types of Widening Gyre campaigns, such as one which highlights the Gothic Horror and magical aspects of the world, and another in which high coal-fired technology takes the center stage. If you're a player, the information on character generation presented in Chapter Three will be of most use to you.

 

Chapter One, The Center Cannot Hold (The World of the Widening Gyre), discusses the history of the world of The Widening Gyre, and how it diverges from the world with which we are familiar.

 

Chapter Two, The Falcon Can Not Hear the Falconer (Organizations in the Widening Gyre), presents several organizations that can help, hinder, or harm the heroes.

 

Chapter Three, Passionate Intensity (Creating Characters), shows how to create a character, including packages for Steam Age heroes. It also describes how to use many HERO System character creation elements, like Skills, Perks, and Powers, discussing how to use them in the genre and providing expanded rules.


Chapter Four, Darkness Drops Again (Weapons, Equipment, & Magic), offers an enticing look at the weapons, vehicles, gadgets, and gear of the Age of Steam. Furthermore, it provides a dark, gothic magic system for use in your campaign, including an extensive list of spells and sorcerous powers.

 

Chapter Five, Mere Anarchy is Loosed, contains a complete, ready-to-run adventure that can be used to introduce new groups to the game, or to slip into an existing campaign. It includes sample NPCs who can be used to play the adventure, or as friends, foils, or foes for your regular group.

 

Chapter Six, Turning and Turning (A Steampunk Sourcebook), is a discussion of the Steampunk genre, touching on several subgenres which can be attached to any game. It includes a brief historical overview of the Victorian Era (roughly 1830 to 1901), and continues with a list of the conventions of the genre – those things that put the "steam" in Steampunk – then shows how to apply the ideas and concepts to your game.

               

Appendix, A Vast Image (Bibliography): The Widening Gyre finishes with an Appendix of recommended reading and viewing for anyone interested in furthering their exposure to the world of Steampunk and the Victorian age.


Other Ways You Can Help

Tell other gamers about BlackWyrm and Project WyrmStar!

Other Ways You Can Help
