story:
Help Us Complete and Release "Lords And Heroes" - an Independent Massive Multiplayer Online Game for the iOS Platform that Combines Strategy and RPG Genres in a Unique Way

Hello Everyone!

We are an independent startup and this game has been our dream and passion during the last 2 years. We have been self-funding it so far using mainly our revenue from freelancing but it's been pretty slow and earning money involved a lot of distraction.

Now that we have an alpha version we are on the right way to release and need to make the final leap!

Gameplay Video - http://youtube.com/watch?v=hCpU9HaerVQ

If this campaign is successful we will stop bothering about money and have it released within 4 months!

We have already invested 2 years of work and a whole lot of cash into this game. The story and the lore is being worked through, game engine is 90% ready, many game assets are ready too.

We have recorded an original soundtrack live with a power metal band "Cherny Kuznets" featured by performers from St. Petersburg Philharmonic Orchestra.

We have even recorded a live action intro video with members of our team and local LARP community - which was an exciting fun project (please see attached media gallery and our YouTube channel).

And of course see our pitch video for how the gameplay now looks!

We are very excited with what we have achieved but it is not yet enough.

What we still need:

  • Add more assets (weapons, armor, creatures etc)
  • Add some missing engine features
  • Tweak balance thoroughly - both battles and economy
  • Wrap it up for beta testing and then for release
  • Set up production game servers worldwide - since we need a good ping for battles we plan for at least 4 regions (US East Coast, US West Coast, Europe, Asia)

Support Lords And Heroes - get pre-paid play time at cheaper rates with every perk you buy today!

We've got some awesome perks for you. Get some pre-paid play time, collect an original soundtrack CD, an exclusive T-shirt and a poster, appear in game credits or even have an exclusive access to beta testing!

Lords And Heroes will have a flat subscription fee in the range of $1.99-$2.99/mo that provides all the players equal opportunities. We are not building yet another freemium MMOG! There will be no items or character boosts for sale. 

We fully realize this classic approach may reduce our revenues but we are ready to sacrifice revenues in favor of gameplay! Fortunately we have no big publishers behind us who would force us to use freemium model.

More about the game - unique game features

  • Alternative middle age setting. 3 factions permanently at war with each other fighting for resources.
  • Everyone plays his part in a faction-based economy. Resources are mined by a faction as a whole and then distributed among faction members according to their reputation with that faction. 
  • Battles in real-time 3D with realistic weapons, armor and movements. We have extensively consulted with our local LARP (Live Action Role-Playing) community who kindly provided a whole lot of information about historical medieval fighting. Special thanks to them! 
  • Servants help you to fight. You can hire up to 5 NPCs, equip them at your choice and have them help you in battles.
  • Crafting system with customizable recipes. Use metals and gems of your choice to create items with unique characteristics.
  • No leveling up, just playing! We decided to drop leveling system because it tends to require players do a lot of boring stuff. We don't want to spend weeks just to get to that level cap, we want to play right now. So once you start playing your character will be almost no weaker then others... But you still need to improve your specific stats, find a decent equipment, hire some servants and gain reputation to be competitive ;)
  • Visual achievement system. Every player has a "Treasure Room" where his treasures can be seen by him and any other player. Some perks are very hard to get and credit huge respect to the owner.
  • 3 basic styles of fighting depending on what you rely upon - heavy armor, speed and dexterity, command of your servants.
  • Original soundtrack recorded live with power metal band "Cherny Kuznets" featured by performers from St. Petersburg Philharmonic Orchestra.

Spread a word and get credited as a supporter for free!

Whether you buy a perk or not we'd appreciate if you share the link to this campaign on your social profiles, blogs and/or websites - anywhere you can! Spreading the word can be sometimes as helpful as financial support. If you do that please let us know by email (send to info@lordsandheroes.com) and we will gladly add your name to supporters list on our website!

Thank you all for your help!!!
story_txt:
Help Us Complete and Release "Lords And Heroes" - an Independent Massive Multiplayer Online Game for the iOS Platform that Combines Strategy and RPG Genres in a Unique Way
Hello Everyone!
We are an independent startup and this game has been our dream and passion during the last 2 years. We have been self-funding it so far using mainly our revenue from freelancing but it's been pretty slow and earning money involved a lot of distraction.
Now that we have an alpha version we are on the right way to release and need to make the final leap!
Gameplay Video - http://youtube.com/watch?v=hCpU9HaerVQ

If this campaign is successful we will stop bothering about money and have it released within 4 months!


We have already invested 2 years of work and a whole lot of cash into this game. The story and the lore is being worked through, game engine is 90% ready, many game assets are ready too.
We have recorded an original soundtrack live with a power metal band "Cherny Kuznets" featured by performers from St. Petersburg Philharmonic Orchestra.
We have even recorded a live action intro video with members of our team and local LARP community - which was an exciting fun project (please see attached media gallery and our YouTube channel).
And of course see our pitch video for how the gameplay now looks!
We are very excited with what we have achieved but it is not yet enough.
What we still need:

Add more assets (weapons, armor, creatures etc)
Add some missing engine features
Tweak balance thoroughly - both battles and economy
Wrap it up for beta testing and then for release
Set up production game servers worldwide - since we need a good ping for battles we plan for at least 4 regions (US East Coast, US West Coast, Europe, Asia)


Support Lords And Heroes - get pre-paid play time at cheaper rates with every perk you buy today!
We've got some awesome perks for you. Get some pre-paid play time, collect an original soundtrack CD, an exclusive T-shirt and a poster, appear in game credits or even have an exclusive access to beta testing!

Lords And Heroes will have a flat subscription fee in the range of $1.99-$2.99/mo that provides all the players equal opportunities. We are not building yet another freemium MMOG! There will be no items or character boosts for sale. 
We fully realize this classic approach may reduce our revenues but we are ready to sacrifice revenues in favor of gameplay! Fortunately we have no big publishers behind us who would force us to use freemium model.

More about the game - unique game features

Alternative middle age setting. 3 factions permanently at war with each other fighting for resources.


Everyone plays his part in a faction-based economy. Resources are mined by a faction as a whole and then distributed among faction members according to their reputation with that faction. 


Battles in real-time 3D with realistic weapons, armor and movements. We have extensively consulted with our local LARP (Live Action Role-Playing) community who kindly provided a whole lot of information about historical medieval fighting. Special thanks to them! 


Servants help you to fight. You can hire up to 5 NPCs, equip them at your choice and have them help you in battles.


Crafting system with customizable recipes. Use metals and gems of your choice to create items with unique characteristics.


No leveling up, just playing! We decided to drop leveling system because it tends to require players do a lot of boring stuff. We don't want to spend weeks just to get to that level cap, we want to play right now. So once you start playing your character will be almost no weaker then others... But you still need to improve your specific stats, find a decent equipment, hire some servants and gain reputation to be competitive ;)


Visual achievement system. Every player has a "Treasure Room" where his treasures can be seen by him and any other player. Some perks are very hard to get and credit huge respect to the owner.


3 basic styles of fighting depending on what you rely upon - heavy armor, speed and dexterity, command of your servants.


Original soundtrack recorded live with power metal band "Cherny Kuznets" featured by performers from St. Petersburg Philharmonic Orchestra.



Spread a word and get credited as a supporter for free!
Whether you buy a perk or not we'd appreciate if you share the link to this campaign on your social profiles, blogs and/or websites - anywhere you can! Spreading the word can be sometimes as helpful as financial support. If you do that please let us know by email (send to info@lordsandheroes.com) and we will gladly add your name to supporters list on our website!
Thank you all for your help!!!

story:
Overly Kinetic

Overly Kinetic is a team of five game designers looking to make it to Scotland for this year's Dare to Be Digital competition. Dare to Be Digital is a game design competition where teams from all over the world gather to make original games. We love games, we love making them, and we need your help to participate in this competition. Our game is called Chambara (previously called Deco Samurai). It's a fast-paced, multiplayer death match game with a unique visual style. More information on Chambara can be found in our pitch video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=da8037L-5EI 

What We Need & What You Get

Your contribution won't go towards development. Everything we need, (room and board, lab space, etc.), will be provided by Dare. What we need is air fare to Scotland, as well as rent money for next semester. Participating in Dare means giving up on any summer jobs or internships we may have lined up, which some team members use to pay for university housing for the following semester. International air fare isn't cheap, either. We need your help to get us there!

To be concise, your donations will go towards air fare to Scotland and university housing next year.

Backer rewards will vary depending on the contribution:

  • $10 - Apprentice Tier - For a minimum contribution, you will receive a credit in the final game.
  • $30 - Adept Tier - You will receive a credit in the game, a personalized thank-you card, and a digital copy of the final game.
  • $50 - Master Tier - You will receive a credit in the game, a special Chambara poster, and a digital copy of the final game.
  • $100 - Samurai Warrior Tier - You will receive a credit in the game, a Chambara t-shirt, and a digital copy of the final game.
  • $300 - Mifune Status Tier - You will receive all backer rewards.

The Impact

With your contribution, we'll be able to participate in a highly prestigious game design competition. We'll meet fellow game designers from around the globe, and share in our passion for games to create something amazing. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're unable to make a contribution, that's OK! Support us by sharing this campaign with your friends and family, and we'll be eternally grateful. 
Thank you for your support!

Sincerely,
the Overly Kinetic Team

story:
Game for real vikings is coming

Steam

 

VALHALL — a multiplayer Viking first & third person Hack and Slash game with a skill-based free-flowing combat system.

 

 

Real-time collision

 

 

Play as from the first person view as well 3rd

 

Also, don't worry about third-person peeking.

 

During the Early Access there will be NO Third-person peaking feature implemented.

 

Get incredible emotions with in-game real-time voice chat - you can talk to your opponent or his dead body. This feature is working in a close radius of your character.    

That will fill your combat experience with new epic & fun moments. Tell to your opponent's face all what do you think about him - wish him good luck or tell how soon his spirit will leave this battlefield.

We hope that this option will fill your game experience with a good quantity of realism from any in-game contact.

is just the first game mode

We have bigger plans on this game

See some of them on our Community board

 

  • Bronze Chest (1 pair of Boots and 1 pair of Gauntlets)
  • Beta Test Access (1 Steam Key)
  • Name in credits
  • FULL Game & Early Access

 

  • Weapons Chest (1 Weapon)
  • Silver Chest (1 Armor and 1 Helmet)
  • Bronze Chest (1 pair of Boots and 1 pair of Gauntlets)
  • Beta Test Access (1 Steam Key)
  • Name in credits
  • FULL Game & Early Access

Example of quality

  • Exclusive Odin’s Helmet
  • Runes Chest (1 Rune)
  • 3X Weapons Chests (3X Weapons)
  • 2X Golden Chests
  • 2X Silver Chests
  • 2X Bronze Chests
  • Beta Test Access
  • Name in credits
  • FULL Game & Early Access

    Runes add the visual effects to your weapon

     

    You will get 2 items from 1 chest!

    VALHALL is not a pay to win game. The items from the chests are cosmetic and allow you to look unique - you will feel like a boss on the map.

    Furthermore, you will never receive the same items which you already have from a chest.

     With great pleasure we present to you our way of interaction with the community

      This allows us to communicate with you in more detail and most importantly, to jointly determine the direction in which VALHALL will develop.

    https://realtimeboard.com/app/board/o9J_kyAnuMk=/

      Why is this board interactive? - Your opinion will be taken into account and the board will be modified according to your suggestions.

      It's not a space for empty words and unanswered pleas. This space will have a meaningful and significant effect on the development of the game. Board is dynamic and will be updating, give it some time, and we hope to see it flourish with your input.

      We hope this space not only provides us all with a lot of fun as a place to foster new relationships, but also allows us to shape the future of the VALHALL franchise effectively together.

      The second part of the interaction tool, which incorporates the ability to vote for the features which you would like to see developed with the single press of a button. Through this process, we hope to offer our shared vision of certain ideas and see your reactions to it.

      At this stage our new official Discord server will play a key role in this process.

    https://discord.gg/z5pwABS

      Our team of moderators and community manager have put together a well polished and engaging space for our continued interaction.

    We sincerely hope that you like it!

      In the process of evaluating new features, interacting with the development process and presenting your ideas, we have established a channel where your feedback and input will directly affect the interactive board discussions.

      It should be noted that at the moment, due to the fact that all our resources are directed to the development of the game, we are forced to use third-party software to implement an interactive whiteboard. We don't see this as an issue for the time being, however, we hope to develop our own tool for this process on our website later.

      With regards to the Discord server, verification of this server as official by the administration of Discord (which gives official servers the little tick in their name) will be carried out immediately after the start of Beta testing - this is due to Discord's rules, as the game needs to have been released before the server can be verified. We're just as eager as you are.

      On the new official server you will find both moderators, who many of you are already familiar with, as well as some members of the development team.

      We ask you to keep in mind that we try to answer all the questions we receive on various social networking platforms as soon as possible, but at the same time each and every member of our team has a certain set of duties, the fulfillment of which affects both the quality and development time.

      Therefore, we ask you to understand that there will be cases where one of our developers is online in the Discord, but does not have the opportunity to give an answer to a question immediately or to take part in conversation. Please be respectful of this, we work long hours to develop the game which you are patiently awaiting. If you need anything please contact one of our moderators.

     All of this will help us to develop a game which is truly a work of art.

     

    Help to bring VALHALL to life!

    Invite your friends and get your squad assembled! There is much more fun to be accompanied than on your own. Having assembled your troop, you can easily do the famous Shield wall and stop push of your enemy.

    You can spread a word about VALHALL

     

      We're a fully independent international team at the beginning of its journey. 

      What is more, we're gamers. We've been playing such great games as Skyrim, Chivalry, Mount & Blade and a lot of others for long time. That experience leads to the deep understanding how to implement important aspects of the game the best way.

      Also, our independence allows us to listen to the suggestions of our community and make the improvements the payers want.

     

    Tests on Steam

    Bonus table for backers supported us on early stages

There is much more fun to be accompanied than on your own. Having assembled your troop, you can easily do the famous Shield wall and stop push of your enemy.You can spread a word about VALHALL   We're a fully independent international team at the beginning of its journey.   What is more, we're gamers. we unlock this miniature for the last 24h !

you can select with 7 euros specific perk



16 euros you get 4 skeletons


STRETCH GOALS

for all funders that support with one team or 

more. New perk for the rest.

Wip:

13.000= Free turn/reroll counter, indiegogo exclusive, for all funders that support with one team or more. New perk for the rest.


About us

RN estudio offer services like 3D sculpt, the best 

3D printings ,  Resin cast and Miniature Painting


We helped other companies to have success in their crowdfunding projects, we work in more than 16 successfully completed projects.

We have enough experience to bring you the best quality  resin cast miniatures, for your Fantasy Football match, or simple for collect and paint !

Why Crowdfunding?

Our previous campaigns, for expand our miniature range, Chaos Pact team and Humans VS Orcs, was  very successful, and we are very happy with the experience.

We plan produce all the miniatures and do all the shippings in 6  month !

All our funders are very satisfied with the finall product, also you can buy

in our new web store !

We have finish awesome models for Hightouch, Stampede, Eternals and Newzones, that we want you enjoy fast !, because of this, we need your help to make this teams reality.

If you help in this proyect, you will get the best price you can dream, and very interesting exclusives miniatures !

support with one team or more. And new perk for the rest.
